Your pinky’s still on your goddamn hand. You’re asking to leave, and you show up empty-handed? That’s not how things work in the yakuza, dumbass!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m not here to talk to you. Where’s the boss?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: I’m the one handling things right now. And you think that kinda tone is gonna fly with me, junior?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [He hits Kiryu in the stomach.]

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hngh!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: No pinky, no cash… You seriously think you can come in here and just ASK to be let go?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [He punches Kiryu in the face.]

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Rgh!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: The yakuza’s not some after-school club you can just quit when you get tired of it, you little shit!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: C’mon, use your head here, Kiryu. It’s not too late to put this all behind us. Pump Captain Kazama for that info on the Empty Lot. That’s the only way you come out of this alive.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: May I please see the boss now? I came here to get expelled.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: So that’s a no, then? Heh, all right… Then we’re done here. I’ve got no use left for you.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [He hits Kiryu in the stomach again.]

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hrrnf!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: You had the chance to climb the ranks as one of my boys. If you’d have taken that, you wouldn’t have to die now. Hey, Yoneda!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Yoneda
Text: Yes sir.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Figure out how we erase this trash.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Yoneda
Text: It’s not fancy, but a live burial up in the mountains is probably easiest. Or we could melt him down with chemicals and just dump him in the river.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: No, leave a body. It’s better if he’s found, down the line. Sends a message that Dojima’s big on discipline. Tojo HQ will appreciate that.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [Yoneda kicks Kiryu in the face.]

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Really…?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You’re gonna just kill a family member… without the boss’s permission?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Are you high, kid? The boss has got nothing to do with this now. You just left the family.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah… Yeah, I did. That’s what I was waiting to hear.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: What?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [Kiryu knocks Yoneda out with a couple of powerful blows.]

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Yoneda
Text: You fucker…

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: What the fuck are you doing? He outranks you.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Outranks me? I’m a civilian now.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: You just said so yourself. You’re free to come at me if you want… But I’m not gonna pull any punches.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Yoneda
Text: Lieutenant Kuze! I’ll kill this little shit!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: He’s yours. Do whatever you like.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hold it. I’m not done talking to you.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: I’m done with you. Besides, you’re dying here. Look, you make it up to see me alive, and I’ll hear what you have to say.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Fine. I’ll be right there.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Yoneda
Text: You ready, bitch?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Anytime. Let’s go!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [Kiryu makes his way to freedom by defeating dozens of yakuza on different floors. From time to time, Yoneda attacks him, but Kiryu successfully reflects off his sneaky moves. Soon he gets to the top floor.]

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Huff… huff…

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Looks like you can actually back up that big mouth of yours. Not bad. Kazama scouted himself a solid kid. If I’d met you back when I was boxing, I’d have offered to be your promoter.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Kuze… Talk, before I break your jaw. Who’s the one behind the Empty Lot hit? Where are you hiding him?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Now, don’t get ahead of yourself, junior… I think those idiots downstairs might’ve given you the wrong idea. You don’t screw with the Dojima Family, Kiryu. Yeah… I’m gonna serve your ass myself and I’m gonna enjoy it.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Done with your little speech? Let’s go already.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Yeah?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: All right, fine. I’ll come to you!!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [The epic standoff begins. The stakes are high, the tension increases with each hit. And yet Kiryu manages to defeat his formidable opponent.]

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Kiryu. You bastard…!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [The other two lieutenants, Hiroki Awano and Keiji Shibusawa enters.]

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Brothers! Gimme a hand here. Take this little punk out!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [Kiryu rises his hands, preparing for a new fight. The lieutenants step aside and Dojima himself enters the room.]

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Boss…

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Dojima, sir…

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [SOHEI DOJIMA. Patriarch of the Dojima Family, a Tojo Clan subsidiary.]

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Dojima
Text: Wasn’t this a one-on-one thing, Kuze? I won’t have Dojima lieutenants making goddamn asses of themselves. You’re no Kazama, I’ll tell you that.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: But, boss! It was the captain that took this kid in! This is him, Kazuma Kiryu!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Dojima
Text: So… I hear you wasted a guy on a collections run. You sound like a fucking moron.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I came to see you about that Incident, sir. I swear to you that I didn’t kill that man. But I understand that even just being a suspect brings the family unwanted attention. So please… Expel me from the family.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: You think that’s gonna fly, bitch!? I’ll take care of this one, boss. He won’t make any more trouble for you!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Dojima
Text: Oh, really? You going to murder a civilian? Your decided on your own to let Kiryu out of the family, didn’t you?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Awano
Text: That’s not… Sir, I didn’t! Lyin’ to the boss? That’s bad form… Bro.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Awano!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: I heard him loud and clear as well. “Kiryu’s already left the family, so I don’t need the patriarch’s permission to kill him.” Something to that effect, wasn’t it, Kuze?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: You rat bastards!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Dojima
Text: Kuze. You plan on digging yourself even deeper?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [Awano brings Kuze a stand and puts a tanto on it.]

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: Now, brother… As head of the Kenno Clan, you know the drill.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Awano
Text: You love this accountability shit. Show us what kinda man you are.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Goddammit!  You fucking watch close!
Action: (screams) (pulls the tanto out of its sheath)

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [He screams and cuts his little finger off. Shibusawa collects the finger and Kuze leave.]

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Dojima
Text: A lieutenant of the Dojima Family gave you an answer, so I have to honor it. Kazuma Kiryu… As of today, you are expelled from the family.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Dojima, sir…  Thank you, sir.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Dojima
Text: Tell me, Kiryu. Why go through all this to get kicked out?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: In order to prove that me and Kazama-san are innocent, sir. I’m not the one who killed that man, and Kazama-san has nothing to do with any of this! But the man I collected from died in that lot, and that’s made trouble for the family. That’s on me, so I’m leaving the family to take responsibility for it. So please, sir, just leave Kazama-san out of this!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Dojima
Text: …It’s about time for dinner.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Awano
Text: Yes sir.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Dojima, sir!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Dojima
Text: Just how do you intend to take responsibility for this now?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’ll catch the one who really killed that guy! That’ll prove that me and Kazama-san are innocent.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Dojima
Text: I see. You don’t need to bother.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What? But the killer’s still…

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: The killer? Let the police sort that out. You’re a civilian now.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: But I have to do this. To make things right!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: Make things right? You’re a civilian, damn it. Get it through your head and stop whining.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Dojima
Text: You admit you screwed up this time, right?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yes, sir. At the very least, if I hadn’t done it at that spot, all of this might have been avoided.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Dojima
Text: So you asked to be expelled.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yes sir.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Dojima
Text: Well, relax. I’ll make sure responsibility’s taken.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Sir?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Dojima
Text: Your screw-up made it harder for us to get that land, Kiryu. And it was Kazama that brought you in. Accountability falls on him. You were a yakuza till a minute ago. You understand the logic, right?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Sir!

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Dojima
Text: There’s no coming back once you’re out of the yakuza. I suggest you find a nice little job and live a nice little life.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [Dojima and his lieutenants leave.]

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What now…? What the hell am I supposed to do now?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [Rain. Kiryu is aimlessly walking down the street. He falls to his knees. Passersby look at him with surprise. Suddenly one of them stops.]

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Mysterious Man
Text: Can you stand? You’ll catch a cold if you stay down there. My name is Tachibana.

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana?

Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I am aware of your present circumstances. I’ve… I’ve been waiting to meet you. I’ve waited a long while, actually. Might I have a moment of your time? …Kiryu, Kazuma-san.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [Tachibana leads Kiryu to his home. Kiryu takes a shower and goes out in a bathrobe.]

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I assume you have not eaten? You are welcome to join me, if you like.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Sorry, but I don’t have much appetite. Not big on taking food from strangers.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: You have my assurance that I am no threat to you, Kiryu-san. Please, make yourself at home.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Where are my clothes?

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: They were in need of cleaning, so I took the liberty. I will have them back to you momentarily.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana-san, was it?

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: That’s correct. Please, be at ease. I am a civilian. I operate a real estate business in Kamurocho.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: And what does a real estate guy want with me?

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Are you certain you won’t eat? My right hand is prosthetic. Please excuse my table manners. I lost it years ago, and now it aches in the cold months. A curious thing. I feel it throbbing, down to the fingertips, even though it’s gone. Painkillers have no effect. So I simply live with the pain. In time, grimacing became tiresome, so I stopped.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I don’t recall asking.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Kiryu-san, are you familiar with the term, “pseudanthium“?

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Pseudo… ?

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Pseudanthium. A botany term referring to a cluster of many flowers, gathered to form a single, large flower. You are intimately acquainted with one such flower, as it happens.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What are you talking about?

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: The sunflower. Each large bloom is in fact a collection of tiny flowers, each petal its own entity. A fitting name for a place where children gather. A fitting name for a place where children gather. Was it Kazama-san who named the orphanage “Sunflower“?

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: …Who are you?

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: You and Nishikiyama-san grew up as brothers at the Sunflower Orphanage. A young woman named Sawamura, Yumi-san as well. You and Nishikiyama-san regarded Kazama-san as a father, in time following in his footsteps to join the yakuza. And now you find yourself framed for murder, with Kazama-san facing the risk of expulsion as a result.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That’s enough! You proved your point. It’s obvious you’ve got quite the network to dig all that up. What I don’t get is why. What are you after?

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: There’s only one thing any real estate broker in this town is after. I want the Empty Lot.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That place again…

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I would like for you to join me, Kiryu-san. If the Dojima Family lieutenants acquire the Empty Lot, Kazama-san’s expulsion is a certainty. But if I can beat them to it… I can protect Kazama-san. And then there is also the matter of proving your innocence. The reach of my Kamurocho network is considerable. Join me, and you will have the means to bring the culprit to light.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Why go to the effort of winning me over? What is it you’re really after here? I’d like my clothes back, Tachibana-san.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: So you are rejecting my offer?

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: It’s too good. Too convenient. In this town, that’s when you have to be careful, if you want to survive.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I see. It would seem I was naive. Still, I have faith that you will reconsider in time. For now, I would ask only that you accept my card.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah… right.

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I will have your clothes brought up immediately. If you’ll excuse me…

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [Outside.]

Chapter: Chapter 2: THE REAL ESTATE BROKER IN THE SHADOWS
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (I should let Nishiki know I’m not dead yet. He’s probably still at the Kazama Family office.]

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [He walks to the headquarters of the Kazama family and sees Kashiwagi looking at him from the window and then leaving.]

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Kashiwagi-san…

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Text: [Nishikiyama approaches Kiryu.]

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Kiryu!

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki…

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You’re okay!? I can’t believe you made it out of there alive!

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, I’m not dead yet, anyway. But it’s official now. I’m out of the Dojima Family.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Yeah? So Kazama-san’s in the clear, right?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Not yet. The family intends to hold him accountable until I can prove I was set up.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: What? Why!? You’re out of the organization now!

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: December 9, 1988
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I know. Still, this is a step forward. Now that I’m not yakuza, I’m free to take action. I’ll pay Kuze a visit and make him hand over the killer.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office

Speaker: Homeless Man

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office

Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I see. And now Tachibana’s got him on a leash.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office

Hopefully I can track down those other homeless guys. In this neighborhood… I usually see them hanging around Park Boulevard. Maybe I’ll start there.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [He finds a couple of homeless down the street.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate

Text: Yo, you got word on any good jobs?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Cart-pulling Homeless Man
Text: If I did, I’d be doin’ em myself. Speaking of, I hear Saku-san just got back from that gig for Tachibana Real Estate.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Smelly Homeless Man
Text: You serious? Lucky bastard… You think he’d cut me in on some of that if I asked him?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Cart-pulling Homeless Man
Text: Who knows? Can’t hurt to ask, I guess. He’s probably over at Public Park 3 with his buddies.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (A homeless guy who worked with Tachibana Real Estate might have some info. I’ll head to Public Park 3 and check it out.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [He go to the park.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Gotta love Tachibana Real Estate. I wasn’t expecting a sweet little year-end bonus! This calls for a toast, fellas!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Hatted Homeless Man
Text: Yeah! We deserve to forget all the bad crap for one day. Let’s live it up!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I was hoping you guys could answer a few questions. Is this a good time?
Action: (Looks like these are the homeless guys Tachibana employed.)

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Huh? Yeah, I don’t mind. …Actually, wait. Sorry. It’s too cold. My tongue’s frozen stiff.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Hmm, if only I had some booze. That’d thaw it right out. If you’re that eager to chat, buy us a round. Only fair, right?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Hatted Homeless Man
Text: Ooh, great plan, yeah.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Your tongue seems to be working just fine to me.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Mope! It’f mumb. Cam’t tawk!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Fine. You’ll talk if I bring drinks? Well, first just answer me this. Who out of you has actually done work for Tachibana Real Estate?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [Everyone rises their hands.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Heh, I see. Then at least it looks like I’ll get my money’s worth.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Oh, and not just ANY booze will do. We get to choose our order, okay? Tongues are tricky like that. If you don’t give ‘em exactly what they want, they’re just no good.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (It’s probably quickest to just give them what they want… I’ll take their orders and bring what they tell me to.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Me, I’ll stick with beer.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Heh, after all that talk, I was expecting fancier.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Yeah, well. There’s just no beating a beer at the end of a job!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What job?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Whoa, you almost got me there. Nope! First the beer. And I got a bottle opener on me, so I don’t care if it’s a can or a bottle. Whichever works.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Okay, beer’s easy. They sell that pretty much everywhere.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Hatted Homeless Man
Text: There’s nothing like sake to warm you up in winter!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Whoa, whoa. You don’t expect me to bring you hot sake, do you? Because that’s more than I can promise.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Hatted Homeless Man
Text: Ooh, that’d be amazing. But I’m not that greedy. Room temperature works.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Sake, huh? They sell that in convenience stores.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Preachy Homeless Man
Text: For me? Hmmmm… I’m in kind of a sweet potato shochu mood.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: …It has to be potato shochu?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Preachy Homeless Man
Text: What are you, crazy? Sweet potato shochu’s the only shochu worth drinking. You one of those kids who only drinks beer? You gotta expand your horizons! You’ll never get a woman. When I was a young stud, I’d take gals out, get ‘em wasted, and…

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, I don’t need to hear any more. (If I check a few different convenience stores, someone’s bound to have sweet potato shochu.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Cheery Homeless Man
Text: Ee hee hee, didn’t expect a free drink tonight! Life’s just great, I tell ya. Oh, and I’m a whisky hound, thanks.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Whisky? Got it.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Cheery Homeless Man
Text: Oh, and I’m real particular about my whisky. Make sure it’s a scotch, would you?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Hmm, scotch… If I hit a few convenience stores, somebody should have some.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Quiet Homeless Man
Text: …Champagne.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Champagne? Awfully fancy choice.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Quiet Homeless Man
Text: …Christmas.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Ahh, yeah. I guess it is that time of year.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Champagne… They probably have some at Don Quijote.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [Kiryu finds and buy all booze they need.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Here’s your beer.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Ooh, perfect! You’re a decent guy for a kid your age!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Here’s that champagne. You’ll have to ask Santa for the next bottle.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Quiet Homeless Man
Text: …Merry Christmas.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Here, this one’s yours. Scotch.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Cheery Homeless Man
Text: Ooh ho ho! It pays to ask, I guess! Ahhh, tonight’s gonna be a fun one!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Here’s that sweet potato shochu you’ve been waiting for.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Preachy Homeless Man
Text: Nice! Now let’s induct you into the club of connoisseurs, kid!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Thanks, but I’m not drinking tonight.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Preachy Homeless Man
Text: Whaaat? You got the wrong attitude, kid! When an elder offers you a drink, you drink it! Doesn’t matter if you’re a featherweight, that’s the rules if you want to get ahead! Back when I was a businessman…

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: The sake you ordered.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Hatted Homeless Man
Text: Ah, beautiful! This is the only stuff that gets me buzzed. You’re the best, man!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Aaaah! Booze really is the water of life!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tongue limbering up now?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: You bet! My whole mouth’s nice and warmed up… *hic*!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Should I be worried?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: I’m fine. I’m fine! …Not that there’s really all that much I can tell you, buddy.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Let’s start with the work you’ve done for Tachibana’s firm.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Hatted Homeless Man
Text: Sure. You just go wherever they tell you and camp out for the day. Make a nuisance of yourself. Its easy money. We just finished our shift at one spot today and got paid. Tomorrow it’s on to the next place.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You were at the Hakua Building until a little while ago, right? I was there myself.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: What, you already knew that? Then what else crad you wanna know?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Is it Tachibana’s company that reaches out to you for jobs like that, or do you go to them?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Yeah, they come to us, same as you did.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Sometimes yakuza from the Tojo Clan hire us to do the same thing, They’re in the business of chasing people out, too. It’s a bull market for us homeless folk these days.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Hatted Homeless Man
Text: And we don’t really care if ifs for the yakuza or for Tachibana-san. Anybody wants to pay us, we’re there.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Fair enough. One last question: you know where the Tachibana Real Estate guys hang out?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Yeah, that’d be the Champion District. I see ‘em going in and outta there all the time. That area’s a gold mine for land speculators. It’s nothin’ but tiny bars, all packed tight. If you could chase ‘em all out and bundle those properties together, you’d make a killing.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: All right. So you think their next target’s the Champion District?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Hatted Homeless Man
Text: Pretty sure. Though they’re not the only ones. The Tojo Clan’s been going after those properties, too. If a yakuza-type like you waltzes in there, all the locals are gonna clam up, though.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I see. Thanks for the advice. I appreciate it. (The Champion District… That may be my ticket to bumping into Tachibana’s boys again.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [Kiryu leaves.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Well, here’s the Champion District. The Tachibana Real Estate guys have apparently been coming here a lot lately. It’s worth a walk around to see.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Champion District Resident
Text: You lost, friend? Why are you here? There’s no place in this neighborhood that’ll serve a yakuza like you.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’ve heard men from Tachibana Real Estate have been coming around lately. Are they here now?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Champion District Resident
Text: What, you another Tojo boy?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No, actually. And I’m not here to chase anybody out of town.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Champion District Resident
Text: Sure. So why are you asking after Tachibana’s guys, then?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I just want to know more about them. I promise I won’t make any trouble for you or the others here.  Not the warmest welcome I’ve gotten.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Champion District Resident
Text: We’re sick and tired of you yakuza! You don’t give a rat’s ass about any of the businesses here. But this place is all we’ve got left. If you want us out of here so bad, you’ll just have to kill us!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I told you, I’m only here to talk to Tachibana’s men.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Champion District Resident
Text: Cut the shit, man! You assholes have never bothered with talk before. You just TAKE!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [Kiryu beats their asses.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Champion District Resident
Text: What… What IS this guy!?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Are you finally ready to hear me out? I didn’t come here looking to hurt anybody. All I want is to know what Tachibana Real Estate is up to here. That’s it.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Champion District Resident
Text: I’m not selling them out to you… And neither will anybody else in this neighborhood.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hm? Wait, aren’t they trying to chase you all out, too?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Champion District Resident
Text: No! They’re… They’re trying to protect us from getting run out by the yakuza! The district’s only still standing right now because of them.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Champion District Resident
Text: Isn’t that right, Oda-san?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: Evenin’. Well, if it isn’t the guy from Namase’s bar. Thought you said you weren’t yakuza.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Apparently it’s hard for people to believe, but I’m not. Used to be in the Dojima Family, though.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Champion District Resident
Text: Shit, the Dojima Family? Of all the Tojo groups around, why did it have to be them?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I was expelled, though. Got nothing to do with them now.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: So, what’s got an ex-yakuza sniffing around after us?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Your boss asked me to partner with him.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: What? What’s your name, kid?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: It’s Kiryu.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: Well, I haven’t heard a word about this… Stay put. I’m calling the boss.  I understand. Then that’s how I’ll proceed. Yes, sir. Goodbye.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What did he have to say?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: He said if you want to know more about us you should come by the place you met him last night. He’ll meet with you himself.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah? All right.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: Just don’t come back around here. The people in this place don’t take kindly to yakuza.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I hear it’s you guys protecting the district from the yakuza. There any truth to that?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: Some. The boss has his policies.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Policies?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: He says the people in this district have been here since before Kamurocho burned down in the war. That this place is the root the whole town’s grown out of. He says newcomers like us have no right to meddle here.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That’s quite a change from your attitude at the other place.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: The Hakua Building? Ha, please. The tenants there all drifted into town looking to cash in. You saw the guy at Namase Bar, didn’t you? Sure, he played the “I’m a poor civilian victim” role, but how do you think they got those locations? By chasing out the people who were there before. I call it karma. Not that my philosophy really factors in. I’m just following the boss’s orders.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: But you’re saying you guys play by a set of rules.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: My name’s Oda. I’ve been with President Tachibana for a long time now. I run on-site acquisitions at most places. So, what’s it gonna be? You going to meet with the boss or not?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’ll meet him. I’ve got plenty more to ask… Seems like Tachibana Real Estate’s harder to figure out than I’d thought.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [He goes to Tachibana apartments.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (That Oda guy said if I wait in the penthouse here, Tachibana will show up. Anything I’m forgetting before I head up? I’m good. Let’s go.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [He enters the building. Three man meet him.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tch. Look, it was Tachibana who invited me here. Aren’t you with his real estate agency?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Tachibana Employee
Text: The president isn’t in.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I heard he’s coming later. He told me to wait for him up in the penthouse.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Tachibana Employee
Text: Heh, I’m afraid you’re mistaken, sir.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Tachibana Employee
Text: One of our coworkers, Oda, left us very clear instructions. He said a young thug would come barging in, and that we should greet him with a gentle bruising.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda said what, now?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Tachibana Employee
Text: This is your chance to pull an about-face, pal. Leave quietly, and I’ll just watch you walk away. Dude, your ears broken? I told you to get the hell out!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: It feels like this is the only sort of welcome I get, lately. But getting bounced at the door from a party I was invited to is a new low.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Tachibana Employee
Text: I already told you nobody invited you here, asshole!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Move. Talking to you is a waste of my time.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Tachibana Employee
Text: You lost your mind, dude? Or are you in that big of a rush to get to the hospital!?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [Kiryu kicks their asses. He goes up an elevator and finds Oda in Tachibana’s apartment.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Is that you, Oda?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: Yo.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Did you have the guys downstairs attack me? Why?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: Hey, you did your homework on us. I figured it was only fair that we got the chance to take a look at the goods, too. I mean, it’s clear you’re pretty good in a fight. But good enough to merit President Tachibana personally recruiting you? I just don’t know.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: And you thought having your crew attack me would give you an answer?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: Not really. Some things you’ve just got to do for yourself, I guess. I tell ya, it’s tough not being able to delegate. The real estate business in Kamurocho is a rough scene. But it works out, seeing as my blood boils hotter than your average yakuza.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So you’re more than just a crooked suit, is that it?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: Oh, I’m nothing special. But I am the perfect match for a half-assed ex-yakuza.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: In that case, I guess neither of us needs to hold back. Bring whatever you’ve got!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [JUN ODA bossfight begins. Even though he has a boton Kiryu manages to defeat him.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Oda
Text: Pfft… Ahhahaha! No fucking way… A total rookie, one-on-one, and he wins!? Heheheh. You gotta be kidding me.

Text: Ho ho! This should be quite an entertaining match. Steady now… BEGIN!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [Majima vs Shifty-Eyed Man.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Fei Hu
Text: I certainly did not expect you to use a bat so well… You’re quite the interesting fellow.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: Just remembered usin’ one back when I was runnin’ raids on the competition. Think I’ve improved since then, though.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Komeki
Text: Surprised me, too. I knew you could fight, but I did not think a spur-of-the-moment selection like that would get you far against Fei Hu. Shows what I know.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: So, uh… Fei Hu, right? What’d ya think of my bat work?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Fei Hu
Text: You passed with flying colors, of course. You are precisely the sort of person my business exists to serve.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: Your weapons shop, you mean? That’s nice of you to offer, but as you’ve seen, I ain’t real interested in the conventional stuff.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Fei Hu
Text: Heh, so much the better. I’m not a common dealer pawning off weapons I’ve scavenged.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: Well that’s cryptic. Whaddaya mean?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Fei Hu
Text: Are you free at the moment? My shop is quite close. I would enjoy the chance to escort you there and explain exactly what it is we do.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [At the shop…]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Fei Hu
Text: This is our shop, the Dragon & Tiger. Outwardly, a Chinese restaurant operated by myself and my wife.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Fei Hu
Text: This is my wife, Long Hua.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Long Hua
Text: New customer, yes? Many happy returns!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: …And? You said it wasn’t yer average weapons store. What exactly is it, then?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Fei Hu
Text: Most of the products we sell here are meticulously hand-forged by me. Bespoke arms, you might call them.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: Made-to-order, huh? So you ain’t an arms trader, you’re a smith, is what you’re sayin’.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Fei Hu
Text: Precisely. Now, if I may, I would like to explain how it is I go about making weapons.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: So you send these agents around the globe lookin’ for rare, materials and such? That IS pretty different.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Fei Hu
Text: Our goal in all this is to develop a robust network with arms dealers the world over, but some agents’ work takes them far from civilization.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: So basically, you got these guys searchin’ for treasure out in the jungle and shit? …I’m all about that, actually.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Fei Hu
Text: Indeed, remote archaeological sites produce some of the most beautifully wrought and historically important weaponry. My shop is always on the lookout for such gems. Furthermore, customers whose contributions pass a certain level are given a special reward: private arms lessons.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah? … So I’m guessin’ that means you were holdin’ back when we fought out there?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Fei Hu
Text: Naturally. That was only a test.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: Heh, you’re one slippery eel… Aah! Speakin’ of fish, I just remembered I ain’t ate yet. I’m half starved to death here! You said this place is a Chinese spot by day, yeah? Gimme the house special, would ya?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Long Hua
Text: Aiya! You customer for that side of business too? You wait, I fix you a feast!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [Having eaten up, Majima goes out of the store and meets Komeki.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Komeki
Text: Majima… There’s a favor I would ask of you.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: What now?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Komeki
Text: I don’t need to tell you not to spread word of their business, but I’d also ask you to keep vigil over them.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: Why’s that? The happy couple in some kinda trouble?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Komeki
Text: I cannot share the details now, but in time their shop may draw the ire of a terrible foe.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: What’s that s’posed to mean?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Komeki
Text: Nothing to worry yourself over just yet. I ask only that you drop by when you think of it, perhaps buy something, send them out on a search, that sort of thing.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: …Yeah, all right.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Komeki
Text: I’m headed into the wilderness to train. Don’t go letting that edge of yours dull, either.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [Majima’s and goes on. In one of the alleys he is shouted.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Thug
Text: Hey, hold up, Majima.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh? Do I know you?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Thug
Text: Yeah, I’m with Odyssey. Ring any bells?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: Odyssey? Look, if this is about Nozomi, Yamagata an’ I worked out a deal.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Thug
Text: Just ‘cause the manager okayed it don’t mean we did! You got balls like boulders to come poach our number one girl.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [Majima’s surrounded.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Thug
Text: Heh, I heard about your little “customer is king’ policy. They say you’ll even get down on yer knees and beg. Some “lord of the night.” Sounds friggin’ pathetic. You that hard up for cash?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Thug
Text: Well, lickin’ our boots ain’t gonna get you outta this one. You’re welcome to shine ‘em, though! Hahaha!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: You fellas got me right.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Thug
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: My customer IS my king.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Thug
Text: Heh…

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’ll bow to anybody who wants to drink at my shop. Lick their boots, too. But if you ain’t a customer, that’s different. And if you’re some sorry punk beggin’ to get served, you’re gonna find I’m more than willin’ to accommodate.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Thug
Text: Grr! That smug talk’s gonna sound funny comin’ from a busted mouth. Do him, boys!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [Majima’s crackin’ their heads with a baseball bat.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Thug
Text: Th-This guy’s some kinda monster… What ARE you!?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [Majima’s approaching him.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Thug
Text: Eeagh!

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: You want revenge, come drink at my club. Long as you’re my customer, I’ll get down on my knees and grovel as much as ya want. Do your worst.

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Thug

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: Just make sure you’re ready to pay your tab once you’re done bein’ my customer. The customer IS king. Ya got it?

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Thug

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Text: [They’re running away. Majima goes up to her apartment and opens the door. When he opens a window to smoke, he notices he’s being watched by almost the entire city.]

Time/Location: Gather Info On Tachibana Real Estate
Speaker: Majima
Text: This city’s a prison… How long till I’m free of these walls? …Eh, bro?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Text: [We’re seeing a bunch of flashbacks from Majima’s past in black and white colors.]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Saejima
Text: Hey, bro.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Young Majima
Text: Hey.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Saejima
Text: You got the stuff?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Young Majima
Text: Yeah.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Text: [He’s opening up a bag in which we see some revolvers.]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Young Majima
Text: Not a fake among ‘em. They’re the real deal, sourced through the Dojima Family Six guns in all. At six rounds apiece, that gives us 36 shots.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Pumped-up Man
Text: Thirty-six…

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Young Majima
Text: To take out Yoshiharu Ueno and every Seiwa Clan goon he’s got there with him.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Saejima
Text: Why call me to meet up in a place like this? Shibata-han.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Saejima
Text: I’ll be blunt with you. Today’s raid on Yoshiharu Ueno… Majima-san, please don’t go.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Young Majima
Text: How’d you know about that?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Text: [It’s raining. From the limousine comes out a bald man. Saejima with two pistols in his pants and one in his mouth is going for him.]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Saejima
Text: You and Saejima plan to strike Yoshiharu Ueno, freshly released from prison, at a ramen shop. That’s today’s plan, yes? Well, it turns out that plan is problematic. So we’re making a few minor changes. If you go ahead with the attack… It’ll be trouble for the Dojima patriarch… and for Shimano-san as well.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Text: [Young Majima is yelling at Shibata.]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Young Majima
Text: My bro’s already on his way out there! The hell do you expect me to do!?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Shibata
Text: Ma--Majima-san!

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Young Majima
Text: Are you tellin’ me to betray my sworn brother!? Just sit here and let him die on his own!?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Shibata
Text: Calm down. Calm down!

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Young Majima
Text: I’m goin’. I don’t give two shits about what happens after. Saejima’s the only brother I got in this world.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Shibata
Text: Majima-san! You’ll be signing your own death warrant--

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Young Majima
Text: Shut it! You think I care? I’m ready for what comes after. I been ready to die for a long time now!

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Shibata
Text: Is that so? Well, then I’m afraid I have no choice. Boys!

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Young Majima
Text: Shibata!

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Text: [In the next scene, Majima’s already been beaten and chained to a pole. Shibata cuts out his eye with a short blade.]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Shimano
Text: You disappoint me… Majima.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Shimano… Boss…

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Orders are absolute in the yakuza. Figured a guy like you would know that much.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Boss… My brother… What happened to Saejima!?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Hmmmm.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Please, tell me. Boss!

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Yakuza who lose their way wind up here in the hole.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Bo… Boss…

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Don’t worry, we won’t kill ya. Although… All the guys we throw down here end up cryin’ and beggin’ to die. Wonder why that is?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Boss… Where’s my brother!? Please, tell me… BOSS!

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Text: [Shimano leaves the room. When the door closes, he smiles meanly. Meanwhile, Majama wakes up as if he had a nightmare.]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: (…Another shit night’s sleep. Gotta get to work. Not much else I can do right now.]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Text: [He’s going to his club.]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Floor Manager
Text: Good morning, sir. And again, thank you for managing to strike a deal with Odyssey yesterday.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Just doin’ my job. Now it’s up to you guys to keep this place on the upswing.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Floor Manager
Text: Still, that was quite the surprise to wake up to! Why didn’t you tell me another girl was coming besides Nozomi?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Another what now?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Floor Manager
Text: Sure, she’s not at Nozomi’s level, but she’s still a veteran with a solid following. With any luck, all her old regulars will come straight to us now. We gave up some of our girls in the trade, but considering what we gained, I’d take this deal any day.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah? Glad I hauled my ass over there, then. Gotta make myself useful around here somehow.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Floor Manager
Text: Even just getting Nozomi is a small miracle. Asking for anything more would just be greedy.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Looks like my little talk with Yamagata went well. Honestly, though, I was hopin’ we’d make out a little better than what we got. A little more research ahead of time or a closer look at the insides of the club mighta given me a few more cards to play with. No sense worryin’ about it now, though.]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Floor Manager
Text: Now, if this is a good time, I’d like to work out the new shift schedule.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sure.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Text: [A waiter running up to Majima.]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Waiter
Text: Telephone for you, sir. Um, when I asked who was calling, he just said “the owner’…?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: …I’ll handle it.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Text: [He’s coming to the phone.]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: What now?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Hey there, busy bee. Think you can cut out from work a sec?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Nothing big, I just feel like grabbing drinks, you and me.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: The hell kinda stunt is this? Sorry, but I’d rather down a hot mug of my own piss than suffer through beers with you.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Haha! Don’t, though. That stuff tastes about as good as you’d think.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: C’mon, the place won’t burn down if you leave it to the minions for one night, will it? I’ll meet you in Ashitaba Park. Don’t keep me waiting, yeah?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: HEY! …Tch.  The owner needs me. Not sure how long I’ll be. I’m leavin’ the club to you guys.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Waiter
Text: Sir!? Er, understood. I’ll let the floor manager know.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Thanks. (Ashitaba Park… Classy spot for a classy guy. No tellin’ what shit he’ll pull if I’m late. I better get movin’.]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Text: [He takes a cab and drives to the park. Sagawa’s sitting in a small bar outdoors.]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Hey.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Mind tellin’ me what I’m doin’ here?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Aw, don’t be so tense. I told you, I just felt like grabbing a round with my guy. Take a seat, tiger. Guess we better get a drink in you first. Hey chief. Get my buddy here situated.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Bartender
Text: Sure.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Times are strange. Fugu platters for a hundred grand, Matsuzaka beef that’s 10G a gram. I’ve tried it all… Yet it still can’t beat the 80 yen daikon from this beater of a food cart. Makes you wonder what the hell money even is.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Text: [Majima’s sitting there, looking at the counter thoughtfully. Sagawa offers him sake. ]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Eh?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Text: [Majima sets up his glass and Sagawa pours sake for him. He drink half a glass like he’s forcing himself. Sagawa smirks and drinks too. Some time passes…]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Ahhh… Hey, c’mon, you haven’t touched your drink since the first swig.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sake don’t taste right sittin’ next to you.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Heh, has it already been two years since you and I met? All that time, and you’re still sulking. Makes me wonder why my oath brother even bothers keeping you alive. Heh, it doesn’t make a damn bit of sense. Yakuza who willingly defy their bosses always get served. Expelled, disavowed… That’s if they’re lucky. Worst case, you disappear into some black site for a nice, slow death. You got the hole. Blackest site I know. You should be history. But you toughed out a year of torture like a champ, so Shimano let you out. How you made it through that without cracking’s a mystery, but why he brought somebody back from the hole is even harder to figure out. But getting let out and forgiveness aren’t the same. You were banished from the life without a proper expulsion OR disavowal. And now Shimano’s punted you to me, his brother flying other colors. Asked me to keep you as a civilian pet. For a guy known to talk straight or with his fists, Shimano sure picked a weird, roundabout way to deal with you. Can’t say I see his point with all this.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Who knows? I’d like to ask him myself.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Heh. Maybe we’re overthinking it. Could be he just can’t get enough of fucking that ass of yours.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Text: [Majima’s silently sipping off his sake glass.]

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: No reaction? Such a stick in the mud… Hey, there’s something I always wanted to ask you. Why are you so desperate to get back in the Tojo Clan? A rebellious shit like you choking down his punishment for this long blows my mind. Taiga Saejima, wasn’t it? Sworn brother from back in your Tojo days, right? You said you were doing this for his sake.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: “18-Counts Saejima.” …l remember. It was huge at the time. Solo raid on the Ueno Seiwa Clan who’d been making trouble for the Tojo Clan. Hard to believe he took out 18 men and walked away breathin’. The guy’s a living Tojo Clan legend. Made all the headlines down here in Osaka, too. And now he’s sitting in prison. Small wonder, after 18 murders. All that’s left for him is to wait for the axe to fall on his death sentence. Meanwhile, you’re here working to get back in the Tojo Clan for his sake. That’s the part that throws me for a loop.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: My bro ain’t the type to die inside those walls. He’s comin’ back… to kill me.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Kill you?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nothin’. Forget it. All in the past, now. Anyhow, I don’t care what happens to me. I’ll take any pain, any humiliation. I gotta get back to the Tojo Clan.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Hmmm. All right. So you’re really gonna spend your life waiting for a brother who can’t possibly come back to you? Clawing your way back to the Tojo Clan so you can carve out a seat for him to come home to… Haha, real tear-jerker of a tale, isn’t it?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Don’t see how it’s any of your business.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: I’ll tell you one thing. Different clans or not, my sworn brother Shimano has always done me right. But you wouldn’t see me throwing away my entire life so I could live for somebody else’s sake. His, or anyone else’s. You’re a grown-ass man. Isn’t it time you learned to cut yourself some slack and just live a little?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Hey, you do you. I know you’re not the type to hear anything I have to say and take it to heart… So I’ll do you a favor and cut to the chase. Can you kill a human being?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: A hit!?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Yes, that’s right.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: The hell would I kill somebody for?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: You said it yourself. You’ll do anything to get back in the game. Or has that changed?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Why do that when I can just make another 500 million at the club and buy my way back?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: What, by poaching Nozomi from Odyssey?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: So you already heard about that.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Funny thing about that, though, is one little phone call from me to Odyssey and I can scuttle that whole deal.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: What the hell for!?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Just a healthy reminder that I’ve got your future in my hands, buddy.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: First you make me earn for you, now you want me to kill?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Both important parts of the business. Important for the both of us.

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Who am I supposed to take out?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Makoto Makimura… Heard the name before?

Time/Location: Three Years Ago. Kamurocho.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Who?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [Komeki’s coming up to him.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Komeki
Text: Ahh, Majima! There you are.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: …Old man Komeki? What, you still out hunting for a place we can go at it?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Komeki
Text: No, just out for my afternoon constitutional, taking in the city… Hmm, you seem troubled.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Well, yeah. I gotta get across this bridge, but those punks are doin’ a good job of blockin’ the way. If they wanna break each other’s faces, that’s fine by me. I just wish they’d hurry up with it.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Komeki
Text: Fisticuffs, mm? …Knowing the rituals of their kind, I doubt things will take such a violent turn.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Rituals? What, you know those guys?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Komeki
Text: Judging from their attire, they are practitioners of the new “breaking dance” the kids are so fascinated with these days. It is their custom to settle disputes by dancing.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Dancin’ to assert dominance? What are they, some kinda horned-up birds? How the hell do ya fight with dancing?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Komeki
Text: Just watch. …There, look, they’ve begun. Watch their performances closely.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [Young men start dancing. Majima is amazed by the sight.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Holy shit!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [He’s shaping a new fighting style.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Holy… That was dancin? I never seen moves that sharp. Wonder if I could pull some of that off…]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Petite Youth
Text: Looks like my win. This bridge is, was, and forever remains property of A-ReShi Crew.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Angry Young Man
Text: … Fine, keep it. For now. But this ain’t over! I’m gonna up my game and be back for blood!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Komeki
Text: Ho ho! Seems the boy in the red frock won. Quite the sight, eh? An intriguing way of establishing pecking order.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah… Not bad, as street performances go.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Komeki
Text: Playing coy, Majima?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: How do ya mean?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Komeki
Text: Watching them dance sparked something inside you, did it not? The look in your eyes was hungry. Ravenous, even.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: And you got eyes like a damn hawk… Yeah, awright. Still dunno if I could actually apply it, though.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Komeki
Text: Heh, that’s marvelous news. Another thing to look forward to in our sparring.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sorry, but I’m kinda in the middle of something here. I get that you’re rarin’ to go with this, but it’s gonna take me a while, yeah?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Komeki
Text: Ho ho! Out on one of these “dates” with a young lass, are you? You’re a formidable man in many arenas, it seems!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Wh-What!? Naw, it ain’t like that!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Komeki
Text: Only teasing, my friend. …But I have found our venue. Ashitaba Park.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: The park? Okay… I’ll drop by when I get some time.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Komeki
Text: And I shall be waiting. I will have my training to occupy me until then. Farewell!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: The crowd’s clearin’ out here. Let’s hustle to the disco before somethin’ else comes up.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Let’s get goin’. Hey, Goro-san!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [They enter “Maharaja” club.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Receptionist
Text: Hello, sir. The VIP room entrance fee is ¥30,000.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Here you go.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Receptionist
Text: Thank you, sir. Please enjoy your time at Maharaja.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [Majima and Akko are sitting at the table.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Wow, I totally feel like such a celeb in here!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah, but it’s pretty dead back here with just two of us. Ain’t the whole point of a room like this to bring a big ol’ party, pop some corks, an’ cut loose?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Sure, like I got that many friends.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: You don’t? Coulda fooled me.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Not many girls out there are keen on pallin’ around with a kid who ran away from home. Or letting her couch surf. And the ones who are, their parents always kick me out. There’s a few girls I’ve met through this job, but we’re not the sorta friends who get together and party. That’s why so many grab guys and the hit hotels, just to have a place to sleep. But it’s so risky. Ya just to hear stories…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: And that’s why Makoto Makimura’s lookin’ out for girls like you with no place else to go, keeping ‘em safe on the streets at night? Still, some of the guys makin’ those phone calls must be bad news.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Soon as things go south we put in a call to Makoto-san’s pager. He sees that, then comes runnin’ to the rescue in no time flat.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh? That’s right, you said somethin’ about that earlier, too. Is this Makimura guy really that good in a fight?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Oh, strong ain’t the word for it! He’s tall as a tree, with muscles like a bear. Most guys get one look at him and they can’t apologize and get out the door soon enough!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh… Sounds like quite the fella.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Ooh, I’m gonna go dance!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: What, had enough of the VIP room already?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Well I’m not gonna come to a disco and not dance, am l? Especially when I don’t drink.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Heh, still just a kid on that front…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [On the dance floor, a man comes up to Akko and grabbing her hand.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Hey, let go!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Short-tempered Man
Text: I finally found you! I been keepin’ watch at all the places you seem to turn up in, just hopin’ to run into you again.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: What? What do you want from me?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Short-tempered Man
Text: Oh, drop the act, sugar. I figured I owed you for last time. You drag me all around town makin’ me foot the bill, then when it comes time to hit a hotel, ya call yer roided-up buddy to come beat the shit outta me!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: You got what ya deserve! Don’t think I didn’t see you put that pill in my drink. Ya think I’m gonna let a creep like that put his hands on me?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Short-tempered Man
Text: What, ain’t got yer musclehead boyfriend with ya today? You can go call him if ya like. I brought my own friends with me this time!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: You’re a real scumbag!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Short-tempered Man
Text: Sticks an’ stones, baby.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hold up.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Short-tempered Man
Text: Haw? The hell’re you? Another one a’ this bitch’s bodyguards?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hah, you crazy? I don’t even know that girl. I’m just sayin’ you’re in the goddamn way.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Short-tempered Man
Text: ‘Scuse you?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Discos are made for dancin’, pal. You wanna pick up chicks, try showin’ her your moves, if ya got any. I’ll show ya how it’s done. Clear me some space.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Short-tempered Man
Text: There a circus missin’ its clown tonight? Fine, you wanna dance so bad, you can dance with my boys and me. Hope ya like breakdancin’, pal, ‘cause you’re gettin’ broke!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Perfect. I was hopin’ I’d get a chance to try out that breakdancin’ shit I saw on the bridge.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Short-tempered Man
Text: We’re takin’ this outside! I’ma bury you!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [Majima kick the ass of the menacing men with his new break-dance style.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Goro-san, you’re amazin’! That was sweet!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Heh, just another day in the life. Still, you best keep the whole milkin’ guys for freebies thing in check. I was here to step in this time, but your man Makimura-han may not always be there to keep ya safe.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Hmmm, you’d think, but Makoto-san’s always real close by. One phone call and he really does come flyin’ in.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: That so?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Makoto-san’s a chiropractor most of the time. Got a place in Shofukucho South called Hogushi Kaikan.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Really? Figure I could meet the big man himself if I headed down to his clinic?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Probably.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Makoto Makimura… I’ve finally nailed you down!) Akko-chan, you’re a lifesaver. You really helped me out today. I’ma go interview the big man in person now.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Ooh, just don’t tell him it was me who told you, okay? You seem nice so I made a special exception, but details about Makoto-san are s’posed to be super top secret!
