Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Don’t worry, I got it. You really trust this Makimura-han, don’t ya?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Well, yeah. If not for him, there’s no tellin’ what coulda happened to me by now.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Ain’t that givin’ him a little too much credit? ‘Sides, who can say what kinda ulterior motives a guy has for bein’ so nice to so many girls?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Naw, he’s not like that, no way! Sotenbori’s overflowin’ with girls who’ll tell you it was Makoto-san who saved their lives! Girls who got tricked by terrible men, girls who been through all kinds of hell, girls on the verge of suicide… To all of us, he’s practically a saint. Doubt a guy THAT good, and you’re askin’ to get struck by lightning or something!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Oh, well I guess there is one thing. Just a little favor he asks us to help with.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: A favor?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Mhm. If we’re ever workin’ and find a guy with a tattoo of a bat, we’re s’posed to let him know right away.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: A man with a bat tattoo? Who’s that?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: I don’t know any details. Sounded like Makoto-san’s been lookin’ for him for a long time, though. Makoto-san hardly ever asks for our help on anything else, so all us girls are workin’ together to try to find the guy.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: I get ya… So that’s why you perked up when ya heard I had a tattoo.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: You got it.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Using his girls to find a man, huh…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: Oops, I gotta go! I’ll be late to meetin’ up with the next guy if I don’t hurry.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: There’s a next guy!? How much partying you doin’ today?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: I’ll see ya around! Bye-bye!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Drop in on your parents sometime!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Akko
Text: If I feel like it!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Well, I know where Makoto Makimura’s at now. But this ain’t adding up right. He sounds nothin’ like how Sagawa described him. How’s a total scumbag exploitin’ women for cash turn into a saint goin’ around saving ‘em? And what’s the deal with this bat tattoo…? …Doesn’t matter. Saint or scum, I’m killin’ Makimura. That’s the job. He should be at Hogushi Kaikan in Shofukucho South. I’m gonna finish this tonight.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Petite Youth
Text: Yo, shades!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hm? Who… No, you’re the guy from Iwao Bridge who was duking it out with the big dude with yer breakdancin’ or whatever.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Petite Youth
Text: BOOM, son, I FELT that!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh!? The hell are you explodin’ for?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Petite Youth
Text: That battle was SICK, yo! Those moves got me seriously buggin’! I thought I’d seen the best Sotenbori had to offer, but your skills are to the CURB!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Oh, that’s what this is about? Look, I just tried out some random stuff that came to mind. It’s nothin’.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Petite Youth
Text: The hell you talkin’, man!? It was like a bolt from the blue to me! A shout-out from God! You gotta join my crew. We need you!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Crew?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Petite Youth
Text: Yeah, A-ReShi Crew! If you joined up, we’d be kings of Sotenbori, no question! A-ReShi’s the crew’s name, and Areshi’s my name. So yeah, welcome aboard, dog!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: You nuts? Why should I waste my time playin’ around with you and your friends? Go find somebody else.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Areshi
Text: I ain’t playin’, fool! Me and my crew, we in this for real. I’m throwin’ down every DAY! We gonna take over this town, then Japan, then the WORLD, feel me?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah, that’s great. And just how ya plan on takin’ over the world by dancin’ on the side of the damn street?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Areshi
Text: Hey, lots of folks come through Sotenbori. Entertainment bigwigs gotta be in the mix, yeah? You get one of those cats’ attention, who even knows!?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: …I suppose it’s not impossible. Got plenty of guys like that comin’ through my club every night.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Areshi
Text: Way I see it, if I want the big boys to take notice, I gotta stand out more’n anybody else in this town. Do that, and gettin’ my ass on TV’s totally possible.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh, that’s some plan… And I figure into all that how, exactly?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Areshi
Text: It hit me while I was watchin’ you battle, dog! We take your ill moves and pump up the volume a bit, we’ll be crushin’ every other crew in Osaka! I already got ideas for a whole bunch of sick new moves. You get those under yer belt, you’ll be unstoppable, son!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Hmm… Can’t say I care much about dancin’, but I am pretty curious about where I can take this fightin’ style.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Areshi
Text: And hey, you don’t gotta gimme an answer right now. Think on it. We practice in the alley behind Shofukucho West. You decide you’re in, you come see us. Cool?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Awright, sure. Shofukucho West, right? Maybe I’ll drop by. Don’t go gettin’ yer hopes up, though. Name’s Majima, by the way.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Areshi
Text: Majima-san? Tight! We’ll be waitin’ for ya. You gotta come by sometime!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [He’s running away and Majima’s goes on.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Hogushi Kaikan… Here it is. Makoto Makimura’s in here. Whack him, and I’m back in the family. You got this… No reason to hesitate. I been playin’ lap dog this whole time for a chance like this. I ain’t goin’ through that humiliation again. This time, I’m gonna do it! Ready to bust in? Alright… Here we go!]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Here we are.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [He pulls out a short blade decorated with flowers.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: MAKIMURA! Where ya at!? What, nobody home? Fine… I’ll come back.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [He sees a picture of Makimura on the clinic’s poster.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: This is Makimura, huh? “God Hands” my ass…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl’s voice
Text: Is somebody there?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [Majima’s scared and hiding the blade behind her back.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: Huh… Um, are you a client?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [Majima swallows, picks up the blade again and goes to the girl. He need to eliminate the witness.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: That’s so odd. Sorry, is anybody in here?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: What? She’s blind…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: Did I leave the door open when I went out?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [The phone rings.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: Coming!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [A blind girl goes to him and bumps into Majima.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: N-No, this ain’t--!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: THIEF! Heeelp!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’m not! I’m a client! A customer!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: Let go!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Listen! HEY! C’mon, listen to me! A thief woulda bolted already! Calm down, would ya!?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: Where were you?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: I was… just came in! Then you steamrolled into me so fast I couldn’t clear outta yer way. I’m the one who oughta be in shock here!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: But we don’t have any more bookings today.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Y-Yeah? No, see, I… I’m hurtin’ so bad here I’m about to fell apart. So a friend of mine, he says the guy who runs this place is a real wizard. They say he’s got what, God Hands? So I came runnin’ to try to get some relief. …You okay?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: I’m sorry, I was just so scared. I’m sorry.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [She’s starting to cry.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: It’s fine. So, the boss… He not in?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: He’s out for the day and won’t be back in. I’m sorry.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Why’s she still apologizin’? Right, got it. I’ll come back later.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: Really, I’m really sorry, sir!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Don’t cry, cmon!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: Where… does it hurt?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Haw?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: You said… you were falling apart. If you’d like treatment, you should make an

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Er, right. I’m actually feelin’ better. See ya around.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: I knew it…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Knew it?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Girl with white stick
Text: THIEEEF!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: I AIN’T! I’m tellin’ you, I’m not! Aaah, fine, okay! Maybe I can get you to work on me. Yeah? Would that convince you I ain’t lyin’?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [The scene ends and a new one begins. Majima lies naked on the couch and a blind girl massages his back.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: ……Goodness, sir, you’re so stiff! You must have been in a lot of pain.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Y-Yeah…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: You’ve really done a number on yourself. I don’t mean to pry, but may I ask what you do for a living?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: My job? Err…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’m a cabaret waiter.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Oh, I see. We get a lot of customers in your line of work. It must be really taxing. We had someone in the other day from a pretty famous club. The Grand? He was saying it was like a war zone because the manager there is totally out of control.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Y-Yeah?  Who’d dare…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: They say there’s no rest for the weary, but I like keeping busy. It gives me the chance to meet so many interesting clients. I love asking clients about their jobs, or about the city. Hearing them talk about their work, I like to imagine them going about it, then figuring out what caused the pain or stiffness they came in for.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Ohhh? (If I keep quiet, she’ll just keep askin’ questions. This is my chance to turn the tables and get some info from her.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: What’s yer boss here like?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: The owner? Hmm… Apparently he’s got a pretty scary facade.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: A “facade” meanin’ what? He’s actually different?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Oh, absolutely. You’d never find a kinder soul. Sure, it’s really intimidating when he yells, but other than that…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: But he’s, y’know, not the type to use force or anything?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Force? Well, it must be true that he’s strong. The clients getting shiatsu from him make the funniest noises sometimes.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hah! Nah, I meant more like--

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: But for all the pressure he applies, there’s never once been a client that’s reported any soreness or bruising!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Must be those God Hands.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: He’ll even offer house calls to clients who can’t make it into the clinic. His number one priority is always the health and care of his customers. I really look up to him, not only to his therapy skills, but his humanity too.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Plus, he really saved me…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Saved you?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: …Anyway, so he’s totally not scary underneath! Just goes to show, you really can’t judge a book by its cover. Not that I’ve ever seen his cover.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hey, hey, no dark humor now… (Sounds like Makoto Makimura saved this girl too, same as Akko. Guess I’m just gonna have to meet this fella in person and see for myself. If I keep quiet, she’ll just keep askin’ questions. This is my chance to turn the tables and get some info from her.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Tell me about yourself. Any hobbies or anything?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Hmm, let’s see… I do like to read books in braille, but I probably listen to the radio more.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: The radio, huh? Lately I feel like there’s better stuff on TV than the radio, but I guess radio’s pretty great because people who can’t see can enjoy it too.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Definitely. But I always have more fun chatting with clients than just listening to a one-sided monologue, so I guess you could say my job is my hobby too.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: If ya really like talkin’ that much, you’d probably make a great hostess.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Who, me? I don’t know about that…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nah, I’m serious. Guys who go to places like that are just lookin’ for somebody they can talk about themselves with. Most important thing for a good hostess is to be a good listener.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: That’s really all there is to it?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: That’s it. There ya have it, I’d say you got a promising career if ya get tired of massagin’. But still… I’m jealous that ya like yer job.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: You don’t like yours, then?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hm? Oh, my boss is kinda… y’know.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Sorry to hear that. I guess I’m pretty lucky in that respect. Meeting my boss here really turned my life around. The only reason I’ve made it this far has been because I’m working here. Any other clinic, and I’d never have managed.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: (She seems pretty grateful toward him. Just who is this guy?]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [A blind girl continues to massage Majima’s back. Relaxed, he falls asleep. When the girl finishes the massage, she has to wake him up.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Sir. Sir…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh, wha--? Was I sleepin’?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: You must have been really exhausted. Your lymph wasn’t circulating at all, either. I’m guessing you haven’t been sleeping much?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah… Yeah, I guess not.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Now, can I ask you to turn over for me? I’ll go get you a pillow.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [She’s going to the next room.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: The hell… What am I doin’?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Huh? Boss?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Haw?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Boy, what a disaster! Didn’t notice I’d left my wallet here till I was done eatin!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: You’re always forgetting things, boss.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Oh, you workin’ on somebody?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [He’s coming into Majima’s room. Makoto Makimura turns out to be a pumped-up man with a lot of tattoos.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Welcome!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [He sees that Majima’s wearing a lot of tattoos, too.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Huh… Am I interruptin?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [He’s watching Majima closely and aggressively.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: He came in asking for you.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Work must be rough on him.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: He’s stiff as a board. I practically bullied him into letting me work on him. Isn’t that right?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah, ya did…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [He’s looking at a short blade lying on his bedside table.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Oh? And what kinda job puts a guy through all that? You got me curious.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [He goes back and takes a few needles off the tray.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Hm? Boss, are those the needles?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Yeah. Figure it’d be rude to leave a new client to my apprentice the whole time. Thought I’d throw in the acupuncture option.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Whoa, really? You’re so lucky, sir! The owner only offers needle work to regulars. His hot needle treatment might be just what that stiff body of yours needs!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [Majima reaches for the blade, but Makimura throws a needle right next to his crotch.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Hm? Um, what was that noise?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Ahh, damn! Forgot somethin’ important. Hey, run out and pick me up some smokes.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: What? Me?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: You know I use ‘em to light the ends of my needles when I’m workin’, yeah? Be a doll and grab me some.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: But it’ll take more time if I go…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: No problem. Gotta find all the client’s pressure points first… I’ll take my sweet time with it.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: All right, then I’ll head out.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Yeah, you be careful.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [She leaves the clinuc.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Why don’t yo ugrab that knife of yours, cyclops?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: You seem pretty used to situations like this.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [He jumps out of bed quickly and grabs the blade.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Eh, Makoto Makimura-san!?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: And just where’d you hear that name?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hardly matters. Rope enough phone girls into doin’ weird research for ya and yer name’s gonna get around.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Oh? Sounds like you been sniffin’ around.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: And you sound real relaxing, considerin’.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: I don’t know if you’re an Omi axe or what… But any rookie hitman dumb enough to get comfy in his mark’s shop ain’t shakin’ me.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Haw!?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: I’ll cut you a deal. Turn tail and go quiet, and I’ll let you walk away. Hmph. Not in the walkin’ mood? Then here’s God Hands full-service special! Get ready!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [They knock each other’s weapon out and start a real men’s fight. Majima wins.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Had you pegged for a two-bit hatchet man. But that ain’t it. Just who and that are you?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: I could ask the same.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [They keep fighting when suddenly a few bandits enter the clinic.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: We interruptin?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Hmph. So you’re a trash punk after all. Called your little girlfriends to come help and everything.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: You mental? Ain’t these your ladies?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: What’s that?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: We catch you at a bad time? You’re the owner here, Wen Hai Lee, yeah? Where’s Makoto Makimura?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Eh? You’re Lee!?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: What are you talkin’ about? I’m Makoto Makimura.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Yeah?  Why even bother feedin’ me a line like that? That one mighta gotten you this far, but we ain’t buyin’ it.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: What the… Wait…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Massage Therapist
Text: Hey, boss. I got your cigarettes. Hm? Boss?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makimura?
Text: Makoto…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: What the hell!?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Oh, perfect timing! Welcome back, Makoto Makimura-chan.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Huh…? Are you a client, sir?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Boys! Grab her and let’s go!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Pumped Up Man
Text: Run! Makoto!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [He’s running at bandits, but they shoot him in the shoulder and leg with a silencer gun.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Boss!? What’s going on?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Pumped Up Man
Text: M-Makoto… Just go, get out!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: What’s happening? Where are you, boss!?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Makimura… It’s her?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: You stay put, big guy. Move! What’re ya standin’ around for!?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Who-- What are you doing!? Let me go!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Go! Get her outta here!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Holy shitballs… The hells goin’ on here!?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Whoa there, slim. Where d’ya think you’re goin’?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: That girl’s really Makoto Makimura?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: And? What of it? While we’re at it, who the fuck are you?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: That girl’s My mark. I’m not lettin’ you jerks steal her!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Took the words right outta my mouth, punk! Doesn’t matter. You can die, too.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [He’s aiming his pistol. A few moments pass and the bandit’s hand is pierced by a needle.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Pumped Up Man
Text: Help her… Get her away from them!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Whaddya--?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Pumped Up Man
Text: You’re the only one who can… Hurry… Hurry up and go!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [They shoot him again and he falls to the floor.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: I told you to stay put, asshole.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Everything’s fucked… This’s insane.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Gettin’ rid of bodies is a pain, but screw it. The both of ya are gonna be floatin down the Sotenbori River tonight. Hope you said your goodbyes, slim. Boys! End him!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [Majima kicks their asses with his breakdance style. He’s running out on the street.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Crap, which way’d those guys take the girl? (There! I dunno what their endgame is, but gettin’ her away from them is priority one. You guys aren’t goin’ anywhere!]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [Majima’s catching up with the bandits who kidnapped the blind girl.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Now you’re gettin’ it!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Heavyset Yakuza
Text: The hell are you? Stay outta this, fool!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: I dunno whose men you are, but I got business with the girl. She’s comin’ with me!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Heavyset Yakuza
Text: Shit… Whatever, murder this one-eyed freak!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [Majima kicks their asses too.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: You okay? Can you stand?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: What? Yes… That voice… The man from the clinic? Please, can you tell me what’s happening?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Heavyset Yakuza
Text: Listen… You’re not… gettin’ that woman! More of my boys’re… already on their way…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: That’s freakin’ great.  I’ll explain later. We gotta get outta here!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Wh-What?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Shh! Keep real quiet…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Junior Yakuza
Text: Bro! Dammit, what’s goin’ on here? Bro, you okay!? Alright, the girl’s gotta be close still. Find her, NOW! And call for backup already!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza Underling
Text: Y-Yessir!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Tonight just keeps gettin’ better… (There’s still more of ‘em back at the clinic. Best bet’s to get her up north to Sotenbori Street without these bastards seein’ her!]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: We’re moving.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Are they gone?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [He’s leading Makoto around town, hiding from bandits. The road next to the Venus Club is blocked by a large number of them.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Shit! That way’s not happenin’… This way! Down the stairs!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Wait, stairs!? Whoa-- Hold on!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: No time for that! Hang on to me tight, now! Hey, stay behind. It’s dangerous.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Okay, sure.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: We cut through here and we should be able to shake ‘em…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: You turned out to be a real pain in my ass, slim. Now, let’s end this with you handin’ over Makoto-chan.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Crap, couldn’t ya have just stayed down?  You stay put right there.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: What? …R-Right.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Makoto-chan, feel free to go on ahead on your own. Not like you’ll be getting far before we catch up. You, though, I’m makin’ DAMN sure I kill here and now! Then I can take my sweet time grabbin’ the girl!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [Majima’s doing what any normal man would do - he won’t let some bastards offend a girl.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Who ARE you guys, huh? Why’re you after the girl!?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: …Ya don’t even know that, and you’re tryin’ to get involved?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Meanin’ what?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: You don’t know anything… Got no clue what she’s worth. You’re a… a goddamn idiot. No clue what you’re… about to step in… (loses consciousness]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: HEY! I want answers here! Dammit.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [Majima grabbed Makoto’s hand and they ran away.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: We should be good this far. You okay?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [Makoto sits on the pavement, grabbing Majima’s leg.]

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hey, what are--

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I’m scared…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: What?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: So scared… I was so scared!

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: It’s alright. It’s… alright now.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: And the boss…?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Don’t worry. He made it out, too. You’ll be together soon.

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Really?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah…

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Why… is this happening?

Time/Location: 90 Minutes Later
Text: [Majima reaches for a short blade decorated with flowers. He sees his reflection in the polished blade of the blade… The chapter ends.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Woman’s Voice
Text: It began in Asia’s largest pleasure district. A murder in the backstreets of Kamurocho. The man falsely blamed for the crime is Kazuma Kiryu of the Dojima Family. To shield Dojima Captain Kazama, the man who raised him, he risks his life and leaves Tojo Clan. The man behind the plot is next in line to Kazama, Dojima Lieutenant and Kenno Clan Chairman, Daisaku Kuze. His ultimate aim: a patch of land known as the Empty Lot, a forgotten square of Kamurocho and the lynchpin of a massive revitalization project. Amidst the yakuza’s furious battle for the lot, one man draws Kiryu under his wing. Tachibana Real Estate President, Tetsu Tachibana. Guided in secret by Kazama’s hand, he prepares to make his move and to change Kiryu’s fate forever.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [We found Kiryu and his friend Nishikiyama on the baseball field. Nishikiyama kicks off the balls and Kiryu sits on the bench.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: So, what, you finally decided to join up with Tachibana?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. Officially, I’m an employee at his real estate firm.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You’re a real estate agent now? Wow, look at you and your overnight jump to a legit career. Well, not that they’re exactly what I’d call upstanding.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No kidding.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: So let me get this straight, Tachibana Real Estate’s helping you clear your name in the murder investigation?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. Tachibana’s already digging around for info, using the firm’s information network.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: So hopes are high?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’d say so, yeah. Just… from what Tachibana’s heard, my name’s already come up with the cops. My prints turned up on that body in the Empty Lot.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Whoa. So does that mean they’re out there looking for you right now?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No. He’s on that, too… Tachibana’s been pulling strings around the force. He can’t get them to drop it entirely, but he says he can slow them down a little. At the end of the day, I’ll still be a wanted man if I can’t find the real killer. I’ve got maybe two, three days left of being able to walk around the city without having to look over my shoulder.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Gotcha. Still, that’s pretty impressive. Tachibana’s got to have some serious connections in the police to pull something like that off.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Seems that way.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: I guess there’s not much you can do on that front but leave them to it and hope for the best. So, whatchya up to now?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I told you. Real estate.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Just until we can pin down the owner of the Empty Lot. It sounds like they’re just one step away at this point. Until then, they asked me to help out with the rest of the firm’s work. I couldn’t really say no.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Wait, really? You, doing honest office work?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. One of Tachibana’s top men, this guy called Oda, is showing me the ropes. I’m meeting him after this at Cafe Alps. But before that, I need to do something about these clothes.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Your clothes?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: He told me I can’t show up to work there looking like a yakuza. Said I need to get a proper businessman’s suit.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Ahh… Is THAT why you called me out today?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You always know best when it comes to fashion stuff. I was hoping you could help me find something classy that makes me look less like a criminal.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Heh, then you’ve come to the right place, buddy. All right! Leave it to me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No pressure. I’m not expecting much here. I just figured your pick would be less of a train wreck than mine.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Screw you. Is that how you ask a guy a favor?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [They exit the baseball field.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: How much time till you’re supposed to meet that guy?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Not a whole lot. If we can, I’d like to take care of this here in Kamurocho.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Well, that limits our options a bit. Places around here that sell business clothes… Guess you’re looking at Men’s Suits in Nakamichi Alley.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nakamichi Alley? Since when is a clothing store back there?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: It’s where a lot of rookie hosts get their suits. You’re not gonna find any high-end brands there, but they should get the job done at a decent price.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No complaints from me there. Let’s get going.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You asking me to pick out clothes for you means you admit you have terrible taste.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oh, shut up. I’m just trying to avoid making waves. Pick one that’s safe and boring, okay?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [They’re coming up to the clothing store.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Here we go. This is the place.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Wow, there really is a clothing store back here…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Let’s dive in. You see one that grabs your eye, let me know.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Right.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Playing it safe… you’re probably looking at one of these.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Eh, I’m not really feeling it. They’re boring.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Welcome to clothes for the respectable working man. All that talk about flashiness only applies to yakuza, remember?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, but this is like… Won’t I look broke in that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Fits you like a glove, then.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, real funny. Oh, how about this one?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Are you stupid? Absolutely no freaking way. Yet somehow I knew that’s the one you’d pick.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What’s wrong with it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: That suit’s so loud it’s practically screaming. It’d be hell to coordinate the watch, shoes, hair, accessories… Pair it with the wrong stuff and you’d look like a clown. Fashion aside, it takes effort to work a look like that. An oblivious guy like you would wind up looking like it was the suit wearing you, not the other way around.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Geez, fashion’s a real pain in the ass.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Here, how about this? The color’s muted, but with the peaked lapel, it’s gonna look flashier than you’d think.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oh… White, huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: It’s a lot less crazy than that print monster, at least. Well, go ahead and try it on.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu dresses up as a white suit, which is almost no different from its usual appearance.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yo. What do you think, Nishiki?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Ki-- Kffft!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What’s so funny?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Ahaha… Sorry, it’s just that it totally doesn’t matter what you wear, you still don’t look legit! Hahaha!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tch, you’re the one who picked the damn thing out.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Nah, I know, man! But still, just… Haheheh.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I don’t care what you say. I like this outfit. I’ll take it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Huh? Wait, are you sure? You don’t look like an office type like, at all.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda just said to get some new clothes. I did what he asked. If he’s got complaints, that’s his problem.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Is that right? Okay, then! If you’re really sure, then the suit’s my treat. Gotta celebrate my bro’s fresh start!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What are you talking about?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I hadn’t planned on buying it from the start.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Tch. Greedy bastard.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [The screen goes out and we hear a voice.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Men’s Suit Employee
Text: Thank you very much.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [It’s getting absolutely unclear what happened. It feels like Kiryu just bought the suit, not trying to steal it.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Sorry to rope you into helping me out, Nishiki. Thanks.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Sure. Now, you’ve got that meeting to head to, right? With Tachibana’s guy… What was his name?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda. Yeah, we’re meeting up at Cafe Alps.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Ah, that’s right… Oh, and be careful, Kiryu. Word is that Kuze’s on the warpath, and he’s dead set on ending you. Your last run-in left him short on fingers AND on patience.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’ll bet.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: If things get hairy, gimme a call anytime. See you around. (leaves]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Okay, it’s about time to meet Oda. Pretty sure Cafe Alps is on Nakamichi Street. I should get moving.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s running to the cafe nearby.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Hey, you’re here. I was getting tired of waiting.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: You’re forgetting a “-san” there, junior. What kinda employee talks to his boss that way? And while I’m at it, what the hell’s with that getup? I told you to get a proper suit, didn’t l? You think you look like a civilian in that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Like you can talk…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Huh? Really? …You think so?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You sure there’s nobody more qualified to train me? Tachibana doesn’t have anyone else?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Heh, don’t kid yourself. You think anybody but me can keep you in check? Hope you’re ready. I’m a tough love kind of teacher. …Kiryu-KUN.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What are these?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Vanity specs. They magically turn a face made for mugshots into that of a civilized human being.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You seriously expect me to wear these things?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Quit your whining already. Hmm… Well, it’s better than nothing, I guess.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [As it turns out, Oda gave Kiryu his glasses.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Right, then. Let’s get started, yeah? First off, we’re meeting a regular of ours here. Older gentleman. Naive for his age, though, and too rich for his own good. Seems our pal’s run afoul of a particularly nasty squatter.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Squatter?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Huh? You’re a yakuza and you don’t know about squatters? You’re hopeless, kid. So, squatters. Basically, they take over properties in order to extort a sizable relocation fee from the owner.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: How do they take them over?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Okay, so if a mortgage owner defaults, a lot of times the court puts the building up for auction. Properties like that tend to go for a lot less than market value. But, they also have a tendency of bringing squatters out of the woodwork who slide in while it’s vacant. These guys dig their heels in and say they refuse to leave. Whole point being to get the property buyer to pay some insane amount to get them to clear out.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Even though they weren’t proper tenants to begin with?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: You got it. Though most of the time, the squatters are in cahoots with the previous owner. The old owners tip off their buddies that their place got auctioned in exchange for a cut of whatever they extort.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So let me guess. Our job is to kick squatters to the curb?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Nope, not that easy. Poor, vulnerable residents like them are protected to hell and back by the law. We use force, and it becomes a police matter. And it goes without saying we’d be the ones the cops put in cuffs. Pretty screwed up, right? At the end of the day, the buyer’s got to suck it up and pay some big bucks to get rid of them.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, that’s not right.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Which is why our client here is coming to ask us to resolve the matter for as little cash as possible. He should be here soon… Guess we can wait for him inside. Oh, almost forgot to give these to you first. Your very own business cards, Kiryu-kun. You’re an official Tachibana Real Estate agent now. But stay sharp. I’m using today to gauge your business skills. You pull some slacker bullshit on me, you can bet your leisure-suited ass the boss is gonna hear about it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Fine by me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [They come into the cafe.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Alps Server
Text: Welcome, gentlemen. Please sit anywhere you’d like.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Anywhere I like, huh? Where’s good to talk business?]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He chooses the table.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Whoa, hold up. We’re not sitting by the door, genius. Every time somebody comes or goes we’ll get interrupted. We’re here to talk business. Times like that, pick a table further towards the back.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Got it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Consider class officially in session. Try to use your brain.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He pick another table.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (This looks as good as any.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Good, this should work fine. The perfect spot for a professional chat.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Good, at least you know to sit at the foot of the table. If you sat yourself in the back there, I was going to lose it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: The business world’s no different from the yakuza as far as strict hierarchy goes. Sit down without thinking of your proper place and you could get a lot worse than decked.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Heh, glad you’re applying your experience to this. Keep it up and we’re golden.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Will do.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Alps Server
Text: Hello, gentlemen. Are you ready to order?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Ah, right…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Coffee for--

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: No, we’ll be ordering after our guest arrives. Mind coming back in a few?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Alps Server
Text: Of course, sir. (leaves]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: You better not have been about to order. You gonna sit there leisurely sipping your coffee while you wait for the client? This is basic business etiquette.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You figure?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: I’m not expecting much from you here, but at least try not to make me repeat myself.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Right. Still, all these rules are a pain in the ass.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: What are you complaining about? The yakuza are way more uptight about protocol. The higher up the ranks, the more formal those guys know how to act. Same applies in business. Ah. Look sharp, he’s here. That older guy’s our client. Hello, Yamanoi-san. It’s been too long.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: It has. Sorry about this, Oda-san. The whole situation’s a bit of a mess… And who is this?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Our newest hire, Kiryu. I’ll be having him help on this case for you, sir.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Oh, is that so?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu gets his business card out like a ninja.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Kiryu, Tachibana Real Estate, sir.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Nice. Business cards are step one in any business exchange. Doesn’t matter how hard you sell yourself. If they don’t walk away with a business card, you’re history to them. Close, but… your card’s upside-down there, champ.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Heh, it’s still a nice effort for your first try. I’ll cut you some slack.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Kiryu-san, is it? I look forward to working with you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Thank you. The pleasure’s mine, sir.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Some time passes. Mr. Yamanoi explains his situation.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: I see. What you’ve described sounds like a typical squatter. You purchased the property at auction last month, correct? Meaning the squatter took up residence just before that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Yes, I think so.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: And ifs just the one occupant?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Yes, a man named Tsuji. Early forties, I’d say? Filthy fellow, looks like he’s homeless.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: And has he asked you for a relocation payment yet?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Not yet. I was hoping to leave those negotiations to you Tachibana guys, if possible. I’m no spring chicken, and the whole thing makes me nervous. I do hope you’ll be able to chase him off without trouble.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Of course. If I may, Yamanoi-san, how much did you have in mind as the most you’d be willing to pay him?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: I’d like to be done with it as quickly as possible, so… Maybe five million or so?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Five million? To a guy who’s just squatting there?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Well naturally, less than that would be ideal, if possible.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: But why the hell should you pay this punk any money at all? If it were me, I wouldn’t cough up a damn yen.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Hey, watch your tone.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: This Tsuji fellow says he has the yakuza behind him. If I put up a fuss now, it could mean worse trouble later.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: I understand your concern, sir. But please, rest assured. Our man Kiryu here is an expert at handling yakuza.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: A yakuza expert…?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Hmm, how do I put this? He’s a yakuza otaku who really gets into character when he starts nerding out. Sometimes he likes to play dress-up and pretend he’s a real yakuza for the hell of it. Isn’t that right, Kiryu-kun?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. That’s me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: In any case, we’ll get that payment down as low as we can.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Can I leave the matter in your hands, then? Needless to say, I’ve also set aside funds to thank you for your services.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: You’re very generous, sir. But Tachibana instructed me to politely decline any such gesture. He said to thank you for all the kindness you’ve shown us.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Did he, now? Well, that’s Tachibana Real Estate for you! Always going the extra mile.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Now, may I ask where to find the property in question?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: On Tenkaichi Street, the Sugita Building.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Understood. We’ll handle everything from here, sir. Won’t we, Kiryu-kun?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Oda and Kiryu are leaving the cafe.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: You got the gist of that, yeah? Basically, we just need to clear that squatter out of the building. I’ll handle the negotiations. You just watch and learn.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: But this squatter guy’s got the yakuza backing him, right? Do you really think negotiating is gonna cut it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Guess that depends on how good I am. In the meantime, Kiryu-kun, I’ll bestow upon you your first mission.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: And what’s that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Run along and fetch me a confectionery gift box.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Even if we’re dealing with squatter trash, you don’t show up to the negotiating table empty-handed. We’re back to business etiquette 101, kid.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tch, this again? …Fine, understood.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Once you’ve got those sweets, meet me in front of the Sugita Building. I’ll wait for you there. See you soon.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. (He said this Sugita Building was on Tenkaichi Street. Can’t say the name rings any bells, though. That whole area is Dojima Family turf, so I know it pretty well, but I don’t remember any place like that… Might be tucked away on one of the smaller streets off Tenkaichi. I’ll have a look once I’ve got this gift box.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [After going around a few shops, Kiryu finds candy. He comes up to Oda waiting for him.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Hey, Kiryu-kun. You buy that confection gift box?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, this one work?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Nice. Gotta be able to handle errands this simple, right? Well, this is the Sugita Building.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So our squatter’s holed up in here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Right. Let’s head on up.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. Time for you to show me what you got.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Heh, watch and learn.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [They go inside the building and go up to the right floor.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: This should be the unit.  Excuse me! Are you in, Tsuji-san? We’re here on behalf of Yamanoi-san!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [The door opens and the untidy man looks out of it. Oda and Kiryu give him their business cards.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: We’re with Tachibana Real Estate.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: Tachibana Real Estate?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Here. It’s not much, but enjoy it with our compliments.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Sleeping Tsuji’s guard down, Oda opens the door to the apartment abruptly.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: HEY! Who said you could come in here!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [The apartment is a mess - there are boxes and sake bottles everywhere. There is a Sega Genesis connected to TV on the floor.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Ah, this place is a pigsty. You’re gonna have your work cut out for you cleaning this all up so you can move out.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: Move out? What’re you talking about? I’m not going anywhere.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Well, you can pretend, but this building is Yamanoi-san’s, now that he bought the place. And you outstaying your welcome isn’t doing him any favors.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: Civil Code, Article 395.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Come again?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: If you’re in real estate, do your homework. In the case of mortgaged property, short-term rental tenants are legally protected from the mortgagee’s demands. In other words, the law’s on my side in all this. You wanna take this to court?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Let’s not be so obstinate, hm? If you agree to move out, we would be happy to cover your expenses. My firm can point you to a new location quite similar to this one.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: Hey, I happen to like it here. And I don’t take kindly to you thinking you can throw money at me to make me go away.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Says the squatter who’s only in it for a relocation payment.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: What’s all this “squatter” talk about? Are you slinging baseless accusations at me now?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: C’mon, Tsuji-san. Let’s drop the act. The new owner’s eager to bundle up this rat’s nest and flip it for a tidy profit.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: That sounds like his problem, not mine. I’m done talking to you errand boys. You bring the owner here to talk to me, eh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: …Then why don’t YOU bring out the yakuza you work for?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: Yakuza? I don’t know what you’re talking about.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: I told you not to bother with your piss-poor performance. Don’t think for a second you’re anything more than a warm body to park in this shithole. I’m sure they don’t.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: The hell did you say!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: The owner’s got better things to do than meet with the likes of you. Go on, pass the word along to your yakuza handlers. Tachibana Real Estate’s handling this case.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: You talk an awful big game for a fucking real estate agent.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: You have your message. We’re done here, Tsuji-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Oda and Kiryu are leaving the building.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Well, that went about as well as it could’ve.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Heh, awfully rough negotiations there. You forget your precious business etiquette back at the coffee shop?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: There’s a time and a place for everything. Besides, that squatter trash Tsuji isn’t who we’re actually dealing with here. Step one is to bring them to the table.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: “Them” meaning the yakuza backing him?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Yup. End of the day, they’re in this for the money. Once we can get past pretenses, we should both be eager to get this deal done.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [A three men comes up to them.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What do these guys want?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Not the sharpest knife, are you, Kiryu-kun? Say hello to our real negotiation partners. More punctual than I expected.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: You two with Tachibana Real Estate? I heard you’re here on Yamanoi-san’s behalf.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: And who might you be?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Oh, friends of yours… That squatter in the Sugita Building giving you any trouble?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Sure, a bit.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: We’d be happy to go have a little chat with him. He’ll be packed up and moved out in no time.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: I’m sure. And how much are you asking for the pleasure of your negotiating services?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Straight to business. That’s Kamurocho realty for you. Let’s see… Seven mil should cover it. Sell a building that size, you’re looking at 100 million yen in profit. Seven’s downright reasonable, wouldn’t you say?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: The guy parks himself in a room for a few days and you’re quoting seven million? Seems like a lot of easy money.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: We’re both making easy money here, aren’t we? These days, you real estate fat cats are tripping over your piles of cash.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Doesn’t mean we’re sharing any of it with you. And yet… You’re still going to go chat with our squatter friend.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Huh. And how exactly do you figure that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Oh, by force, of course. Isn’t that right, Kiryu-kun?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda… was this your plan from the start?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Pretty much. Why, is this too overwhelming for a rookie’s first day on the job?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nah. Shouldn’t be a problem.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Psh, amateurs dicking me around… I’m adding a fee to that previous quote for wasting my time.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Heh, and just how much will that run us?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Three mil. That brings us to ten million yen! Now, pay up!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu kicks their asses.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Bastards… Nobody pulls this shit and gets away with it!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: I’m gonna remember your two, smug-ass faces. Heh heh…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What family are you with?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Tojo Clan… Taihei Association.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Taihei Association? So you’re his boys. Dojima Family Lieutenant, Hiroki Awano.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Too late to unfuck yourselves now. You made the wrong enemies. All you can do now is wait for the hammer to fall!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [They’re running away.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Kamurocho’s got more yakuza than friggin’ stars in the sky, and we had to bump into a Dojima man’s goons. That certainly makes things messier.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: ‘Course, the moment we started going after the Empty Lot, we were bound to butt heads with them anyway. This can serve as a friendly greeting between our two organizations, hm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He notices a guy in a corner shaking in fear.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Heyyy, it’s our favorite squatter, Tsuji-san!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: Y-Yeah…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He tries to escape but fails.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: If you’re still eager to stick around up there, I’m happy to continue our conversation where we left off…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: Urg…Yeah, no, that’s…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Your backup is, well, you can see for yourself. Care to make a stand by your lonesome, Tsuji-san?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: N-No, sir! Wouldn’t dream of it!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Oh, good. Then be out of that room tonight. If he finds you there tomorrow morning, there’s no telling what Kiryu-kun here might do.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tsuji
Text: I-I’ll be out tonight! And I’m s-sorry for any trouble!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s running away trying not to shit his pants.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So this is how you do business.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: It’s not all me. Everything I know, I learned from the boss. Not bad, for your first job. How was it for you? A lot easier than yakuza work, huh? And having people actually thank you for doing it has gotta be refreshing.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That’s not the point. I didn’t join the yakuza because I thought it would be fun, or for people’s gratitude.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Hm? Wait, don’t tell me you’re planning on going back to the yakuza after we land the Empty Lot.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I honestly haven’t thought that far ahead.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Fair enough.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Back to the present, what do we do next?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Right. We chased off our squatter, now let’s have you go report in to old man Yamanoi. Once that’s done, come meet me at Serena. It’s a place near here on Tenkaichi Street.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Serena? What is it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Just a cozy little bar. Relax, this time it’s pleasure, not business. I figured we’d have a little post-work drink to celebrate. My treat.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Surprisingly generous of you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Sure is. In return, you’re giving Yamanoi-san a solo report. He’s a hardcore bowler. Got his own ball, the whole shebang. I’d head to Mach Bowl. You’ll probably find him there.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Mach Bowl. Got it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: See you in a few, man.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s leaving.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Yamanoi’s at Mach Bowl, just up ahead.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Toady
Text: Eh, that old geezer Yamanoi’s too stubborn for his own good.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Toady
Text: Barely any properties left to his name, and the old cuss still won’t back down, even with all the ‘encouragement” you’ve given him.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Man of Wealth
Text: You said it. I’m hoping a few bruised ribs will serve as a reminder the next time he forgets his place. Though my bet is, there won’t be a next time.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Toady
Text: Once Yamanoi’s out of the game, you]l have that entire patch of the city to yourself, Shitara-san. It’s not hard to see why people call you the Leisure King.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Leisure King
Text: Heh, I expect you’re right. Good thing, too. This’ll earn me some real bragging rights with the rest of the Five Billionaires.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Leisure King? Five Billionaires?]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Leisure King bumping into Kiryu.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Leisure King
Text: Oof!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Toady
Text: Asshole! What the hell’re you standing there for!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Leisure King
Text: Easy, bucko. It’s no problem. I’ve already hit my quota on beatdowns for the day. My fists could use a break after that last session. Besides, I’m the magnanimous type. I’ll let you off the hook this time, buddy. It’s like they say: the hungry fight, the wealthy forgive.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Leisure King
Text: Heh…! Quite the mean mug you’ve got, friend. So long. And don’t ever stand in my way again… Let’s roll.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Toady
Text: Y-Yessir!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Who the hell was that? His little pet called him the “Leisure King” with a straight face… They definitely mentioned Yamanoi, though, and I don’t like what I heard. I’ll need to check up on him right away.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He finds Mr. Yamanoi lying on the sidewalk.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yamanoi-san? Hey! You all right!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Ngh… Kiryu-san? Did you… Did you have any trouble getting that unit cleared out?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: It’s handled. Forget that, are you okay? You need me to get you to a doctor?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: No. I’m all right. Could you help me to the Sugita Building?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Of course.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu brings Mr. Yamanoi to his apartment.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
