Text: Sorry to trouble you. I appreciate the help. And it sounds like you resolved the matter with the squatter, too.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: It’s no trouble. Forget that, are you sure you’re all right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Yes, thank you. It’s really nothing too severe. Haha-- Ohhh, that’s tender…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Help me understand. What the heck happened?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: There’s a group of men looking to drive me out of business. I’ve been refusing their demands for some time now, and this is what it bought me. Haha…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: This group of guys who have it out for YOU… They’re not related to someone called the Leisure King, are they?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: What? Kiryu-san, where did you hear that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I had a little run-in with the guy on my way to see you. He was talking about driving you out, beating you down… Rough stuff. I just put two and two together.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: I see…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What’s his deal? Who is this guy?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: The Leisure King is a tycoon who made his fortune running pachinko parlors and other attractions. Now he’s one of the Five Billionaires.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Five Billionaires?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: A group of five men. Between them, it’s said they move more money around Kamurocho than anyone else. There’s the Leisure King, the Pleasure King, the Electronics King, the Gambling King, and the Media King. They’ve been snatching up every property in Kamurocho they can. And when their overwhelming capital can’t seal a deal, they use violence and extortion through the thugs they’ve bought.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: How did I not know about these guys? This is all news to me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: The lot of them have sliced Kamurocho up into five areas, each dominion claimed by its respective king. The Leisure King has it out for my business because I’m an obstacle to him completing his monopoly of the Tenkaichi Street area. I have a few key holdings in the area, you see. He’s eager to take them from me, so he made a show of force.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Got it. So it’s not you they care about, it’s your properties. Why go that far, though? What do they need all these buildings for?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: For profit, in a word. To play their little money game. In this bizarre boom economy we’re in, every property you flip nets major profits. Money’s growing on trees, especially here in Asia’s biggest pleasure district. Those five are preparing to play financial chess, so right now they’re all desperate to secure the strongest pieces.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Properties as chess pieces, huh? What about the hardworking people on the board trying to live their lives in peace?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: I agree, of course. But those five give no thought to anything but their own bottom line. The lives of their tenants and the state of Kamurocho don’t factor in at all. Their games have already ruined the lives of so many. I want to stop them, if such a thing is even possible. At first glance, you’d think this economy has made Japan a more prosperous place. But I believe someday this upward trend will end, and that it all might come crashing down. If that happens--if Kamurocho keeps serving as the board for these men to play their money games on--it’ll end up a wasteland, stripped completely bare.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: I’ve shared the better part of my life with this city. I love Kamurocho. I don’t want to see it end that way. That’s why I’ve been fighting them for so long, but… I’m afraid this old body just can’t take any more. I’ve reached my limit.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Don’t say that. Can’t you hang on just a little longer? The city of Kamurocho deserves better than to get torn apart by a pack of hyenas like them.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Believe me, I’m right there with you in wanting to take the city back from them and restore Kamurocho to the way it was. But the Five Billionaires have more money than you or I can imagine, and no compunction about using violence to get what they want. I can’t say the same for myself.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Damn… So there’s nothing we can do about it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: …… Heheheh…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Maybe just one thing.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: And what’s that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Kiryu-san… it’s you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: You have the physical strength to match their goons, and a strong sense of uncompromising justice. You also have the personal skills to minimize loss and resolve conflict. Take the matter with that squatter. You solved a problem I couldn’t handle, in no time flat. If you were to take over this office… it’s possible we might just be able to take a stand against them.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That’s crazy talk. You’re giving me way too much credit. I have no business skills at all, and even less experience.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Everyone has to start somewhere. You needn’t overthink this. And as part of me asking you this favor, I’m committed to supporting you in every way that I’m able. Don’t worry. Besides, you’re looking to learn about real estate, aren’t you? This endeavor is sure to be an invaluable experience. Besides, if you fail, so be it. As it stands now, it’s simply a matter of time before this office folds.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Still… There has to be somebody out there better qualified for the job than me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: I think you overestimate the number of men like you out there, Kiryu-san. Besides, I trust you. More than you know.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Why is that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Kiryu-san… You’re acquainted with a man by the name of Shintaro Kazama, yes?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Huh!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: I hear you grew up in a facility Kazama-san operates. That makes him a sort of father figure to you, I would imagine. And you’ve kept that sense of gratitude toward him, honoring your debt even after swearing an oath to the Dojima Family.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: How… Where did you get all this?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: I’ve been looking for a man I can trust. Tachibana-san recommended you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Yes. He was kind enough to share your story with me, under the condition it remain strictly confidential, of course.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Which means Tachibana’s already signed off on this crazy proposal of yours?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Correct. I expect Tachibana-san also believes that you are the right man to take on this role.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You… From the way you’re talking, it sounds like you know Kazama personally. What’s your connection to him?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Heh heh, that’s ancient history now… I can’t give you too many details, but I can tell you this. Kazama-san is the man I trust most in this world. Enough to make me believe I can trust everything I own to a man who respects him, and who so closely resembles him in his youth. You have his clear eyes and piercing gaze.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Can I ask this favor of you, Kiryu-san? Kamurocho needs a man like you now.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: All right… If you’re that sure, I’ll do my best. It’ll be a learning experience, at the very least. Just… don’t blame me if everything falls apart.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Of course. I’m honored to be working with you on this, Kiryu-san! Right, no time like the present. Let’s get you up to speed on the basics of our business. But, hmm. It’s a bit distracting with the place in such a shambles. I’ll call my secretary to help me straighten up.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Secretary? Didn’t know you had one.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Oh, yes. I’ll introduce you later. She’s quite the charmer, and I think you’ll agree, Kiryu-san. So, can I ask you to step out for a bit while I get the office put together? It shouldn’t take too long.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: All right. (Yamanoi’s cleaning up his office. I should go for a stroll and then check back in later.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu’s pager beeps…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: “89” is “all set” and “01104” is “come by.” Guess he’s done cleaning the Sugita Building.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s going back to Mr. Yamanoi. He meets some girl at the apartment.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Female Voice
Text: Kiryu-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Marina
Text: Pleased to meet you. I’m Marina, Yamanoi-san’s secretary. I look forward to working with you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: R-Right. Kiryu. Good to meet you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: What do you think, Kiryu-san? The place looks great, doesn’t it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, it’s… incredible.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Now, how about I walk you through some business basics? Is this a good time?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Sure, sounds good.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: In that case, I’ll let my secretary take it from here.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Marina
Text: There’s a lot to remember, but if you forget anything, you can ask me anytime. For now, I’ll walk you through the whole process once.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [She explains the basics of doing business.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Marina
Text: I think that about covers it. Did you follow all that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I think so.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Marina
Text: Then let’s get to it. Please give the order to begin collections for our current property holdings.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu is making some changes in Kimorocho.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Marina
Text: You gave that collections order like a pro! Now you just need to relax for a bit, and that cash will come flowing in. Oh, and Yamanoi-san left me some funds to serve as your initial operating capital. I’ll give that to you now.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [You received ¥15,000,000.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: This is a fortune. Are you sure?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Of course. That nest egg and Yurizake down on the first floor of this building are my little sendoff to you. Please, use them with my blessing. Though relying on a single shop’s profits is putting a lot of eggs in one basket. Why not buy another with that cash? If you want a solid starter, I’d recommend Sukiyaki Muranaka, on Tenkaichi Street. It’s a pretty popular spot, but still a comparatively affordable acquisition.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: All right, I’ll go have a look.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [First, I’ll check out the place Yamanoi-san told me about.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s going to the restaurant to see him in person.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Sukiyaki Muranaka… It’s the main outpost of an old school sukiyaki restaurant. They’re always booked solid with reservations. What should I do?]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He buys the restoration.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’ll make an offer… in cash!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Marina
Text: Ooh, welcome back. Looks like you acquired a new property! Also, those collections you ordered are in. The money is ready and waiting for you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Looks like those profits are in. This is exactly when you need to keep watch for one of the Five Billionaires picking a Money Battle. If you lose in that Money Battle, you’ll lose ownership of a property, so be sure that you always appoint a manager.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Right, got it. though. It’s definitely a lot to keep in your head,

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Haha, true, but I’m sure you’ll have it soon, Kiryu-san. Basically, you want to expand your holdings, grow those properties, and enhance your personnel roster. That will build your share and earn you greater profits. The bigger we get by repeating that process, the closer we’ll be to shutting down the Five Billionaires.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Right, I’m on it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Oh, one other thing. I’m leaving it up to you how to spend any profits and operating capital. In this line of work, you end up spending money in all sorts of ways. Invest wisely. That includes investing in yourself.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I don’t see how I’m going to spend this much money anytime soon, but thanks. I’ll use it well, I hope.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Marina
Text: Heh heh, I trust that you will, Mr. President!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Wait, I don’t remember becoming president.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Marina
Text: Hmm, no, but as a secretary it just feels natural to call the one making all the business calls “the president.” Doesn’t that feel really secretary-ish to you?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Does it? I wouldn’t really know. But Yamanoi-san’s the president here, isn’t he?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yamanoi
Text: Well, yes, officially… But what’s the harm? If Marina-san wants to call you that, I say let her.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Marina
Text: This is actually my first gig as a secretary, so I’m eager to be as secretary-ish as possible!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oh, you’re a first-timer at this too? What did you used to do before Yamanoi-san hired you?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Marina
Text: Heheh! That’s a big, juicy secret.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Y-Yeah…? Okay then. I don’t really care what you call me, so knock yourself out.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Marina
Text: Yay! Then let’s aim for the top here, Mr. Prez!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Right… (She seems capable enough, but she’s a little… odd. I see a lot of headaches in my future. Ah, well. I agreed to do this. I’m going all in.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s coming out of the building.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Whew… Okay, I was going to meet Oda for that drink. He said the place was called Serena, on Tenkaichi Street.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu walks into the building and takes the elevator. A woman meets him at the entrance.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Woman
Text: Welcome.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No, I…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Woman
Text: Hm? Is this your first visit, sir?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Y-Yeah.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Woman
Text: Have a seat anywhere you like.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No, I’m waiting for someone.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama’s Voice
Text: Relax a little, would you?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Yo.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Why are you here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: What, I’m not allowed to have a usual spot? This place is my number-one favorite right now. Right, Reina?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Friend f yours, Nishikiyama-kun? Oh, this is THE Kiryu-san?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: …I suppose I am?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Wow, I finally get to meet you! I’ve been hoping I’d get the chance. Nishikiyama-kun, he won’t stop talking about you… especially after the first drink. Right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Hey, he doesn’t need to know that! Whatever. Why don’t you have a seat, Kiryu? Heh, talk about surprises. What are the odds?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No kidding. You come here often?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Yeah, I guess. The family higher-ups still haven’t found this place, so I can actually relax while I drink. I was planning to bring you here soon.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Guess I saved you the trouble.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Oh, didn’t you say you were meeting somebody here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kityu
Text: Yeah, Oda from Tachibana Real Estate. I would’ve figured he’d beat me here, but…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Oda-san hasn’t been by yet. Here you are. The first drink is on me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Heh, it was supposed to be on Oda.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Uh Oh. I’m not getting the sense you’re a big spender.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Hey, just you wait, the two of us are rising stars!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: I’d love to meet Yumi-chan, too. Bring her by next time.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: She’s still in school. Actually, if you really want to meet her, you should offer her a part-time job.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Whoa, you want Yumi working as a hostess in this town?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Don’t you think she’d be great at it? Even back at Sunflower, she had all the older guys charmed.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Sounds like another rising star, then.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tch… You could be right.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: You sound like Yumi-chan’s father, Kiryu-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Aw, at least tell the poor guy he sounds like her brother.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Haha, my mistake.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Some time passes…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: I gotta say, your Tachibana Real Estate buddy… Oda, right? He’s certainly taking his sweet time.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu doesn’t answer.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: What do you want to do? Grab another round?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No, I’ll wait. Would be rude to get plastered on my own before the guy who’s buying even shows up.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Oh? Listen to you, starting to sound like a responsible salaryman.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You make it sound like this is some weird ritual. It’s just basic manners. Common courtesy.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Yeah, and since when have you had that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Heh, wise-ass.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Hey, in that case, how about a round of karaoke?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Ooh, hell yeah! I’m singing!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Idiot. How is him walking in on that any more respectful than drinking? Besides, we did karaoke just the other day.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Then you can just sit there and listen while I rock it! No complaints then, right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: I think even a businessman’s allowed to cut loose a little after work. Just sing, I’m sure Oda-san will turn up.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tch, if you’re gonna twist my arm…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Sweet! In that case, let’s get right to it! Music, START!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Nishiki sings a song and Kiryu claps his hands.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: How was THAT!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Amazing, Nishikiyama-kun! You sounded like a pro!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Right? Right!? And for all your bellyaching you were pretty into it, too!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Ha, I was only doing it to humor you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Riiight. You’re so full of it. I could tell how bad you wanted a mic in your hands.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oh, come off it. Sheesh.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Anyway, this Oda cat is SERIOUSLY late by now. From how you talk about him, he doesn’t seem like the flaky type.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Really. I hope he hasn’t been in an accident or anything.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [The door to the bar opens.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Welco-- (freezing in terror]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Oda goes to the bar. He’s covered in blood, and that blood is not someone else’s. He’s falling to the floor.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Five yakuza come out of the elevator with… Hiroki Awano.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Yo. You’re lookin’ well.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Awano… Sir.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Why are you here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Sit down, Nishikiyama. These boys look familiar to you, Kiryu?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Still haven’t properly thanked you for before, Kiryu-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You were with that squatter… You guys did this to Oda?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Not before you got in the way of our business. (takes out Oda’s card) Tachibana Real Estate’s been pecking at the Tojo Clan from the shadows for awhile now. And you join ‘em, fresh outta the family? You got any sense of gratitude at all?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza 2
Text: Boss. Let me handle this.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: You know this guy? One of mine, name’s Okabe. That squatter was his deal, and look how that turned out.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [We see that Okabe has a hand wrapped and no pinkie.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Poor bastard wound up having to take responsibility on account of your meddling.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: The fuck did you do this time?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Lackeys shouldn’t interrupt.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Awano hits Nishiki’s face against the table. Nishiki’s nose begins to bleed.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Hey, I’m having a nice little chat with this civilian here. Got it, Nishikiyama? Bitchass punk like you should keep his mouth shut.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishikiyama’s got nothing to do with this. I just ran into him here by chance.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Don’t worry, I’m gettin’ back to you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Yo, boss! Can we ice this guy already or not? Just lookin’ at his ugly ass is makin’ me sick!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Sure. But don’t make any trouble for the locals. Take it outside, boys. I’ll be here grabbin’ a drink with Nishikiyama. And this hot number of a mama.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Okabe
Text: Let’s go, Kiryu.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’ll be right back.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [The Yakuza are taking Kiryu outside.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Now how’s about we have some fun here? Eh, Nishikiyama?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Okabe
Text: Way I see it, you musta lost your goddamn mind. Not two steps out the family door and you’re pissin’ all over it. Your little stunt cost us our cut of ten million yen. You got a death wish, that’s on you. But find a way out that doesn’t dick over the rest of us just doing our jobs.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Okabe
Text: Why’re you still standing? Get on the ground! Hands and knees! You even understand the position you’re in, dipshit!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I think there’s been a misunderstanding.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Okabe
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I have no intention of apologizing to you. No reason to let you slap me around, either.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Okabe
Text: You wanna fight us? Seriously? Heh, you’re a laugh a minute, kid. Go on, take a swing. Don’t keep me waiting… ‘cause this is the last line in the sand. Lieutenant Awano’s right upstairs. Came out here in person. If you’re ready to do this with him around, well… I’d say you got balls, but no damn brains.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: My friends are bleeding.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Okabe
Text: Right, Nishikiyama and that Tachibana Real Estate buddy of yours? Heh, that guy coughed up your whereabouts after just a couple minutes.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu hits him in the face.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Okabe
Text: Nghff! …Son of a bitch!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Screw your line in the sand. You crossed that a while ago. Bring it on!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He gets mad and beats them with his bare hands.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Okabe
Text: K-Kiryu… You son of a…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Awano’s coming down.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Heh, so the kid can throw a punch after all. No wonder Kuze was havin’ trouble. You’ve gotten way more yakuza since leavin’ the family. Funny how that shit works.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You want next?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: …Try me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu attacks, but Awano easily blocks the strike.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Krgh!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Kiryu, c’mon… Why’re you with Tachibana Real Estate?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Not like I don’t already know. Captain Kazama’s orders, no? Only reason I dragged my ass out here on a job like this is ‘cause I heard you were wrapped up with Tachibana now. You, Captain Kazama’s little pet. Far as I’m concerned, it looks an awful lot like Kazama’s using Tachibana Real Estate to make a move on the Empty Lot. Whaddya say? Am I right, or am I right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Think whatever you want.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Heh, you’re pretty shit at hiding things. Way I see it, that’s all part of your charm though, eh? Has Tachibana found the lot’s owner yet?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu stand silent.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Not yet, huh? But he’s at least got a clue by now.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I haven’t said a word.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Didn’t have to. Your eyes tell me everything I wanna know. I love how easy to read you are.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I don’t have time for this.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Hey, Kiryu. Set me up with a meeting with your boss over at Tachibana Real Estate. He’s been doing a good job stayin’ hidden. Having you arrange it seems like the quickest route to the guy.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I left the Dojima Family. I’ve got no reason to do you any favors now.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: You do this for me and we’ll forget about this squatter business. And the fact that you and Kazama made a move on the Empty Lot. Or would you rather paint a big ol’ target on your back? Every crew under the Dojima Family’d be gunnin’ for you. Now don’t think you could run away to prison. We’d stay on your ass till you drew your last breath, wherever you hide. And don’t think for a damn second it’d be a quick death.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Take your best shot.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Heh, you got your brain plugged in as I’m tellin’ you this? This shit doesn’t end with you. After you’re in the dirt, we move to your next of kin. Nishikiyama, your bro. You keep this up, he’s collateral damage. Your damage. Do the guy a favor.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: And you… What do you plan to do if you meet Tachibana?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Beat every bit of intel he’s got on the Empty Lot outta him. That’s all. Well, that, and send a message to outsiders who wanna meddle with shit that don’t concern ‘em.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Meaning… have him killed?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: I’ll give you till morning to decide. Hand over Tachibana, or die in his place. Take your pick and call me tonight. If I don’t hear from you… the hunt’s on. We’ll be coming for your head, to add to the collection.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [We’re going back to the bar. Oda lies on the couch. Raina tries to wash the blood off him.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Mama, that’s enough, thanks… Sorry for the trouble.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Oda-san…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu enters.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Kiryu. I’m sorry, bro. I didn’t do a damn thing to help you out.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No, it should be me apologizing. I went and got you involved. …Sorry.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Hey… What are you gonna do now? That Awano guy… told you to give up the boss, didn’t he?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Awano mentioned it while you were busting heads downstairs. The Dojima Family is kicking off an all-hands search for the president of Tachibana Real Estate.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: He “suggested” I start trying to convince you too. He wants to make sure you know, giving up Tachibana’s the only way you get out of this alive.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: C’mon. The boss is going around town right now, digging up enough info to get your ass off the hook for that murder. You planning to serve his head up to Dojima on a platter?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You stay outta this!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Excuse you?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: If not Tachibana, it’ll be Kiryu’s head on that plate! With the whole Dojima Family on the hunt, there’s no escape!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: But it’s fine with you that Tachibana has to die?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You shitheads are the ones who dragged Kiryu into this!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Ease off. He’s been hurt, Nishiki. Besides, I already knew I’d be making an enemy of the Dojima Family, eventually. Just happened sooner rather than later.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You’re seriously planning to go head-to-head with them? You’ve gotta be outta your fucking mind! Not even Kazama-san could have known things would get this bad!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Yeah, you might actually have a point there… Even Tachibana was planning to have the Empty Lot in his pocket long before going to war with the Dojima Family. To Dojima, that little plot’s worth more than a billion yen. Play that trump card right, and we could buy control over a huge chunk of Kamurocho. We’d be a force even the Dojima Family couldn’t shuffle out of the deck so easily. But now… We never figured the Dojima lieutenants would force our hand this early in the game.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You guys underestimated Awano. You can’t lump him in with a brute like Kuze. He’s actually pretty sharp.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: I need to talk to the president. Mama, can I use your phone?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Reina’s giving him a cordless phone.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: There’s gotta be some way everybody gets out of this alive. If we can pin down the Empty Lot’s owner, we get the chips to bargain with the Dojima Family on our terms.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You better be right.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Sir, it’s Oda. I’m with Kiryu, in a bar called Serena. Yes, sir. So then Dojima’s man Awano told Kiryu to hand you over to them, or die. That’s right. They know we’re after the Empty Lot. Which is why… Sir, you need to hide. Fast. I don’t think we can trust Kiryu anymore. He might sell you out to Dojima.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Hey, hang on a goddamn minute!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: It’s fine, Nishiki.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: But he--

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Heh heh, that solves that… Now even I don’t know where the boss is going to be.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Shit!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Nothing personal.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Sorry for all the trouble, mama. I know all that must have been frightening.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: You’re worrying about me? Forget it… What are you going to do now?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Thinking a little bit, Kiryu turning around and leaving.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Hey wait, Kiryu! What the hell are you planning!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Panicking now won’t get me anywhere. I knew when I left the family that I’d be walking this path alone. I’ll nab Kuze, and then clear my name. Back to square one.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You idiot. You really think you’re in any position to pull that kind of stunt off now?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Doesn’t matter… It’s still my only option.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s leaving the bar.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Back to clearing my name, huh… Come to think of it, I still haven’t been back to give the Empty Lot a proper once-over. The cops may have cleared out by now. Could be worth going to take a look.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Going into Empty Lot, he remembers the guy he killed at the beginning of the game. Suddenly someone comes up behind him…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana… Why are you here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: The police have thoroughly scoured this place top to bottom. Any evidence that may be linked to the real culprit is gone.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I know that much…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I have looked into Kuze using my network. If he is really the one who framed you, he must have hired a killer to perform this hit. And yet… Kuze left no sign of any such activity.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Meaning what?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Meaning that the one responsible for setting you up is not likely to be him. Someone other than Kuze is behind this.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: That is all the information I have at present. I wanted to pass that on to you in person.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You came here just to tell me that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Yes. But please do not worry. I have no intention of disappearing from Kamurocho. I did think that it would take the Dojima Family a while longer to catch on to our activities, but the situation is still well within expected tolerances.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda sure didn’t seem to think so.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I have yet to inform Oda-san of this, but as it happens, I have located the owner of the Empty Lot.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Though for various reasons, I have yet to make contact. Regardless, if we can find them and acquire the Empty Lot, the Dojima Family will come to us, hat in hand, begging us to sell it. Such is the power this plot can wield. Which is why, Kiryu-san, I must insist that you stay alive until we can broker such a deal.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu is silent.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Or does that seem an unreasonable request?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: How long until you can pin down the lot’s owner?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Give me one day. I must ask, however, that you tell no one. Not even Nishikiyama-san or Kashiwagi-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You realize I could just sell you out to Awano, and get taken off the Dojima hit list altogether.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: If you were the sort of man to do that, I certainly would not be visiting you in such a place as this. I will get in touch with you tomorrow. Until then, please stay safe and out of the Dojima Family’s hands, Kiryu-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s leaving.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (All I can do now is wait for word from Tachibana. Better head home and lie low there.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Walking out of the lot, he sees a few scumbags harassing a chubby young man dressed in funny green suit.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mugging Thug
Text: Whoa there, buddy. Not so fast. You planning to just waltz past without a word? You want through here, you gotta pay the toll.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Young Man

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (A shakedown? I feel bad for the guy, but I can’t really afford to get involved right now.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mugging Thug
Text: Oi! You mute or something, blondie? If you don’t wanna get hurt, let’s see some cash already!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Young Man
Text: Hoho, if you insist… Just be sure you pick it all up, hmm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mugging Thug
Text: Eh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Young Man
Text: Huzzah!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s scattering a pack of bills.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mugging Thug
Text: Wh-Whoooa! It’s MONEY! Right on! I’ve never seen so much dough in one place!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mugging Thug 2
Text: Whoa, HEY! I had my hand on that one first! Keep yer grubby mitts off MY dough!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mugging Thug
Text: Shut up! And move your freakin’ leg!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Young Man
Text: Ohoho! My, my. Peasants truly are a sordid lot.  Hm? Oho, did you want some of my money as well?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Young Man
Text: Then I shall be on my merry way. Till next time, cheers.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Wait… Do you always throw wads of cash just to clear the road like that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Young Man
Text: But of course. Why?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: At the point you cough up the money, it’s no different from getting mugged.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Young Man
Text: Hohoo, I suppose commoners just can’t understand.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Excuse me?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: You see, when you’re not just wealthy, but OBSCENELY rich, physical capital is like dust. It just accumulates. Gets in the way, really. That was loose change. I won’t miss it. On the other hand, having my precious time wasted by base ruffians like them is a serious loss. If I can buy that time back with coin, why, I’ll pay as much as it takes.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Buying time, literally…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: Precisely so. Why not give it a try, if you’re curious?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Um. Give what a try?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: Let fly with a great whopping wad of wealth.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oh, no, I wouldn’t… I’m just not in that big a rush, honestly.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: Hm? Truly, have you never been out on a stroll and felt the other pedestrians were in your way? Not ever?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Well… Sure, I guess a few times.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: Hoho, you see? Then give it a try right now. I’m sure you’ll feel the thrill of sending those human hurdles scattering.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hm. Sure, but I don’t have that much cash to burn on a whim.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: Not to worry! I will be your financier this one time, as a special gift. You need focus only on enjoying the rush of flinging cash confetti.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Okay, deal. If you’re really going to pay for it, I’ll give it a go.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s trying to attract women and avoid fights with the new Cash Confetti ability.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: Ohhh, truly magnificent money-blasting! For a moment I completely forgot you were merely another plebian.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hrm, is that what being rich is like? Honestly, I can’t say it feels very good to waste it like that.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: Perhaps, but aren’t there times when you’re far too hurried to be embroiled in the petty squabbles of the underclass?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That’s not… Okay, yeah.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: Right? Really, whoever said “time is money” is an utter buffoon. Time is the far more precious resource. It’s finite.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Fair enough. I can see a weird sort of logic to that.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: Then I’ve made my case. Take my advice--if you’re ever in danger of being dragged into a meaningless fight, just let loose with a heaping helping of legal tender.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So, you’re clearly loaded. But how’d you earn all that cash?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: Hoh, I take it you’ve caught a case of money fever, hmm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Maybe. I’m just thinking it’d be convenient if there was a quick way to make some extra money. Common sense tells me that’s crazy to wish for, but I might as well ask.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: Oh, but there is.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Seriously!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: The very epitome of high-risk, high-return. It’s been my golden goose, and now I dine on diamond foie gras.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: “It” being…?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: Head for Theater Square. If you’re truly a man of means, you’ll find your way from there.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What am I looking for?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: Oh, you’ll know it when you see it. A paradise exclusively reserved for the upper echelons of wealth and taste.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: Though naturally that isn’t my only source of income. I’ve quite the diverse portfolio. I--or should I say, WE--put most of our capital to work in a certain system that gives rise to considerable profits. If you wish to hear more about that as well, drop by “Vincent. ” You’ll find me there most of the time.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Vincent… Got it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Mr. Moneybags – Fukushima
Text: This has been a most stimulating use of my time. Ta-ta. (leaves]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Tachibana may have new intel tomorrow, but that doesn’t mean everything will be over then. I should tuck away as much cash as I can now so I’m ready for whatever comes. He said I’d find a way to make big money at Theater Square. It’s worth a look…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Tachibana’s supposed to get in touch tomorrow, but… am I really supposed to just sit here until then? There may still be something I can do. I’ll hit the streets for info in the morning. It’s fair to expect the family will be looking for me, and if they find me, there’s no getting around a fight. They’ll be coming for me with guns blazing. Better make sure I’m ready now, before things go down. …Anything left I should do before hitting the sack? Getting some sleep now’s part of being ready for tomorrow.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Keiji Shibusawa
Text: It’s dawn. Kiryu’s not giving up Tachibana.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Get me Chief Dojima on the phone. Boss. It’s Awano. About what we discussed… I’m gonna have to end Kiryu. He wouldn’t sell Tachibana out. And the Dojima Family doesn’t tolerate ingrates. Yeah. Yeah… Got it.  No objections from you, right? Kuze?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Daisaku Kuze
Text: I don’t see why you’re asking me. You’re point man on this one. I’m just the infantry here.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Aw, don’t be like that, bro. I’m tryin’ to make sure I treat everyone fair.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He takes a picture of Kazama, Kiryu and Nishikiyama and shoots her face down.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Speakin’ of. I assume I got the Kazama Family’s understanding on this too? Kashiwagi-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Osamu Kashiwagi
Text: And what do you mean by that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: We wouldn’t be dealin’ with this mess if Cap’n Kazama hadn’t brought Kiryu in. If the Dojima Family’s gotta take him out now… Only right that every last man in the Kazama Family should hunt harder than anyone else. Am I wrong?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Osamu Kashiwagi
Text: No, sir. It’s precisely as you say.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Keiji Shibusawa
Text: Then, let the hunt begin.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Alright.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He glances to Kuze.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Daisaku Kuze
Text: Listen up! You find Kiryu and you bring him here! He doesn’t get to die just yet. I want him alive, on his knees in front of me!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Those present in the Yakuza’s office take orders from their commander. Nishikiyama looks at Kashiwagi. He nods. We’re back to Kiryu.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (If I’m gonna look into the case while I wait for Tachibana to get in touch, I should stick to places without a lot of people around. And even then, I should be ready to run into Dojima’s men at any moment.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [When Kiryu walks into the alley, a few yakuza come up to him.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: Go. Get as many guys as you can. Tell ‘em we found Kiryu.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Subordinate
Text: Yessir.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Guess nowhere’s safe in the city now…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: You gotta know how this ends for you, Kiryu! Struggling’s only gonna make it hurt worse. This place’ll be swarming with Dojima crew in a minute. You’re not going anywhere.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: And I’ve got no backup coming, so there’s no reason for me to hold back. Let’s just get to the fun part.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: You that desperate to delay your execution? Pathetic. A traitor like you should shut up and swallow his medicine!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu has to run down the alleys, kicking the asses of the Yakuza running up. ]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Did I lose them? I can’t keep this up forever. There’s too many of them…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Female Voice
Text: Hey.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Stripper
Text: The yakuza are after you, aren’t they? You stay out on the streets like that and they’ll find you in no time. If you wanted… you could step inside the club awhile.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Stripper
Text: The floorplan’s a little unconventional. Back doof Ieåds right into the sewers. You can get out from this part of town without anybody seeing you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Why are you helping me?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Stripper
Text: Because it’s the Dojima Family who’s after you. Those assholes think they own this town. You won’t find one honest person in Kamurocho who doesn’t hate those lowlifes. Besides, it’d be a waste to let the yakuza take out a hot young stud like you. But hey, if you’ve got a better offer, by all means.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Being able to move around underground would be huge… But can I trust her? This could be a trap, but I don’t have many options.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: All right, lead the way.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Stripper
Text: This way, sugar. And step lively, before they catch us.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu’s going down to the gutter.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You weren’t kidding about this place being unconventional. What do you need access to a place like this for?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Stripper
Text: I heard the previous owner wasn’t exactly the upstanding businessman type. I dunno what he was so afraid of, but he wanted a quiet escape route. Stinks, but them’s the breaks.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Where does it lead?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Stripper
Text: Theater Square, apparently. I never bothered to check myself. But it’s got to connect back up to street level somewhere. Not much use as a secret passage otherwise.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Stripper
Text: By now, the Dojima guys are probably all parked outside the club looking for you. Use this passage to pop up somewhere else and you’ll probably throw them off.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Let’s hope. And thanks, I owe you for this. Once I can walk around Kamurocho without being hunted down, I’ll come back as a paying customer.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Stripper

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu leaves.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Stripper
Text: Sorry, stud. I don’t think that day’s coming.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu runs down the gutter when he sees the light at the end of the tunnel. Someone on a motorcycle is driving at crazy speed towards him.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Daisaku Kuze
Text: KIRYUUU!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kuze strike Kiryu with an iron pipe, but doesn’t calculate the speed and flies off the bike himself.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Daisaku Kuze
Text: You asshole… You’re makin’ this fun.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: K-Kuze… So, that woman was one of yours.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Daisaku Kuze
Text: I’ll let you in on a little something. The yakuza game, it’s not like boxing. The man who gets beat down isn’t the loser. The guy who can’t tough it out to the end, he’s the one who loses. Eh? Don’t ya think?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu’s trying to get up. Looks like his arm and maybe his ribs are broken.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Daisaku Kuze
Text: In the yakuza life, there are no KO’s. I’ll tell you what, Kiryu. To me, a finger or two don’t mean shit. Having Awano or Shibusawa beat m to the captain’s spot? Couldn’t give a fuck… As long as I’m alive, I’ll keep getting back up for more. Which is why you… A half-ass like you’s the one thing I can’t stand. Now DIE, you little shit!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s hitting with a metal pipe, but Kiryu’s blocking the blow… with his bare hands. The epic battle begins. Kiryu in a burst of rage and adrenaline rashes a hail of blows on Kuse.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Daisaku Kuze
Text: Fuckin’ shit…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu picks up his iron pipe… there’s a very tense minute… and he throws it on the floor, turns around and leaves.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Daisaku Kuze
Text: Get back here!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu stops.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Daisaku Kuze
Text: You’ll regret this… Not killing me here, when you got the chance.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: It’s like you said before… I couldn’t hack it as a yakuza. I guess Kazama-san knew that. Knew it before I ever started… That’s why he didn’t want me joining up.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Daisaku Kuze
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: A real yakuza, though… That’s probably someone more like you. But even a guy like me’s got his own brand of pride. And I plan to sticking to it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Daisaku Kuze
Text: Kiryu. You little…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No matter how many times you stand up in my way.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu leaves and finds a way out of the gutter. They are given some kind of club. Fun dance music is played. A man and a girl dancing on the dance floor.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Where is this? Awano?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Been waitin’ for ya, Kiryu! Figures Kuze would come up short again.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What are you doing?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Use your eyes. I’m dancin’! Yeah! So, how come you didn’t call me yesterday? You had me waitin’ by the phone all night! Don’t just stand there looking bored, kid. Get your skinny ass over here. Dance with us, Kiryu!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Is that a joke? Aren’t you trying to kill me? If we’re done here, I’m going. I don’t have time to play with you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu is going to leave. Suddenly, the lights and music turn off.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Aww, hang on, Kiryu. I’m real grateful to you, y’know.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Grateful?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Both Captain Kazama AND Lieutenant Kuze… You’ve given me the ammo to take down two guys who’ve been standin’ in my way a long time. Far as I’m concerned, you’re my lucky charm. That’s my angle here, Kiryu. I want to help you out. Repay a little of that debt. Besides, it’s not like you got anywhere to run once you cut outta here. Why not hear me out first?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: All right, talk.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: You know, I was thinkin’ about a little while back, maybe just after you and Kuze threw down the first time? I went golfing. Koshu Country Club. Friggin’ gorgeous course.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What’s your point?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: You may not know this, but the food these golf spots serve is fan-fuckin’-tastic. 18 holes, then curry ‘n a sauna. Once you taste that, the rest of the world’s pleasures start feelin’ like a joke.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m not sticking around to talk hobbies. Get to the point.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Still young ‘n impatient. Y’know, the world’s chock fulla shit that don’t seem like it has any connection to anything, but then it turns out it’s real important in the long run. Anywho… So I was comin’ back from golf, and I took a little detour. Visited you ‘n Nishikiyama’s old place.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: After hearin’ Kazama was lookin’ after the joint, I figured it’d be nigh palatial, but nope. Was more like a kennel. Sunflower Orphanage. The geezer runnin’ it seemed lively, for his age.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Bastard. What did you do to Sunflower!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Whoa there, down boy. Relax, I ain’t done a thing. I told him I worked with Kazama and gave him some pocket change, maybe a million. Guy started crying. Sweet old man, that caretaker.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Awano, I swear…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Heh. You wouldn’t want to make an innocent guy like that sad because of somethin’ you did, wouldya?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Am I bein’ direct enough? Even if you make it outta here alive today, you got nowhere else to run. I know every li’l thing about you. ‘Bout your friends, where you live, where you grew up, even your favorite ramen joint. Look, it’s nothin’ personal. The Dojima Family’s always split up the responsibilities. The Kazama Family writes the script, the Kenno Clan’s the muscle. Boring paperwork’s Shibusawa’s game. And me…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He puts his hand on Kiryu’s shoulder.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: “Public relations.” Extortion’s my department. …Kiryu, I ain’t like ol’ Kuze. I couldn’t give two damp shits about livin’ like a proper yakuza. I wanna eat good food, wear nice clothes, and blast down the highway in a sweet-ass car. If I got a hot girl during that, so much the better. Being yakuza’s a career for me. A job. My means to enjoy the sweet life. Come over to my side, Kiryu. You gimme that real estate bum, Tachibana, and you’re on the winning team. Set for life on easy street. And if you don’t, you’ll die a painful, pointless death. You only just clawed your way outta that kennel with Nishikiyama, right? No reason to throw your life away now… Right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That’s your idea of extortion?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: What’re you--

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s taking Awano’s hand off his shoulder.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Fuckwad!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What a joke.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s leaving, but he stops when he hears the gunshot. Awano killed the girl he was dancing with.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: You’re about to join her! I got a hundred Dojima boys parked out front, all of ‘em packing heat. This may just be a job but I’m thorough with my work. So, what’s your move, Kiryu? Waltz out there and get ventilated? Or come and chase the dream with me? That call, it’s yours to make,

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Awano throws the gun aside.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: What’s it gonna be!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No decision to make. I’m out of here.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You may think you’ve shaken me up, but I don’t care if I live or die.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: You’re fulla dogshit.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You make your choices based on what’s fun or not. Me… I decide based on whether I love it or hate it. I’m going, and the reason’s simple-- I hate the idea of joining a guy like you,

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Kiryu, you cocky shit!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: In fact, I would rather get shot.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu’s leaving. After climbing the stairs, he breathes deeply before going outside, where a crowd of yakuza awaits him. However… There are only ordinary people on the street. Awano smokes a cigarette downstairs next to the girl’s corpse. ]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hiroki Awano
Text: Threats don’t work on a goddamn idiot. Shoulda seen that comin’…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu, meanwhile, is walking down the street. A car approaches him.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Kiryu!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Quick, get in. We’re boned if anyone sees you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: But…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Just get in! Keep your head down and stay low. I hoped I’d run into you if shadowed Awano. I got lucky.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki, you understand what you’re doing? Get involved and you’ll be a target, too.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Shut up! This is the last time I can help you out. They’ve got every inch of the city covered. Right now we’ve gotta get you out of Kamurocho.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Where are we going?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Out of Tokyo, for starters. Won’t keep you safe, but it’ll buy us some time.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [They’re driving till dark. Kiryu manages to sleep.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: We’re here, Kiryu.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki… Where are we?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Dunno. I just kinda kept driving.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He pulls out a cigarette.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Want one?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Thanks.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Nishiki’s going through his pockets looking for a lighter, but he can’t find it. Kiryu offers him his.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I was still bogarting it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [They’re smoking cigarettes. Kiryu gives Nishiki the lighter.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Keep it. I won’t ask for it back again.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That so?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu inhales and exhales the smoke.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Be sure to savor it. Brother…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [The camera moves to the right and we see a gun in Nishiki’s hands…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: That’s your last smoke. Make it count.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What are you doing? Isn’t this going a little far for a prank? Come on, bro. Put that thing away.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: JUST STOP! It’s too late. This is the only way!  How did it come to this, man? When did everything get so fucked?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
