Text: Are these the family’s orders, Nishiki?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: They’ve got nothing to do with it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Kiryu… You know what they do to guys who fuck with the family? Dojima’s crew are the experts when it comes to making examples. They know exactly how bad you can torture a guy before he goes… and they make damn sure it lasts! They’ll keep you clinging on… Make it hurt as bad, as LONG as possible! Make you watch while they dissect you. Then, when they’ve broken the last little part of you… The bodies of these guys they find… You can’t even tell they’re human anymore! I can’t let them do it, Kiryu…  I’m your sworn brother! I’m NOT watching you die like that! That’s what it means to cross the Dojima Family, Kiryu… Once they’re after you, you can never be free!  There’s no statute of limitations in the yakuza! You KNOW that! At this point, I’m through as a yakuza, too… And Kazama-san with us! But at least… At least I can keep you from dying in pain. I can end it for you, I can make it quick. That’s all I CAN do…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu drops his cigarette and turns around.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m sorry, bro. It’s my fault you’re being put through this. Brother. I’ve got one request. After you plug me… Bring my head back to them. Use it to fight your way to the top of the clan. Promise me. It’s up to you now.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Nishikiyama explodes with tears and backs off.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: What the hell…  Don’t look at me! Don’t look at me, Kiryu! Please!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Man the fuck up and do it! You can’t get to the top by crying!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Nishiki shoots, but misses because of his crying eyes.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What’s the problem? Aim carefully! I’m not dead yet.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Nishiki falls to his knees.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Can’t do it… How could I shoot you!? Without you, I’ll always be nothing. Can’t make it as a yakuza… No. I wouldn’t even still be alive now if I didn’t have you beside me! I’m just… If you’re not with me, I’m useless! Nothing means anything!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Me, too… We’re the same.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That means we’re both still just kids. Getting caught up in something way over our heads. Making trouble for Kazama-san… Thinking we can die and make it all better. Forget about whether I had what it took to be a yakuza. I wasn’t even a man yet.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Look at me. Talking all cool about ending it for you quick… I’m so fucking… pathetic.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Seriously. But, we can’t stay kids forever.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Kiryu, you and me, together we could--

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki. Forget you saw me today. I’ll forget all of this, too.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’ve gotta go.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Where? What are you gonna?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Back to Kamurocho. There’s still work I need to do there.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You can’t, Kiryu… They’ll kill you for sure.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No, this is the life you just gave me. I want to see for myself how far I can take it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki, let me do what I have to do. You and I end here. From this moment on… We are no longer sworn brothers.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: K-Kiryu!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I don’t want you having anything to do with me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu gets into Nishiki’s car and leaves. Nishiki is left to cry and scream in the middle of the forest at night.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Woman’s Voice
Text: Osaka’s Sotenbori, paradise of the night… Crowning it, the Cabaret Grand. Its manager, Goro Majima. But in the shadows of these neon lights, Majima’s fate is held in the vice grip of a man named Sagawa. Three years ago, Majima was a Kamurocho yakuza, but when he defied his boss’s orders, he was erased from the family, tortured, and banished. Now, as the price of his return to the yakuza, Sagawa orders him perform a hit. The name of Majima’ target-- Makoto Makimura. But when other yakuza appear and threaten her, Majima finds himself protecting the life he was hired to end. But there is no tolerance for killers who cannot kill, and his choice will surely have consequences…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima takes Makoto to some old warehouse.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Where are we?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Just get in.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He’s grabbing her hand and leading her sharply.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Wait!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sit.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: What is this place?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: A warehouse. Full of old sofas and stuff. Wander around and you’ll hurt yerself.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Uh… What’s going on? Why is all this happening to me?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: That’s the question, isn’t it now? Those yakuza were askin’ for you by name. You can’t tell me ya got no idea why.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: But I really don’t…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: The name “Makoto Makimura“… All the telephone club girls know it. They know Makoto’s lookin’ for a man with a bat tattoo. So, is that Makoto Makimura you? Or is it the big guy who was usin’ the name?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: It’s…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: It IS you? Then is THAT the reason those yakuza, are after you!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: I don’t know. I don’t… Who are you?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What, me? I’m a lost cause.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Can’t even take care of one person. I’m a joke of a…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: A joke of a what?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Of a hitman.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: No…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Makoto’s in shock. She’s barely holds back tears.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: All I was told was to kill a Makoto Makimura. Didn’t know it was a blind girl. But I ain’t the only one gunnin’ for ya. Just who the hell are you? What’s this bat tattoo? Why are ya lookin’ for this guy?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: No more! Where is Lee-san? Let me see Lee-san!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: The big guy’s… The yakuza who came to grab you shot him.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: He was shot!? But you said I’d see him soon…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [She tries to run away, but she stumbles over the tiles and falls. Majima catches her.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Relax. Dunno what his story is, but I know he avoided takin’ a bullet anywhere it’d kill him. Not enough blood loss to kill a guy.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto Makimura
Text: Really?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Once we’re done here I’ll take you to him. But first I need ya to tell me everything you know. …Makoto Makimura.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: If you came to kill me, why help me? Why haven’t you… done it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What, do ya want me to?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [She’s scared to death.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Doesn’t matter. Soon as the guy who hired me to do it finds out I’m keepin’ you alive, he’s gonna kill us both.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: But if I knew WHY everybody wants you dead, I might actually be able to do somethin’ here. What’s the bat tattoo thing about? Why’re ya after this guy?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: It’s…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Is he the guy who hired those yakuza to get you? Why the hesitation, then?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Lee-san knows about the man with the bat tattoo.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Please ask Lee-san. He’ll tell you everything you need to know.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: And I can trust that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Yes.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Then why the hell didn’t ya say so sooner?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: He may not a’ gotten plugged in any organs, but the guy’s still shot up! What if he bleeds out and dies on me!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: But you just… You said he’d be all right!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sometimes ya gotta tell a white lie!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He’s going to the exit.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Listen up. If you don’t wanna die, DO NOT leave this room. For any reason!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: A-All right!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Outside.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yamagata
Text: Would it kill you to say thank you before you bailed?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yamagata. Sorry to drag ya out so early.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yamagata
Text: Odyssey hardly uses that shed. If it can buy me a favor from you, I call that a bargain. Still, askin’ me to lend you space to keep a girl locked up? You’re into some sick shit.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Don’t breathe a word about her to anyone.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yamagata
Text: Heh, that takes balls. Is that really the sorta request you make to your biggest rival? What makes ya think I won’t go spread this little secret around?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: If the wrong guys knew about this, I couldn’t stick around. And a Sotenbori without me’s a problem for you, too.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yamagata
Text: Oh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sotenbori is what it is because the Grand and Odyssey are lockin’ horns. If it were just one or the other, you think hall as many people’d visit this little dirt stain on a map? Just like baseball. Nobody watches a series where one team steamrolls the rest. You think Odyssey has what it takes to keep a one-sided game interesting?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yamagata
Text: Fair enough. So our “lord of the night” really can see the big picture. Very well. I’ll keep your private indulgences to myself for now. But a favor’s a favor. Don’t forget you owe me now. Oh, and Majima-han?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yamagata
Text: You ever go to the cabaret clubs?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Cabaret clubs? Guess those are gettin’ more common lately. They’re a little different from full cabarets like the Grand or Odyssey, no?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yamagata
Text: Right. They charge by the hour like a cabaret, but offer the top-grade hospitality of a luxury club, hence the name.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Haven’t been myself yet. Why?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yamagata
Text: Maybe you should, then. If folks found out Sotenbori’s lord of the night ain’t been to a cabaret club yet, they’d be laughin’.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Oh? They that good?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yamagata
Text: They are. The dawn of the cabaret club is upon us, no doubt about it. Men and women both’ll make the shift soon enough. Full cabarets got another few years, tops.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh. If you’re that big on ‘em, why haven’t you got into the cabaret club game yet? I know business ain’t great over at Odyssey, but you gotta have that much lyin’ around.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yamagata
Text: I already tried… Couldn’t make it happen.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Whatchya mean?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yamagata
Text: Go and take a look for yourself sometime. You’ll understand real quick. Whoever rules the cabaret clubs rules the night… I think you’ll see why.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yamagata
Text: I’m talkin’ too much again. So long.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Gotta track down that big guy, Lee. Wonder if he’s still at Hogushi Kaikan…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He returns to Hogushi Kaikan. The floor shows signs of a recent fight.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (He’s gone… Where the hell’d he disappear to all full of holes?]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Someone’s coming into the clinic. Majima is hiding behind her short blade at the ready. When a man walks past him, he presses him against the wall and holds a blade to his throat.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Who are you? Why’re ya here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Little Guy
Text: A-Aaagh!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Can’t understand if ya don’t use your words.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Little Guy
Text: I not involved! Just come to get clothes for Lee-san!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Clothes for Lee? So you know where the guy runnin’ this place is at now? Where is he? Is he alright!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Little Guy
Text: Lee-san is at my hospital now…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What, you’re a doctor?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Chinese Doctor
Text: All Chinese around here come to my hospital. Lee-san come in last night.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Where’s this hospital at?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Chinese Doctor
Text: N-No, I not…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima puts the blade down and let the doctor go.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’m on Lee’s side, doc… That means you know Makoto, the girl that worked here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Chinese Doctor
Text: Makoto? Y-Yes, I know her! Lee-san very worried about that girl!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: She’s the one who asked me to meet with Lee. So please, tell me where this place is.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [The doctor is silent.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Quick, before I make this hurt.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Chinese Doctor
Text: A-All right… My hospital in Mahjong Jambalaya, Shofukucho West. That is where I see all my patients.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: It’s a mahjong parlor? So it’s an underground thing…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Chinese Underground Doc
Text: C-Can I go now?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Not yet. I don’t want Lee knowin’ I’m looking for him…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He hits the doctor in the stomach and he falls on the floor.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Take a power nap.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Outside.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Place was called Jambalaya, a mahjong parlor in Shofukucho West. The big guy with the bullet holes should be there.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Soon he finds the right place.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Mahjong Jambalaya… This’s the place. Big guy from Hogushi Kaikan should be in here gettin’ patched up.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He’s going inside. Lee and some of the patients at the clinic play mahjong.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Hey. Was wonderin’ when you’d get here! Took ya longer’n I figured.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Heh heh, drop the scowl, friend.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You… You’re tellin’ me you expected me to find this place?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Eh, let’s say it was a distinct possibility. See, I ain’t yer average acupuncturist. God Hands, remember?  Whoa, hold up! You didn’t think I’d let that one slide, did ya? I been waitin’ for that east tile.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Chinese Man
Text: Gah! You’re killing me, Lee-san!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: You just suck, buddy. Why don’t ya give the newcomer there a turn?  You’re in, right? Why else would anyone show up at a mahjong parlor? See, I always wanted to play a round of mahjong with a hitman.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima thinks for a while and sits at the table.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You seem fine for somebody with holes in ‘im.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: You fuckin’ crazy? Hurts like a bitch. Can’t move my arm, either… Wish I could trade with you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You not gonna ask what happened to the girl?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: If Makoto was dead, you got no reason to come lookin’ for me. She’s alive, right? You’ve never killed before, have ya? I can tell just lookin’ at ya. You got the look of somebody strugglin’ to cross that line. So riddle me this. What’s a guy who can’t kill doin’ taking hit jobs?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You don’t know shit about me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Chill out. Green kid like you can play tough all he wants, you ain’t scarin’ anybody. I can tell plenty about you. …Everything, really. That’s ron. Sorry, pal. Makoto ain’t hurt, is she?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nah. The girl’s fine. Relax.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Good… Heh, then what? You here to try to find yerself a way outta gettin’ whacked? Now that the killer’s screwed the pooch, he’s tryin’ not to be the next name on his boss’s list, huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Just so we’re clear, I… I still ain’t decided not to kill her.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Lee’s obviously not happy.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’m not the only guy after her. Take the yakuza who put air holes in that body of yours, for instance.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: What about ‘em?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Why do they want her?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Go ask your employer. He’s after Makoto too, ain’t he?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Is she a target because you two have been sniffin’ around about a guy with a bat tattoo?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: …Hard to say.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [A concerned doctor, whom Majima met at the clinic, comes into the room.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Chinese Underground Doc
Text: Lee-san, are you all right!? I brought help! That man is after you!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [There are a few Chinese with swords, bats and chains.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: …Nice playin’ with ya, “slim.“

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: We ain’t done talking here. You still don’t know whether I’m on your side or not. You gonna fight me anyway?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: If I can’t tell whose side you’re on, it’s safer to just kill ya. That’s how the Chinese in this town do things.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: So much for diplomacy, then.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Don’t bother holdin’ back, guys! Let ‘im have it!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima pulls out his bat and kicks the asses of the Chinese thugs.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Well, now. I guess you’re more than just a lousy hitman. Could be I underestimated you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I ain’t here to mess with your turf. I really just want to know why the girl’s a target.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: If you were thinkin’ the reason they’re after her has anything to do with the guy with the bat tattoo, I’m tellin’ ya you’re wrong.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: And how can you be sure of that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Makoto didn’t tell you anything?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: She said you knew. Told me to come ask you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: She knows. Just doesn’t like talkin’ about it herself.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Meaning what, exactly?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Her eyes… She’s only blind because of the man with the bat tattoo.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: About two years back, Makoto first came to Osaka. No people here, no place to go… Just an 18-year-old girl on her own. She got gigs as a live-in hostess or whatever else. Bounced around a lot. Problem is, that made her the perfect prey for Sotenbori’s less-than-savory crowd.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Prey, huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Easy mark. A guy approached her. Real scum. Chatted her up long enough to find out she was all alone here, then dropped the nice guy act in a hurry. …Kept her locked up in a cage so she couldn’t get away.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What the hell was he after?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Money. It’s always money, ain’t it? That guy with the bat tattoo sold her off for cash. It was Korean mafia that bought her. After that, you can imagine the sorta thing she faced every day, morning till night… I won’t get specific. But that’s why she can’t see now. Post-traumatic psychogenic blindness was the official diagnosis… And from that gloomy cage they kept her in, the last thing she ever saw was the tattoo of a bat on the arm of the scumbag that sold her.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Well that story’s a real kick in the dick.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: It was about six months ago I took Makoto in.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: And you been searching for this guy with the bat tattoo to get revenge for her?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Makoto says she just wants to stop the same thing from happenin’ to anybody else. Me, though… I want to snap the fucker’s neck in half. Peel the goddamn bat right off his arm. But there’s yer answer, right? The bat piece’a shit is small time, goes around town picking off innocent girls where he finds ‘em, probably all by himself. Can’t imagine a man like that’s behind what’s happenin’ to Makoto now. The yakuza hire street punks to do their dirty work, not the other way round.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Then what? You got any other ideas?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Can’t say I do. That’s all I can tell ya.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: The girl… She’s inside the Haru Building on Shofukucho Street. In a warehouse a club called Odyssey owns.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: So what, you’re plannin’ to just give her back? The hell you plannin’ to tell yer boss if you don’t kill her? You’re a dead man. Besides, that just means Makoto’s gonna get hunted down by the guy they hire to replace you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: So what? What do you want me to do about it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: It ain’t impossible to get away. There’s just one way you, me, and the girl all get away clean from the yakuza. I’ll warn you now, though… it ain’t pretty. Keepin’ what really matters safe means givin’ up something equal in exchange. You and I would need to work together.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You need me?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Yeah. And I’m gonna need you to decide whether you’re in or out before I tell you the plan. Well? You prepared to do anything? …Just how serious are ya?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’m dead if I don’t do somethin’.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: I’m askin’ if you’ll do THIS. So… you in?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Fine. I’ll do it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: All right. Good… You get back to Makoto. Look after her for today, yeah?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: I got somethin’ I need to get done in a hurry now.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Just what are you plannin’ to do?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: I’ll tell you once I got it worked out. Till then, it stays secret. How do I get in touch with you once I’m ready?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Cabaret Grand. I’m there from evening on. I run the place.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: You serious? You’re the guy in charge of the Grand?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Next time you’re thirsty, drinks’re on me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Lee
Text: Heh, all right then. I’ll get in touch tonight. What’s your name?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: It’s Majima. Goro.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Outside.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Whoever that Lee guy is, he’s a piece of work… Nothin’ I can really do now but go check on the girl, I guess.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He’s going back to Makoto.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You stay put in here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Where’s Lee-san? Is he all right!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: He’s fine. That ain’t the sorta guy who dies from a bullet or two. If ya ask me, the guy was doing TOO well.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I see… Thank goodness. But, that means… you heard the whole story.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah. You had it rough for a long time there. Hell. Guess things ain’t much better for ya now. Stuck in a dusty ol’ warehouse with a guy sent here to kill ya. Well, at least it looks like the guy with the bat tattoo ain’t the one gunnin’ for you now. Lee said so, too.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I see.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [She’s starting to cry.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sorry to dredge up bad memories. It’s hardly the same, but I went through some similar shit. I’m… It’s just one eye, but I was blinded, too. And I got locked up, for a long time, in a place where any day coulda been my last.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Was probably heaven compared to what you went through. I still got one good eye, too. Next to you, I’m a lucky guy. Sorry, not doin’ a very good job at cheerin’ you up here. Ahh… Look, sorry. I went and made ya feel worse. Ooh, I know! You hungry? Eh? Haven’t eaten anything since last night, right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: …I’m fine.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: C’mon, there’s no way you’re fine. You’re just depressed ‘cause yer runnin’ on empty! Best thing to do when you’re down is eat, and y’know I ain’t wrong.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Makoto keeps crying.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’ll have you a snack in no time. Anything special you want?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: …Some takoyaki, then.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: There, see? I knew you were hungry. You got it! Sit tight for just a minute, okay?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He’s coming out of the warehouse.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Oof… And I thought dealin’ with professional women was rough. Well, let’s get her some food for now. She said she wanted takoyaki…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He starts running around town looking for a takoyaki.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Takoyaki Seller
Text: Hey, perfect timing! I just made a fresh batch. Get ‘em while they’re hot!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Perfect. Just what I wanted.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He buys some piping hot takoyaki.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Takoyaki Seller
Text: Thank you! Make sure you eat ‘em before they get cold.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Okay, got the takoyaki, nice and hot. Let’s get it back to her before it gets cold.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He’s going back to the warehouse.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Alright, I got some smokin’ hot takoyaki. Hopefully it’ll help calm her down a little.) Hey, got that snack for ya. Takoyaki.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: …Thank you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Feel yourself calmin’ down now?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Yeah. But… now I’m hungry.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Heh, that’s a good sign. People’re machines and food’s fuel. Gimme half a shake, I’ll have a plate ready for ya.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Some time passes. Takoyaki are eaten. Majima sits on the floor and smokes.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Um…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: What… What happened to your eye?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Mm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Well… you said you lost vision in one of your eyes. I was curious how it happened.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Oh, right. Yeah, in my case it was an injury. Almost more of an accident. Totally destroyed.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: That’s terrible.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nah, I still got one. And hey, it does the job.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Poor thing…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh? You daft? I’m a lot better off’n you, ain’t l?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: But mine is caused by emotional trauma, so there’s a chance I’ll recover. That’s what Lee-san said…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: That true? …So you still got hope then. That’s great.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: But yours is…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’m used to it now. Doesn’t slow me down any. My only complaint’s that it ruined such a handsome face.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: So you’re handsome?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I was with a matchin’ pair of eyes, anyway. Cryin’ shame I can’t show ya.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Haha… That IS a shame.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: There it is, nice to hear that laugh on its way back. Hm? Wait, you wear a wrist watch?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Huh? Oh, yes.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Ain’t that a little odd for a blind girl?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I suppose… But it’s cute, isn’t it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: That’s my whole point, how would ya even know? Yeesh…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I know it’s strange. But this one plays a little music box chime. It sounds so cute, it always makes me smile.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh. What’s it sound like?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: …It doesn’t play anymore. The watch is broken.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Are you kiddin’ me!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Some things you just can’t throw away, you know? Even if it seems pointless to other people, some things are just really important to you… I lost my sight, lost all track of time, the watch broke, the chime stopped playing… I know. I have no need for it now. But it’s a memento of back when my life was still normal. If I got rid of it, I feel like… I’d never…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hey now.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Still, I would love to hear it chime again…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I get it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: If ya can’t bring yerself to throw it away, keep it. Hang on to it long enough, and eventually it’ll bring ya good luck.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Good luck… eventually.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [She’s taking off her watch.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hm? What’s wrong?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: You’re right, it’s silly. It’s because I keep clinging on to stuff like this that I still can’t face reality.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hey…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: It’s fine. Thank you. You’re very kind. I appreciate that.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: That ain’t right! If ya feel like ya still need it, then it’s somethin’ ya still need. I believe that, really.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: No, it’s fine. l… need to get stronger. I WILL get stronger.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He’s taking the watch that Makoto left on the couch.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Oh, and I got some news. Yer boy Lee says he’s got somethin’ he’s gotta look into on his end. I’ll have him come straight here to get ya once he’s done. Just sit tight till then, yeah?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Okay… Are you leaving?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah, it’s about time I got to work. You ever heard the name Sagawa before? A yakuza with the Omi Alliance.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I don’t know him…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Gotcha… Could be Sagawa’s only doin’ it because somebody else told him to. Still, why’s a girl like you got yakuza after her?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: So is this Sagawa person blackmailing you into this?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Close enough. But I ain’t innocent here. Killing you was the price of him doin’ me a favor. He was gonna get me back in the Tojo Clan.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Tojo Clan?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nothin’ you need to worry about.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: So then… what happens if you keep letting me live? Will that yakuza come and… kill you?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’ll be fine. Lee says he’s got some kinda plan. If that works, could be the both of us come outta this alive. …That’s what he made it sound like, anyway.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Really?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hey, the guy’s your boss, right? Have a little faith. Alright. I’ll be back soon as work’s over. You good?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Yes…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Outside.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Hm, maybe I’ll drop by a cabaret club like Yamagata-han suggested on my way to check ih at the Grand. I mighta seen one in the Hoganji Yokocho area, maybe? It’s worth a check.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [When he walks through the streets, he stumbles across a cabaret.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Manager(?)
Text: Care for a little break, sir? You won’t regret paying us a visit here!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Manager(?)
Text: My name is Youda, and I’m the manager here. Come in now, and I can pair you with our number one girl! What do you say?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Sunshine, huh? Didn’t know there was a spot like this tucked back in this part of town.) You guys a cabaret?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: No, sir. We’re a cabaret club.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Cabaret club? Well that’s just perfect. Still ain’t been in one of those.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Then this is the perfect opportunity! Cabaret clubs are an excellent time, sir!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Guy like Yamagata wouldn’t recommend ‘em without good reason. Gotta be somethin’ to it. Guess it’s worth a look.) Alright, lead the way. But I expect you to make good on that promise about your number one gal.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Of course, sir! Right this way!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima walks in and sits on the couch.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Man, I’ve been to livelier graveyards than this. Not a soul in here ‘sides me.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Here we are, sir, thank you for waiting!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Our very own number one girl, Yuki-chan!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: Hello. I’m Yuki. It’s… It’s nice to meet you!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Y-Yeah. You too.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (For this club’s top girl, she’s pretty low-key.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: Um, let’s start with a toast then, I guess…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Er, right.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: Ch-Cheers!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They’re smacking glasses.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Is this lady seriously the best they got here?]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: Um, sorry… I know I’m not really… I’m sorry.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh? What, naw, that’s-- You’re fine. Just… Are you really the number one gal here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: Er, yes. Technically. See… there’s only three of us working here, including me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Wha-- Three girls!? Ain’t that a little low? Explains why the place is a ghost town, though.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: Yeah… We were doing okay until a while ago, but since the Five Stars came around, every day’s been like this.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Five Stars? What’s that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: The Five Stars of Sotenbori. There are five cabaret clubs in town that have muscled out all the rest. The Five Stars are what people call the owners of those clubs. There used to be a ton of cabaret clubs in Sotenbori, but ever since those five set up shop here, all the other clubs have had to shut down.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Shut down? How come? Are the Five Stars’ clubs that much better than the rest?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: Well, their clubs are really popular, no one would argue that… But that’s not the only reason the competition’s all folded.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah? What else is there?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: Well, to put it bluntly? Harassment, I guess you’d say.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Harassment?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: I’ve had all the harassment from you I can take!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hmm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He sees a manager arguing with a man at a distance.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Crank calling us day in and day out, causing a scene during business hours to chase off our guests… I won’t stand for it anymore! If you’d beat me in honest competition I could accept defeat gracefully, but this is just… dirty!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Pudgy Man
Text: Heh heh heh. Mind your manners, now. Just where is your proof that I’m behind any of this alleged harassment? Oh right… You have none.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Who’s the rotund ton of fun?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: That’s one of Sotenbori’s Five Stars that I was just telling you about.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh. That guy?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: Yes, believe it or not… He’s one of the Stars. His name’s Hino, owner of Club Mars. Mars basically has a monopoly on the customers in this part of town. We’re some of his last local competition, so he’s been leaning on us hard.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: I may not have proof… but you guys are the only ones who would stoop this low! If we close shop, the only cabaret clubs left standing in Sotenbori will be the ones you Five Stars run. That’s the plan, right? Getting the full monopoly?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Hino
Text: Heh, I’m surprised you’ve pieced that much together. Good. That makes it simple. Close this roach motel and clear out. Accept now, and I’ll pay you a reasonable amount for your troubles. But if you continue to defy us, the terms of this little reward are gonna be quite a bit different. Heh heh… Honestly, I’m offering to pay money for a trash pile like this. I would think you’d be thanking me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Get out. How many hard working men and women have the five of you vultures put out of this line of work now? You’re just a gang of low down dirty bullies, and I won’t let you take over Sotenbori!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Hino
Text: Heh… I suppose that’s the mark of a man running the once- popular Sunshine. You’re a tougher nut to crack than the other club owners were. Very well. I’ll leave it at that for today. But I expect an answer on my next visit.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Y-You’ve got my answer, and it’s not changing. Don’t bother coming back!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Hino
Text: So stubborn… But let’s not be rude, hmm? I’ll drop in again soon, neighbor. Oh, that’s right! I meant to ask after your daughter. Living in Tokyo these days, isn’t she? I must say, I was surprised at just how adorable she is.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Hino
Text: Being a parent, there must be no end to the worry. Such a darling little girl, the thought of someone hurting her must keep you up at night…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: …! What do you plan to do to her!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Hino
Text: Hmmm? Me? Not a thing. But that doesn’t mean that the sort of brute who would hurt a child isn’t out there. These are frightening times we’re living in. Do be careful… I’ll be seeing you soon.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He leaves.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Dammit… What am I supposed to do?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: Sir…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: *sigh* …What CAN I do?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Looks like you got it pretty rough, boss.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Oh, sir! I’m so sorry you had to see such a shameful display.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Don’t sweat it. I mean, what’s that guy’s problem? Sotenbori’s Five Stars, was it? Why’re they gunnin’ for your club so hard?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Sotenbori’s Five Stars are colluding to form a monopoly on the city’s cabaret clubs by forcing every club but their own out of business. Cabaret clubs are an up-and-coming industry with plenty of momentum behind it. At one point, Sotenbori was full of them, and it was a healthy, competitive market. But then the Stars came in with their underhanded tactics, buying other clubs’ girls, harassing their staff, hiring thugs to use violence… They’ve crushed the competition. And now… the only cabaret clubs left in Sotenbori are the five they control and us.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Gotcha. Makes sense why they’d be chompin’ at the bit to swallow you up and make that monopoly complete, then. What I don’t get’s why they’re that desperate to get total control of Sotenbori.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: I can’t claim to know all of their plans, but from the rumors I’ve heard, they’re planning to use their cabaret club monopoly as a cudgel to crush the full cabarets.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Crush the cabarets, now?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Yes. Even with the rise of the cabaret clubs, the big-box cabarets like the Grand still control a great deal of money and power in the nightlife industry here. Their aim is to take those cabarets down, and claim that cash, influence, and personnel network for themselves. And apparently securing an airtight monopoly on the newly-minted cabaret club industry is essential to them getting the leverage to tackle the cabarets. Now it makes sense. If they can get the cabaret clubs AND the cabarets, they could have control of the whole city all to themselves.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Exactly. But it isn’t fair that clubs like ours should have to suffer such treatment for their ambitions. I’d sooner swallow glass than give in to them… But… much as I hate to admit it, their constant pressure and harassment’s taken a steep toll on our business. Just have a look around. Pathetic, isn’t it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Welp… I’d be lyin’ if I said this was anything but grim.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: If you can believe it, we were leading the pack just a short time ago. First, maybe second most popular club in the area. Then they started causing trouble here in the club. After a string of incidents, we’d lost our clientele, and most of our girls were poached. At this rate, the club can’t stay open long, no matter what I do. Perhaps accepting their offer really is the only sensible course. It boils my blood to think of letting those bullies have their way, but maybe that’s reality…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Don’t much care what happens to this town, but the thought of dicks like that doin’ whatever they want pisses me off. Plus, if I let them go now, they’ll be trouble for the Grand’s bottom line down the road. Which means trouble for me if I’m still around. I’m curious about the cabaret club business, too. Maybe I’ll try to learn a bit more by helpin’ out around here a bit.) Alright, you twisted my arm, boss. I’ll help ya out.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Sorry?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah, that cabaret the Five Stars’re goin’ after, the Grand? I run the place.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Wh-Whaaaaaat!? Manager of the Grand, that’s… You’re the one everybody says is a genius! That’s you!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Dunno about genius, but yeah. So it’s in my own interest not to let those guys build up any more steam here. Not to mention they sound like a pack of flamin’ assholes. So, how’s about you and me whip this place back into shape and take the fight to them instead?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Y-You would really do that? I can’t believe the manager of the Grand would waste his time on an empty little club like ours…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hey, we all gotta help each other in tough times, right? ‘Sides, I’m interested in learnin’ more about the cabaret club business model. This’ll be like a classroom for me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Th-Thank you so much, sir!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Whoops, guess we still ain’t been introduced. It’s Majima. Let’s stir up some shit.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Majima-san, got it. Well! I’m in your debt, sir!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They’re going to the other room.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh. This the back office?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Yes. It mostly serves as a staging area for the staff. I organize things back here, manage the girls, that sort of thing. Speaking of… What would you say to taking over as manager, Majima-san? Would you mind?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Say what? Manager, just like that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Yes, sir. You certainly have the experience, and I fear Sunshine can’t reach its full potential under my direction. I’d give you total authority. Of course, I’d still be here supporting you in any way I can as floor staff! Will you do it, sir?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: …Yeah, alright. If you’re that serious about this, I’ll do my part, too. Leave it to me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Thank you so much! I’m at your disposal, Manager Majima!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hell… Feels a little weird hearin’ that from you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Now, if it’s all right with you, I’d like to jump right into an explanation of how a cabaret club is run. That said, there’s a lot to cover and I know you’re a busy man. Let me know when it’s a good time for you, sir.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Gotcha.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Ah, Majima-san. I was thinking this might be a good time to run you through the basics of cabaret club management. Do you have a moment?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah. Lay it on me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Right! Then let’s get to it. …I’d say that about covers the basics, anyway. Need me to run back through that again?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nah, I got it, thanks.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Youda
Text: Sure thing. In that case, the next step is… Hm, let’s have you actually open the place up and do a round of prep. This is the sort of thing where the quickest way to learn is to actually just do it. Let’s give it a try! I’ll chime in with advice as we go.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Alright. Let’s do this thing!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima’s starting to run the club. First of all, he trains Yuki-chan.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Okay, let’s do a little conversational training.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: Y-Yes… Thank you for your help with this!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What’s up, Yuki-chan? Ya nervous or somethin’?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: N-No, I wouldn’t call it nerves. It’s more like… battle butterflies!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: That so? Well, I guess that’s encouraging enough. Alright, ya ready to pretend I’m a customer?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Uh, you sure you’ve got this? Okay, well, let’s start with an easy topic. Tell me ‘bout some hobbies of yours.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yup. Come to think about it, I don’t know much about you either. Let’s use this little practice to get better acquainted, eh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Got anythin’?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: Yes! I… don’t have any hobbies!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hey, hey, if you wanna be a hostess, that kinda talk ain’t gonna cut it. You just flatlined the whole conversation.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: But, I really don’t have any hobbies… Oh! I doubt it counts as a hobby, but I do write in my diary every day!

Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: Oh, I see! You’re right, that might work. Majima-san, you’re a lot sharper than you look.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki
Text: I-I only have about eight years’ experience with bonsai, and in the bonsai world, that makes me a nobody. A more experienced hobbyist would just laugh at me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hmm, I see. Well, I think it’s pretty amazin’.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yuki

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Speaker: Yuki

Speaker: Majima
Text: Impolite? That ain’t the right idea at all. Our customers are here specifically to talk to girls, Yuki-chan. You’ve gotta lead ‘em in with some topics.

Speaker: Yuki

Speaker: Yuki

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Yuki

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Yuki

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Yuki

Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.

There’s the girls over at the Grand I got from Odyssey in that trade! Long as we got Nozomi, we’re covered at the Grand. Should be fine if I bring the rest over here. I’ll put in that call now.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.

Text: What you want us to do? Take this guy out, too?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
