Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [When he comes out of the Grande, he’s welcomed by a some yakuza.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Majima! Heh, it IS you. Who wouldn’t recognize that ugly mug? The Grand’s manager, Goro Majima… I owe ya one from last night, pal.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Last night? …Sorry, who are you?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Don’t matter who I am. Where’d you put Makoto-chan? I know you hid the girl… WHERE!?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Oh, it’s you guys… The wannabe kidnappers. Heh… Didn’t expect you to save me the trouble of trackin’ you clowns down.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Smug bastard… You think this is funny? This amuse you?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah, I’m really lookin’ forward to figurin’ out why this girl’s in everyone’s sights.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: The fuck do you think you are? You got us by surprise last night. That ain’t happenin’ again, patches.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [We see that the Yakuza holding iron bars and bats in their hands.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: At this point, we’re done fightin’ fair. Time for you to see where screwin’ with the yakuza gets ya!

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [Majima is beating a dozen armed Yakuza.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: The… The hell’s this guy made of? Who ARE you!?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Not so fast, buddy. I thought you had business with me?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Sh-shit!

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: I know I’ve got questions for you. And I aim to get answers.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: You raising hell right outside the club, Mr. Manager?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sagawa…

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [The Yakuza are running away in fear.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Did you get you to bust heads mixed up in some kind of trouble? It’s not like right on your own doorstep. Hmm?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: It’s nothin’. Forget it.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Then where are you going? Not work, apparently. …Have you found Makoto Makimura yet?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Not yet.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Huh… And yet I hear you didn’t go home last night. Here I figured that meant you’d tracked Makimura down.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’m still lookin’ right now. You just gave me the job. I still got time.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: I suppose you do. And once you find the target, killing ‘em is the quick part. Still, sooner’s better than later.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Then are we done here? I don’t got time to waste on chit-chat.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: This isn’t just chit-chat, tiger. You know what they say about “ABC,” don’t ya?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Always Be in Contact. Rule one of contract work’s keeping your boss in the loop. A. B. C.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Alright… Oh look, we made contact. That’s all I got.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: No snags you want advice on?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’d sooner ask a telephone pole than come to you with my problems.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [He leaves.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Uh-huh…

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Right, I was headed back home. Lee’s gotta be watchin’ from somewhere or other.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [Near Majima’s house…]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: That you, Lee?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: …Yeah.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: How you holdin’ up, ya bear?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Hmph. You know the trick to forgettin’ your pain?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Havin’ yer balls to the wall. We don’t shake these yakuza now, they’ll chase us to the grave. Ain’t got time to be feelin’ pain till this job’s done.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah, fair enough.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Forget me. The hell’s up with this place?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh? How do ya mean?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: This apartment’s bein’ watched from all over. Got at least four sets of eyes on it.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’m impressed you noticed.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Do they know you’re hidin’ Makoto?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nah. This place’s been under watch for a long-ass time. My client’s the guy behind the eyes.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: And there’s more around your club, too.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Oh, I know. And you can add more on every road leadin’ out of Sotenbori to that list. I ain’t allowed outta the city. That’s why they’re all watchin’. Keep me from skipping town.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: So what, this town’s your prison cell?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: You got it.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: The hell’s that about?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: I used to be yakuza up in Tokyo. Then I crossed the guy runnin’ my family and my life went down the shitter. Even now, just ‘cause they got me on a leash in Osaka don’t mean they won’t kill me if I give ‘em reason.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: That’s rough… Heh, we all got our baggage, I guess. But that means we can’t just stand here chattin’. Let’s take this someplace safer. Meet you where Makoto’s hidin’. Here, I’ll show you a route where nobody can follow you.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah, how’s that work?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: See, I got a secret door in the back of the patient room at the clinic. Keep it hidden behind a bookshelf. That’ll get you through to the building next door. Even if you’re bein’ tailed, that passage should be enough to throw most anybody off.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: How come a massage clinic’s got a secret escape route?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Thought I just told you… We all got our baggage.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hmph.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Just be careful when you’re goin’ to where Makoto’s at. You got into it outside the Grand before, didn’t ya? The boys who came for Makoto last night know your face. No tellin’ where they could be watchin’ from.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Right. So I’ll use yer little backdoor at Hogushi Kaikan. Happy?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Thrilled. Once you’re through that, head straight for Makoto. I’ll meet ya there. Got it?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: I got it… Go on already.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [Lee walks away.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: (First off, I gotta try to figure out whether I’m bein’ watched. Time to play it cool like I’m just strollin’ around and try to suss out where they’re watchin’ from.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [At Hogushi Kaikan…]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Looks like more of Sagawa’s clowns. Guess the bastards got everywhere I might wanna go on lockdown.) Oof, another exhaustin’ day. I’m ready for a nice massage to beat my busted-up body back into some kinda shape! (Hopefully that’ll keep ‘em thinkin’ I’m still inside a while. Long enough to find this door and get gone, anyway. He said there was a bookshelf blockin’ the door… Here it is! Sonuvabitch really had a secret passage. It’s s’posed to connect to the building next door… Guess I’ll see for myself. Never thought somethin’ like this was here yesterday… Even if I was bein’ followed before, I’m clear now. Now to haul ass to where the girl is! There’s eyes up ahead. Can’t go gettin’ myself seen after goin’ through the trouble of shaking ‘em off me. Looks like they ain’t seen me yet. Gotta keep my distance.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [He’s successfully getting to the warehouse.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Good, nobody’s lookin’. If I’m goin’ in, now’s the time!]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [He goes into the warehouse.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Ah--

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: It’s me. I’m comin’ in.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [There’s an envelope on Makoto’s knees.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hm? What, your boy Lee already get here?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Yup. He’s out getting us something to drink. He said he’d be right back.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: What’s with the envelope?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I don’t know. Lee-san said to have you open it.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [Majima comes up to her and takes the envelope. There are photographs in it.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: The hell is this?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Makoto
Text: What was inside it?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Photos of some young lady. Lots of ‘em, all the same girl. Surveillance shots.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Lee-san brought photos? What for?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [Someone enters.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Yo. Already diggin’ in? Nice shots, huh?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Lee. What’s up with these photos?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Easy, tiger. Don’t get yer panties bunched up. I’m about to explain.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [He puts a bottle of drink in Makoto’s hands.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Here, drink up.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Thanks, Lee-san.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Got one for you too.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Lee. These photos are that big plan you were talkin’ about? Who the hell is she?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Serial marriage fraudster, this chick. And it gets better. The guys who fall for her got a bad habit of dyin’ suspiciously. You ask me, she drains ‘em dry, then serves ‘em with a lot worse than divorce papers. But even this monster’s got her redeemin’ features. Take her age and build… Awful close to Makoto’s, yeah?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: What of it?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [Makoto’s falling asleep unexpectedly. There was sedative in the bottle.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Those drugs really pack a punch.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Lee! The hell’re you thinkin’!?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: What comes next ain’t for her ears. So, time for a little nap.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Haw?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: You’re awful dense for a hitman. The girl in those photos? She’s Makoto’s body double.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Body double?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Look, when somebody calls in a hit, what is it they actually want?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Results. That their target’s dead. And the result of a murder’s a dead body.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Exactly, results. You offer up a body, yer boss is happy. Which is why we take the girl in the photos… and have her volunteer for the role instead of Makoto.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Now just a…

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: You and me’ll do the job. Dress the body in this.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [He takes the bag he brought and pulls out the uniform from the clinic worker.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: When the cops go to verify her identity, it’s me they’ll be comin’ to. So I’ll give ‘em their answer. “No doubt about it, that’s my poor ‘little employee.” And boom…

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: You stupid? Soon as they start investigatin’ they’ll see it ain’t the same girl!

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: That’s fine. After she’s dead, we give the girl a face job.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [He’s squeezing his hand in a fist.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Long as she’s unrecognizable, we’re in the clear. And a little acid takes fingerprints right off.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: …The fuck ARE you, man? I want the truth. Just who the hell are you? ‘Cause you ain’t just a goddamn acupuncturist. You got nothin’ to say!?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: …Used to be the same as you. A hitman.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: What?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Did contract work for a mainland organization. My last job was about six months back.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Six months… Wait, that’s around when you said you took in the girl.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Good memory. Heh, but try thinkin’ that one through. The girl was organization property, locked away. How was I gonna get her? You think she was just lyin’ on the side of the road? Six months back I took a job runnin’ a raid on some Korean mafia. Turf war over the slave trade. They’d already killed a bunch of our men. There was two of ‘em in that storehouse. After killin’ them, I’m left with a room fulla half-naked girls in cages. Soon as I unlocked the doors, they all bolted… All except one. One of ‘em couldn’t move an inch.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: And that’s…

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Yeah, that was Makoto. She starts reachin’ out in the dark for my hand, totally blind… Once she found it, she latched on and wouldn’t let go. Just knelt there cryin’ and saying “thank you” over and over. Her hand was so tiny, man… I couldn’t bear to let go.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: So you’ve been playin’ big daddy to her ever since.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Yeah. See, way back in the day… I really was a father.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: She was always real sick, even as a baby. The side effects of the drugs she needed were rough… By the end, she could barely see. That grip on my hand… It was just like the one I remembered. Majima… I ain’t about to let a daughter die before my eyes again. If it’s to protect my girl, I’ll kill any stranger you put in front of me. I know it ain’t right, but… I got no other options left! And you’re gonna help me with it, Majima. I need you to report back to yer boss that Makoto’s dead.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Tsk. Damn fool.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: You ain’t givin’ the yakuza near enough credit. He’ll see through a trick like that in no time.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Alright. So what other plan do we got here!? YOU got any bright ideas!?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: We’re done talkin’ here. Count me outta this.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [Majima turns to the exit.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: You just gonna run away again? Don’t think I can’t tell. You lost that eye of yours from runnin’ away, just like you are now.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Excuse me?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Sure, you got yer justifications, but I’ll bet you came all this way without ever gettin’ yer hands dirty, actin’ like a damn choir boy. But you’re yakuza, no better’n me. Once a man steps into the shadows like that, he’s black as night till the day he dies.  In that case, sack up and meet hell halfway already!

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: You don’t know a DAMN thing about me!

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: I’ll ask just one more time… You’re sure ya won’t join me in handlin’ this?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: No way in hell.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Alright. In that case… I’ll show ya how we do things in the shadows. Can’t have anybody who knows about this little plan leavin’ this room alive.  It’s over, Majimaaa!

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [The epic battle begins. From the subtitle we learn that Lee’s full name is Wen Hai Lee.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: W-Wait, Majima! There really ain’t any other option than a body double! If I want to keep Makoto safe from here on… I need Makoto’s dead body! Otherwise… Someday, somebody a lot meaner’n you’s gonna track her down and kill her. Not to mention you’ll be long dead by then. How can you not SEE that!?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: If and when that happens… All I gotta do then is kill everybody who comes gunnin’ for me.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: What? You can’t seriously think you can --

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: You said it. Once you step into the shadows, you’re stained black for life. No gettin’ that mark off ya. But… You can still choose who you bring down with ya. You’ve got my answer.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Hey, stop it!

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [Majima tearing up the pictures and picking up a bag with the uniform.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Don’t let her catch cold now. She’s like your daughter, ain’t she?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [He’s leaving. In the next scene we see Majima sitting at the bus stop and smoking. There is a lot of ashe at the end of his cigarette - it seems that he has plunged deeply into thoughts.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: The hell am I even doin’?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [He’s throwing the bag in the trash. After he leaves, someone unknown takes the bag. The next morning, we see Majima at his home.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: (……This makes three days… Didn’t wind up changin’ much. If anything, things’re worse now than before. ……Jig’s up as soon as Sagawa finds out I’m keeping the girl alive. Can’t risk headin’ to the storehouse now. Better play it cool and head to the Grand like normal.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [He’s going back to his workplace.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Floor Manager
Text: Ah, sir. Good morning!

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Mornin’.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Floor Manager
Text: We just got a call from a Lee-sama from “Hogushi Kaikan” a moment ago asking for you, sir.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Lee called?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Floor Manager
Text: Someone you know, then?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah. What’d he say?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Floor Manager
Text: Well, it’s not much of a message, but he asked that you meet him at that Hogushi Kaikan as soon as possible.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Yeesh, the hell does he want, after what happened last night?]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Floor Manager
Text: Sir…?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: I got the message. Thanks for the heads-up.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Floor Manager
Text: Of course. I’ll leave you to it, sir.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Guess Lee needs to talk. Says he’s waitin’ for me at Hogushi Kaikan.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [After leaving his workplace once again, Majima goes to the clinic. Inside he finds Lee. He smokes and watches the news.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Oh, Majima! Glad you’re here. I been waitin’!

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Whoa slow down. What’s got you all pumped?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: How am I NOT gonna be pumped?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Lookit you, playin’ the hero all by yerself. Still, now this whole thing’s behind us. You done good, Majima!

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: What’re you on about?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: What am I… You did her, didn’t you? The girl from the photos.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: News Reporter
Text: Early this morning, the body of a young woman was found in the Sotenbori River. From her delothing the deceased is believed to be Makoto Makimura, age 20. Her disfigured body has led Osaka police to believe Makimura-san met with foul play.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: The hell is this!?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Wait, it wasn’t you that did it? That’s her, from the photos.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: I… I ain’t killed anybody. I told you I wouldn’t!

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Yeah, but… the body’s wearin’ Makoto’s uniform that you took with you yesterday!

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: What’d you say?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Cops came by this morning with a snapshot of the body, asked me to identify her. Her face was all caved in, but she was wearin the outfit I gave you, plain as day!

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Text: [The phone rings. Lee picks it up.]

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Lee
Text: Yes? Hogushi Kaikan here. Huh? …It’s for you

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: You asked for me? It’s Majima.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Caller
Text: You see my little present yet? How you like it?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: The hell you talking about?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Caller
Text: Whaddya think I’m talkin’ about, buddy? One dead Makoto Makimura.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: What!?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Caller
Text: She’s officially dead, now. That should please your employer, no? No worries he’ll be comin’ for your ass, now. You should be thankin’ me.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Majima
Text: Who are you? What’s yer game here!?

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.
Speaker: Caller
Text: I’m lookin’ to trade. You and me.

Time/Location: +Try to compliment them.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Woman’s Voice
Text: Since Kiryu’s departure from the Dojima Family, its top lieutenant, Kuze, has fallen. Meanwhile, the Dojima Lieutenant and Taihei Association Patriarch, Hiroki Awano, has ascended to center stage. Awano, eager to extract President Tachibana’s vital information regarding the Empty Lot, blackmails Kiryu to hand over Tachibana, or die. When met with Kiryu’s blunt refusal, Awano mobilizes the entire Dojima Family to hunt him down. Kiryu, with the help of his sworn brother Nishikiyama, manages to escape Kamurocho. But he and Nishikiyama soon part ways. Despite the Tojo Clan’s fierce Dojima Family still being out for his blood, Kiryu returns to Kamurocho once more. Awaiting Kiryu there is an overwhelming foe, and only a precious few friends to aid him…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Quiet evening, the residents are walking down the street. Three yakuza notice a guy in a white suit…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Text: Hey. Look, the son of a bitch is tight there!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [But it’s not Kiryu, it’s Japanese Elvis Presley.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza 2
Text: That ain’t Kiryu!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza 3
Text: Asshole! You wearing that just to fuck with us!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [The other Yakuza are also searching the city. They even go into arcades to scare the kids.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Not Kiryu.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Man
Text: Has anybody called the fire department!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Woman
Text: Anyone still in there? Is everybody out!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [The Yakuza roam the crowd of gawkers. Kiryu hides around the corner and then leaves.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Damn, Dojima’s goons torched my apartment just to tighten the noose around me…! I can’t risk wandering around out here. I need to find a place to lie low, and wait for word from Tachibana.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Text: (in Kiryu’s head) I will get in touch with you tomorrow. Until then, please stay safe and out of the Dojima Family’s hands, Kiryu-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (I just hope I can find someplace that’ll take me in…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Hmm, the Kazama Family office… But if Kashiwagi-san took me in now, the Kazama Family will have officially betrayed Patriarch Dojima… All that does is make trouble for Kashiwagi-san. I can’t come running to him for help this time.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [A drunkard stumbles over him.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Drunk
Text: Nwargh!? Hey. HEY! Stupid brat… How come you s-standin’ there, eh!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Text: Whoa, let’s take it easy, sir!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Drunk

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tch…!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Huff… Huff…

Speaker: Reina
Text: Umm, is that you, Kiryu-san? It IS you, Kiryu-san!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Reina…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Wait, what happened to you!? You’re bleeding! You’re hurt! Are you all right!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. It’s just a scratch.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: What happened?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nothing, it’s fine. You should go. You don’t want to be seen with me right now.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: I know. Dojima’s men are after you, aren’t they?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Then come to the bar. You don’t have anywhere else to go, do you?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I can’t do that. It’ll make trouble for you. Really, don’t worry about me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: I’m used to trouble, and I’m not just walking away. I won’t leave Nishikiyama-kun’s brother to the wolves.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: He and I aren’t bros. We cut ties.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Raina
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You should do the same. I don’t want you on my conscience.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: And you think saying that’s enough to change my mind? Give me a little credit here… Look. Either you come with me, now, or I start screaming. I mean it. A place like this, it’s just a matter of time till they find you. Now please, don’t make this take any longer. Okay? I’ll go close the bar now. Give me just a few minutes, then come on up. Use the back entrance, it’s more discreet.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: …All right.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Then I’ll see you in a minute… I’d better.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Reina… I’m sorry.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: That’s the last apology I want to hear from you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Not wasting a minute Kiryu running to the bar.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Good, you actually showed up, Kiryu-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I won’t stay long. Just until a man named Tachibana gets in touch with me. Until then, thank you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Of course. Have a seat. We need to get that head patched up.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Reina… Have you heard if anything’s happened with Nishiki?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: I think he’s out in the Kazama Family office now. I saw him go in a little while ago He looked really upset.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I see… That’s good to hear.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: The cut doesn’t look very deep. I’ll just clean it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Thanks.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Some time passes. Reina treats Kiryu’s wound.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Before… Kiryu-san, you said you cut ties as brothers with Nishikiyama-kun. That’s just to keep him safe though, right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Right now I’ve got the whole Dojima Family after me. It’s best if he has nothing to do with me anymore.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: I figured as much. You two make quite a pair… Both of you are more worried about each other than yourselves. Every time he’s here, Nishikiyama-kun tells stories about you two with this big grin on his face. I’ve never had a friend that close… I envy him.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Even so, I don’t want to weigh the guy down any more than I already have. I’ve done enough… I don’t want to hurt a brother.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: You know, Kiryu-san, I think you should hear the police are looking for you, too. A detective came in today, saying he wanted to ask you a few questions. Any guesses why?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah… Guess I’ve hit my time limit.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Time limit? What do you mean?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m being framed for murder. The shooting that happened over in the Empty Lot. Tachibana pulled some strings to stall the cops from looking into me. That grace period’s over now.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: But you say “framed,” so…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, I didn’t do it. The whole thing’s a setup.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Kiryu-san, someone’s coming. This time of night, nobody should be using that elevator! Hide in the back room!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Dojima Family Goon
Text: What do you take the Dojima Family for, lady? Get your ass out here, Kiryu! We had this place staked out the whole time, moron! Quit sneaking around and man up!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Kiryu-san, don’t! Run!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Dojima Family Grunt
Text: The man of the hour… Bring me everyone! EVERYONE!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: Right!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m sorry, Reina… I shouldn’t have come here.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Kiryu-san!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Dojima Family Grunt
Text: You got nowhere left in this world to go, Kiryu!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Kiryu-san…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: …Sorry for wrecking the place, Reina. This is all my fault. More of them will be here any minute. I’ve got to go.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Wait! I’ll call the police! They might arrest you, but at least you’ll still be alive.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m afraid not. If the yakuza are going this far, a few cops on the scene won’t stop them. They’re not calling this off till I’m dead.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Then… there’s no one else you can ask for help?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: If there were, I wouldn’t have dragged you into this, too.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Please… give this to Nishiki.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Reina
Text: A watch?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu

Speaker: Reina
Text: Kiryu-san… Kiryu-san!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Text: You stupid? There’s even more of us coming. Doesn’t matter what you try, the only one going to hell today is you. All right, get to work on him!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Text: No way… This guy’s not even human!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…

Text: Bro…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Heh, stubborn son of a bitch, ain’t ya? You had to know it’d pan out like this, though. Thing is, we’re past the empty threats stage now.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Awano…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: We can take our time working you over for Tachibana’s little hideaway later. Not that coughing it up is gonna save you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Bro… I’ll let you take the credit, but I’m the one who gets to break him.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Hey, Kiryu. Where do you figure Tachibana is now, after you covered his ass all this time? Haven’t heard a peep… They cut you loose, boyo. Looks like Kazama’s just gonna sit by and let you die, too. Raw fucking deal, am I right? People today are so heartless.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana’s going to be the one to get the Empty Lot. Then it’ll be your turn to sweat. Do your worst, I’m not giving Tachibana to you. Think hard. Am I really the only one who’s cornered here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: That cocky attitude’s gonna get you hurt, boy.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Let me at him, bro. I’ll shut him up.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s got iron knuckles on his hands. One of the palms is missing and the knuckle is attached directly to the stump.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kuze
Text: I’m gonna have some real fun this time, Kiryu!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu defeats him and a lot of his men.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Daisaku Kuze
Text: Son of a bitch! This isn’t over by a long shot.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [One of the yakuza runs up to Kiryu from behind and hits him with a bat.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Daisaku Kuze
Text: Gimme that!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Unexpectedly, a car is entering the street.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Who the fuck!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Daisaku Kuze
Text: I’m gonna paint the sidewalk with your brains!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [The car’s run him over.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What the…?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Kiryu-san, get in!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Quickly!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu runs up to the car and sits on the passenger seat.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Excuse my delay, Kiryu-san. I fear driving is not my forte. Hold on tightly, please!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Don’t let ‘em through!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [A few yakuza are trying to get the car dropped off, but unsuccessfully. Awano pulls out the gun and starts shooting.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Awano
Text: No you fuckin’ don’t… Shit!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Shibusawa, standing there all the time, hasn’t dropped a word.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [After a while, we see Tachibana’s car in a parking lot.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: The added pressure from Dojima’s men has hampered our information network these last few days. It has been difficult to keep track of your situation… let alone to pass instructions on to Oda-san. Hence… my impromptu debut as the world’s worst chauffeur.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m surprised there’s anything you can’t do.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: It seems I at least know one pedal from the other… but that’s the most I’ve driven since getting licensed. It was terrifying.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Well, it saved me. If you hadn’t come when you did, that would’ve been the end of the line for me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I was… naive. Thought I was stronger than I am. I figured no matter how far I pushed, I’d be able to see it all through by myself. Make it alone. But now, just being around other people puts them in danger. Everyone who’s tried to help me has paid for it. The owner of Serena, Kazama, Nishiki… You, too. This whole time I tried to be the lone wolf, I’ve had people protecting me. And now I’m finally paying for being blind to that for so long… I’m an idiot.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Tachibana’s face is covered in sweat. He barely speaks as if he had just run a marathon.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Were I in your place, that would not bother me remotely. You see, Kiryu-san, I firmly believe that we must all use anyone and everyone around us. Such was the way of the world where I grew up. Any less, and one would simply not survive. To say nothing of climbing the ranks. The only question was how to extract the most from others, whether through money, force, or any other means. I am sure it was a world far different from the one that gave rise to a gentle soul like you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So the only reason you came running to my rescue was so that you could use me now?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: …In so many words, yes.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What are you… Why tell me this?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: By using those around me, I have amassed money and power… It seems what talents I have lend themselves naturally to such pursuits. However… unlike you, I have no friends who would risk their lives for my sake. In the end, those who have gathered around me have done so to use me in return. You describe yourself as an idiot. Well… I suppose I too aspire to be such an idiot.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Those who would risk themselves to protect you are aware that you are not a man motivated by personal gain. What’s more, once you’ve decided to trust someone, you are able to do so blindly, recklessly, heedless of the costs. That sort of person is exceedingly rare… especially in this day and age. I regret to admit that I am still unable to risk my own life in order to protect yours. However, I can place my trust in you, and place my life in your hands.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Apologies… Perhaps that was the sort of thing better said AND heard after a few drinks.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: The first round’s on me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: It is best we postponed that. We shall abandon the car here.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [A van is slowly entering the parking lot.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That van…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: He is… not an enemy.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Even in this city… There are a few corners left beyond the Tojo Clan’s reach. We’ll head there… And regroup…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s wriggling in pain.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Are you all right? Hey, Tachibana!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Boss! Hang in there, boss!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Tachibana puts his head on the wheel and passes out.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [In the next scene, Tachibana is lying on a hospital bed connected to life support equipment.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Is Tachibana going to be all right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: For now, at least. Keep this quiet, but the boss’s kidneys have been shot for years. Even within Tachibana Real Estate, I’m the only other one who knows.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Is he sick?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Back when he lost his hand, he lost a lot of blood. Took too long to get a transfusion. His kidneys haven’t worked since. It was a rival gang that did the hack job. Chinese mafia. Rest assured, I did a lot worse back to them in return.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Not exactly the words of an upstanding businessman.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: This was a long time ago. We weren’t a real estate firm back then. Just a band of punks. Ever since, he’s needed dialysis every other day. If he goes without that, he’ll die.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana’s picking a fight with the Tojo Clan with a body like that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: If he were healthy, he’d have already done the job by now, single-handed. No pun intended. Hell, with two good kidneys, he wouldn’t have needed the real estate firm… or you and me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So then, what’s our next move?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Everything’s on hold till the boss wakes up. Relax. This is the one place in Kamurocho where the Tojo Clan hasn’t got eyes. Little Asia, it’s called. Heard of it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Little Asia?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: It’s just Asian immigrants living in this neighborhood. Perfect place to hide from the Dojima Family.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You guys have connections in a place like this?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Sure, the boss and me… Neither of us are Japanese.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: We’re ex-Chinese mafia living in Japan. This hospital’s all underground. Neither of us have the papers for a legit doctor.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Ex-mafia… This is all news to me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: It’s not like I’ve tried to keep it secret. Though the only reason Tachibana Real Estate’s managed to play keep-away with the Tojo Clan this long is because of this place. Little Asia’s sacred ground. All the shops here pay the mafia protection money, and so our little ghetto here can keep eking out a humble living. And as long as they keep it within this patch, the Tojo Clan turns a blind eye. That’s the deal.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Sure, but doesn’t us coming in here go past that? If they knew, wouldn’t the Tojo Clan come down on this place?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: No doubt about that. But we’re paying the guy who runs things here more than enough to offset that risk.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [A man enters the room.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Who’s that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: He works for the guy I just mentioned.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Chinese Mafia
Text: [Elder Chen wants you. Bring the Japanese, too.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: [All right.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: There a problem?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: We gotta work out what happens to you with the local boss. Gotta admit… Doesn’t sound like he’s throwing you a party. He’s in a Chinese restaurant nearby. You’re coming with me. Let’s go.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Oda leaves the room. Kiryu briefly looks at Tachibana lying in bed, notices a bat tattoo on his left arm and also leaves. Outside…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: All right, let’s go see the big man… and don’t you go wandering around. The locals won’t take too kindly to it. You ready? Outside Little Asia, the city’s crawling with Dojima Family thugs. We’re safe in here for now, though. Gotta go clear it with the local boss. Just some lame protocol. …Hopefully.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Chinese Guy
Text: [Hey, Oda. What the hell is your company thinking? Why are you helping Japanese yakuza?]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: [It’s complicated, okay? He’s got nowhere else he can hide.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Chinese Guy
Text: [Elder Chen hates yakuza. You know that. Are you listening to me, Oda?]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: [I’m on my way to work it out with him now. Get off my back.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Chinese Guy
Text: […Don’t get cocky, Oda. You Tachibana guys seem to think your money buys you anything back here, it won’t.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: This is it. Come on in.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [They go into a little Chinese restaurant. At the table sits an elderly Chinese man of good-natured appearance.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: [Elder Chen, this is our Japanese guest. Would you mind if we conduct this in Japanese?]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [The old man nods.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Chen-san here oversees things in Little Asia. Chen-san, this is--

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: Kazuma Kiryu, yes? Formerly of the Dojima Family.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Chen-san is one of the three elders leading the Chinese immigrant population in Japan. His network is a major part of how Tachibana Real Estate stays informed.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: I expect this is your first time in Little Asia. It is a cramped, run-down place. I’m sorry we can’t offer much in the way of hospitality. Contrary to appearances, we once stood on equal footing with Kamurocho’s yakuza. That was until your bosses, Sohei Dojima and Shintaro Kazama, broke that balance with force. Much blood was spilled that day. Women and children were butchered. In the end, we were all driven underground.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: That was before Kiryu’s tenure with the Dojima Family.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: I am aware, obviously. Just making small talk.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Apologies, sir.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: Ever since, we have been left in this gutter to watch as the changing times brought wealth to the Japanese, our own slum crumbling around us. Oda-san… I cannot welcome your guest to Little Asia. He is being chased by Dojima and the police both. Hiding him here invites disaster upon us.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: My boss and I are fugitives from the Tojo Clan, too.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: Little Asia does not turn away its own. But Kiryu-san is a Japanese yakuza. Furthermore, Tachibana Real Estate did not see fit to advise us of his arrival ahead of time.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: It was an emergency, sir. We had no other choice. If we cast Kiryu out of here, the Dojima Family will kill him.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: A sad fact that will cause us no inconvenience.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Please reconsider, sir. Our firm’s contributions are a big part of what keeps Little Asia afloat. We’ve enjoyed a mutually beneficial partnership up till now. Surely years of good faith merits this one favor.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: Mutually beneficial, as you say. We have provided you with information equivalent to the price you’ve paid… but we owe you no favors.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Of course, I understand that. Then… Then we’ll pay a separate fee for this service!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: When you look at my face, do you see a “for sale” sign?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: If not money, then what is it you want? Just tell me!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: That is enough. There can be no negotiation without courtesy, Oda-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Boss!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana. Should you be up?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Chen-san, I apologize for the trouble. Oda-san. Chen-san is not the sort to reverse a decision once made. As guests in Little Asia, we are to accept that. We cannot shelter Kiryu-san here.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: But, boss!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda, that’s enough. The man’s made his position clear. …I’ll find somewhere else.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: How about a cup of tea before you leave? You may remain my guest until you’re done.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No thanks. I won’t put you out.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Outside.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I apologize, Kiryu-san. I underestimated Chen-san’s fear of the Dojima Family.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I remember Kazama-san talking about it once. That the family grew to its current size by taking foreigners’ turf. He said it was pretty brutal.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Yeah… That was before we came to Kamurocho, though. I guess that’s why it’s a deeper wound for Chen-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: It’s fine. I’ll get out of here. Get in touch when you can.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: If not here, might I recommend you seek refuge in West Park? I’m afraid it is not as safe as this place…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: West Park?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: The homeless have gathered there. It should offer you a certain degree of camouflage from Dojima’s men.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: All right… But I feel like all I’m doing is hiding. Are you making any progress on the Empty Lot? The plan was for you to pin down the owner, right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Yes, though I will have to speak more on that later. Head to West Park and weather the night there. I will return for you tomorrow.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Didn’t think I’d be sleeping outside in this cold.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I haven’t the words…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Heh, care to join me, then?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: The two of us together would attract unwanted attention. Besides, I have preparations to make for tomorrow.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Preparations? …What for?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Nothing too elaborate.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I see. Then I’ll see you tomorrow?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Yes. Take care until then. Do whatever you must to stay off the Dojima Family’s radar.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Understood. (Tachibana said I should head for West Park. I don’t have anyplace else, now that I’ve been kicked out of Little Asia. Might as well take his advice.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (This is West Park. Hope there’s somewhere for me to sleep.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Oh, it’s you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: What, you forget? You bought us a round a while back. We told you where to find those Tachibana Real Estate guys.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Ah, that’s right. You guys were at Public Park 3.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Yep, that’s us. You remember, huh? Anyway, what brings you out here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I lost my home. Same as you guys.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: You serious? Welcome to the club, buddy.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Thanks. Hey… Any chance you know of a place I could sleep for the night? As long as I don’t freeze, I’m not picky.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Sure, yeah. You can crash in my space. Just, uh… No funny business, yeah? I don’t swing that way.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tch, you’re a regular comedian…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Haha, sorry. Come on, my place is right over here. Under the blue tarp. Make yourself comfortable. For you, only… Does 100 grand a night sound fair?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: I’m kidding, buddy! Just a joke. Look, buy me another drink sometime and we’re golden.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I really appreciate it. Thanks.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Bah, no trouble.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (This has to be the shelter he mentioned. Should at least keep me from freezing to death. I should call it a day.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Later that night.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Shouting Voice
Text: Get lost, you trash! You’re stinking the place up!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What now…?  Hey, wake up!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Hrrngh…? Aw, shit… It’s them!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: The Dojima Family?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Dojima? What’re you saying? These guys are homeless hunters!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Homeless Hunter
Text: Yo, we got two live ones over here!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hobo Harasser
Text: Hey, hey, hey, heyyy!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Homeless Hunter
Text: Ehh? That bum’s dressed different. He don’t look homeless.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hobo Harasser
Text: Who cares? He’s hanging out here, so he’s just more garbage.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Eaaagh!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bum Basher
Text: Don’t you run!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: S-Stop it!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bum Basher
Text: Who you giving orders to, old fart? I think you meant, “Please stop, sir!“

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s waving a bat, but Kiryu hits him in the face.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Homeless Hunter
Text: The hell is this guy?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Hobo Harasser
Text: Aww, shit. Now you’ve done it. Serious injury like this, you’re gonna need to cough up some hospital fees.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You’re seriously hopeless, kid.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Homeless Hunter
Text: You said it, boss. We’re just kids. Totally legal minors! We could kill a guy and not do a day’s time.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You think prison’s the worst punishment out there? You’ve got a lot to learn about the world.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Homeless Hunter
Text: Ooh, this one talks big. Heheh, you wanna go?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bum Basher
Text: Yo, that asshole hit me! Cave his skull in!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Homeless Hunter
Text: That’s the plan. And let’s take this one all the way… I always wanted to watch a guy die!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu punishes bats armed hunters.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bum Basher
Text: Ow, OWW! What the hell, man? Are you fucking kidding me?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu slowly approaches him and grabs his collar, lifting him from the ground.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bum Basher
Text: H-Hey, stop it! You think you can get away with this!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Get away from who, exactly?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bum Basher
Text: Ngh… F-Fine, I’m sorry, okay? I’m sorry! Just let me go! Please!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You call that an apology? Besides, you’re telling it to the wrong guy.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bum Basher
Text: Wuh…?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu drags him to a bearded homeless man.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bum Basher
Text: Waugh!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [The homeless man has a bat in his hand.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Hey. This is yours, isn’t it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bum Basher
Text: Uhh…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: You were about to use it to split my head open. So I’m guessing it’s yours, right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bum Basher
Text: D-Don’t! Get away from me, freak!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Shh! People are trying to sleep. Keep it down.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He raises the bat above his head.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bum Basher
Text: W-Waaaaugh!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Some time later, in the homeless man’s hut…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Thank you. I’m only alive right now ‘cause you were here. Those kids have been attacking my friends for a while, the little shits. Hopefully they won’t be coming back now.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Here’s hoping.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Oh yeah, I never got your name, buddy.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: It’s Kiryu.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Kiryu-san. I see… Thought it might be. Been hearing that name a lot lately, what with Dojima’s men scouring the city. Haha, don’t worry. There’s not a man here who would sell you out. Not after tonight. We take our debts seriously here.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Heh. Good to hear.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [On the next day.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Yo, Kiryu-san. You got a guest. Says he’s looking for you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: A guest? …is the Dojima Family?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: No, said he was with Tachibana Real Estate. I told him I’d never heard of you, just in case.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nice. Thanks for that. Where is he now?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: His car’s over by the park entrance. Check it out, if you’re curious.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Tachibana said he’d come for me. I should head for the park entrance.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [At the park entrance…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Yo, Kiryu-kun.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda? What, you’re my ride?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Seems so. You sleep okay last night? Cold one, huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: It was fine. At least I had a roof over my head. …So, where’s Tachibana?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: The boss is waiting for you someplace special.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Special? Where?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: It’s somewhere you’re real familiar with, actually. I won’t spoil the surprise. If you’re ready, hop in the van. Good to go?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Sure, let’s go.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Great, let’s get rolling.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [They get in the van and leave.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: …I don’t see anybody tailing us, at least for now.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: After spending the night under a tarp in the park, I feel like I’ve earned a little peace. So, where we headed? You guys find a new hideout?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Nah, not exactly. But as long as the Dojima Family are combing the streets up in Kamurocho, there’s nowhere in town you could stay hidden for long. So the boss decided to be proactive, and make his own move to shut their little search down.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: And that move is what, exactly?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: He’s somewhere you’re real familiar with, as we speak. We’re headed there to meet him.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You can’t just tell me?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Don’t have to. It’ll be obvious soon enough.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Oda brings Kiryu to a huge castle in classic Japanese style. A huge park is laid out next to the castle.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: This is… Are you joking!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Finally figured it out?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tojo Clan headquarters! Are you insane, Oda?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: The boss is inside now, bargaining with the Tojo brass for your life. He says the only way to tie Dojima’s hands… is to strike a deal even higher up the chain.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hold on. Isn’t the Tojo Clan out to end Tachibana Real Estate? Tachibana, you, and me… All three of us are dead. What were you thinking!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: You think the boss doesn’t know that? Even so… There’s always wiggle room for negotiation. This is your stop. They’ll take you to where the boss is.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: …I still say this is crazy.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: He wouldn’t have come if he weren’t confident. He knows it’s a dangerous gamble. But any business deal bears a certain amount of risk. You’re a Tachibana employee now. Shut up and trust the boss.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: …Next time, tell me before we do something like this.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [He’s leaving with two guards.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Go do your part, Kiryu-kun.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu goes up to the second floor and enters a huge office with a lot of sort chairs. He is already expected there.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Kiryu-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: As I assume you’re aware, this is the Acting Second Chairman of the Tojo Clan, Nihara-san… The highest authority within Japanese yakuza organizations.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: So, you’re Kiryu. I see. The look in your eyes reminds me of Kazama’s, when he was young.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [TAKASHI NIHARA. Acting Second Chairman of the Tojo Clan.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: Sit wherever you like.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No, sir, I’ll stand.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: As you like. Shall we begin, then?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: As I was saying earlier, my goal is for my company and the Tojo Clan to coexist peacefully in Kamurocho.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: We welcome anyone who wants to come to Kamurocho. That’s a large part of why our city’s grown as it has. However… those with no fear of the Tojo crest are the sole exception. The business you’ve been doing flies in the face of that one rule.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I assure you I understand precisely how fearsome the Tojo Clan can be. The purpose of my visit today is to show the depth of my deference, in material form.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: So you’ve come bearing gifts, have you?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Indeed. And with the hope that you will hear one humble request, Chairman.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: …Out with it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Please issue an order as Tojo Clan Chairman instructing the Dojima Family to pursue Kiryu-san no further. Nihara-san, I am not certain whether news has reached you, but the Dojima Family seeks to kill Kiryu-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: Dojima isn’t an idiot. If the boy is being hunted, he’s done something to earn it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: The Dojima Family is pursuing Kiryu-san in order to get to me. Because I possess certain key intelligence necessary to acquiring the Empty Lot.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: The Empty Lot… I see. Dojima can scarce afford to let an outsider beat him to that plot. But the profits from that project will be coming back to the Tojo Clan. I have no reason to help you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: If I may shift topics somewhat, am I correct in my understanding that the Dojima Family is your top earner? As I understand it, there is no one even within Tojo Clan headquarters equal in power to Dojima’s faction… including you, Chairman.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: …Dojima tithes a massive amount to the clan. He’s a competent and loyal subordinate.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: He is also the likeliest successor to the Tojo chairmanship at present. It is quite probable that Sohei Dojima will be the clan’s third chairman in the near future.
