Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: And what of it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: If the Dojima Family succeeds in acquiring the Empty Lot, it will grant him even greater wealth and influence. It would mean the rise of an absolute autocrat within the Tojo Clan. Men of that sort seldom remember to pay deference to those still above them. Put frankly, your long years spent climbing to the top will only earn you a retirement spent impotent and forgotten.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: I beg your pardon?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Nihara-san. You must not allow Dojima to secure the Empty Lot. If a single officer grows more powerful than the entire clan above him, the Tojo Clan will undergo a drastic change.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: Dojima’s development project is a huge piece of business. The Tojo Clan will see similarly huge profits come of it. That’s all. Nothing past that will change.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Anyone blinded by such short-term concerns is unfit to lead such a grand operation… “Acting” Chairman.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: You need to learn to choose your words, boy.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Someone knocks the door.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: It appears the gift I brought has arrived.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: Let them in.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Oda enters the office with a large and heavy suitcase. He comes up to Nihara and opens it. It’s loaded with money to the top.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: 500 million. Please accept it as payment for Kiryu-san’s life.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: 500 million?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: In advance. And another 500 million once I have verified that Dojima’s men have stopped. Furthermore, offer 30% of our Kamurocho profits to Tojo Clan Headquarters.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: A single yakuza, a failed one at that… You’ll pay one billion? You think he’s worth that much?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: It is an amount I can easily make again. But a true friends… Those are harder to come by. Speaking in more immediate terms, I require Kiryu-san’s assistance to secure the Empty Lot.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: You certainly hold the boy in high regard.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: What do you say, Nihara-san? You, of course, also have the choice of offering up our heads to Dojima… Though I cannot imagine doing so would earn you much recompense from him. Now, or in the future. But, if we could instead enlist your assistance in this matter… Perhaps we can ensure that Dojima-san remains the “loyal subordinate” you describe. If I may offer a personal opinion… Dojima-san is better suited for that role than one of any real leadership.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: I see. Your reputation precedes you. You know how to spread a yakuza’s legs. Know how to use money, too. Small wonder Dojima has his hands full.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: You are too kind.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: You. Send word to Dojima. Kazuma Kiryu is Tojo Headquarters property now. He can keep his hands off.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I sincerely appreciate your time, Acting Second Chairman.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Tachibana, Oda and Kiryu bow and leave.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: Kiryu. Kazama was your age once… Do you know what sort of yakuza he was?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No, sir. Not specifically.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: In a word… unrivaled. Strong and fearless. Even I admired how dauntless he was. He redefined what it meant to be a man. If I could go back and buy him for a billion… I’d do it in a heartbeat. Are you a man worth a billion yen as well? I look forward to finding out.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu bow and they leave the office. There’s a whole gang of scumbags waiting for them on the first floor. All this reminds me of a scene from “Kill Bill.“]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I guess your money didn’t buy us the right to walk out the door.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I expected such a response if our negotiations failed, not succeeded. The yakuza certainly keep things interesting.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Just means they’re stabbing us in the back!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That’s not it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: What is it, then!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Though the business side of things has been resolved, there is still a matter of protocol. We need only walk this gauntlet, and I expect they will uphold their end of the bargain.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That’s the idea.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Walk this gauntlet… That’s insane! We’re smack-dab in the middle of Tojo HQ!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Insane or not, this is how the yakuza work. Oda, you stick with Tachibana.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Shit… I’m on it!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu jumps on the first floor and starts to make his way to the exit on the heads of the yakuza.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Kiryu-san! Are you all right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah… Looks like you guys are, too.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Yes, I had Oda-san to see to that.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Well, forget walking out the front door… These assholes are sending every man they’ve got against three people!

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Are you so surprised? I thought we both came here knowing the risks.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Well sure, but…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: We have weathered worse storms together numerous times. And we have Kiryu-san with us today. This hardly seems impossible.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Heh… Guess I forgot. All right, then let’s do this thing! Can’t let the rookie think he’s the only one pulling his weight here.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Okay, let’s head through there and outside.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Right. Lead on.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu fights a whole crowd of yakuza in a park by the Tojo Clan headquarters. At the end, he kicks out the closed gate with one of them.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Are you okay?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Yes, somehow… We should hurry, though.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Exit’s that way. Let’s go.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Is… Is everybody still in one piece?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Let’s not linger here. Come.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [They’re going out on the road. Kiryu turns and exchanges a gaze with Nihara and then leaves too.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Nihara
Text: Kazuma Kiryu… I can see why Kazama would take an interest. He too, may turn into a real monster one day.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [The Dojima Family HQ.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Sohei Dojima
Text: Tojo HQ have gone and stuck their noses in the Kiryu situation. The Dojima Family is “not to touch” Kazama Kiryu.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Keiji Shibusawa
Text: That’s Tachibana Real Estate’s doing, boss. With the pressure we put on them, they had nowhere to ruh but clan headquarters. Anyone could have seen this coming.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Sohei Dojima
Text: Kuze and Awano didn’t, apparently.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Keiji Shibusawa
Text: But I did, and I can see how Tachibana plans to use Kiryu next, too.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Sohei Dojima
Text: I see. Tired of waiting your turn and holding back around Kuze and Awano, Shibusawa?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Keiji Shibusawa
Text: The Empty Lot is yours…  And I’m the one who’s going to hand it to you, boss.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Meanwhile, in some port, our heroes are taking their breath away…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: How long are we going to stand around here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: This is my first moment of rest in a long while. A fellow has to slow down now and again or he’ll never last. I’m a frail man, after all.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Heh. If you can hold your own against a pack of yakuza that size, you’re doing all right.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I was desperate then, that’s all.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tell me one thing.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Yes?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Why pay a billion for somebody like me? And wind up owing Tojo HQ a favor on top of that. You said you got money and power, and you’re using it to gun for the Tojo Clan. That’s why you’re after the Empty Lot. Why, then? Unless you’ve got some other motive. And if so, why risk your neck for the Empty Lot like this? Is there some other meaning to that plot I’m not seeing?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: That’s…a trade secret. Perhaps you’ll let me leave it at that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: A trade secret you can’t tell an employee? Man, the guys you hire sure have their work cut out for them. Even staying alive is a chore.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Which is precisely why I need men like you. And precisely why Kazama-san brought you to me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: But we’re still no closer to the Empty Lot. What’s our next move? What should I be doing?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: There has been movement on that front. Last night, I was at last able to locate the owner of the Empty Lot. In Osaka’s pleasure district, Sotenbori.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Sotenbori?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Yes. Though I fear we cannot make our move just yet. Another faction in Sotenbori is already in pursuit there.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You’re saying, someone else knows who the owner is?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: If I had to wager, I’d say someone from the Shibusawa Family.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Shibusawa? He knows?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: But the real problem is that beyond Shibusawa, the Omi Alliance has begun to move as well.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: The Omi Alliance? They’re after the Empty Lot, too!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Indeed. And I do not yet know the scale of their efforts. To us, Sotenbori is a more dangerous place right now than Kamurocho. At the very least, any action on our part will have to wait until we have a clearer picture of the situation.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That doesn’t sound like you at all.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Oh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: It’s like Oda said. Any business proposition has its share of risks. Wasn’t it you who taught him that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: And with your kidneys, you can’t leave Little Asia for long. But I’ve had enough of just running around. I never was the type to sit and wait to begin with. I’m headed to Sotenbori whether you want me to or not. I just need to bring the owner back up to Kamurocho, yeah?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Yes, but…

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: I’m going with him. I’m with Kiryu on this one, boss. It’s BECAUSE the situation in Sotenbori’s so murky that we should go and take direct action ourselves. If anyone else gets their hands on the Empty Lot before us, all our work up to now goes up in smoke. If we play it safe, we’ll be late to the party.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You make a good point every once in a while, Oda.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: So you wish to go despite the danger? You would travel to Sotenbori and take on that risk for us, Kiryu-san?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: This is not a company order, so whatever happens… don’t expect any workman’s comp.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Heh. You’ve already shelled out a billion yen for me, boss. I think that’s more than my fair share.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Is that so? In that case, I’m on board.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Oda brings Kiryu to Sotenbori.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Kiryu-san, please make any preparations you must before departing for Sotenbori.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Will do. What about you?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: We will return to Little Asia. I will arrange with Chen-san for you to meet us in the restaurant we spoke at earlier. Oda-san and I will await you there.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: It looks like most of Dojima’s boys have cleared off the streets. Seems the Tojo Chairman pulled those strings, as promised. Still… Don’t get careless, Kiryu-kun.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I won’t.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: All right, see you later.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Oda and Tachibana drives away.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Didn’t expect the owner of the Empty Lot to turn up in Sotenbori. It may be a while before I’m back in Kamurocho. I should make sure I’m ready before heading out. Thankfully the Sugita Building’s close. Might not be a bad idea to make some extra money there, just in case. I should head for Chen’s restaurant once I’m ready to go. Shouldn’t have any problems getting into Little Asia now.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Text: [Kiryu completes all his business in Kamurocho and returns to Little Asia.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Yo, Kiryu-kun. If you’re ready, let’s skip town. Get down to Sotenbori. No unfinished business left here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, I’m good to go.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Oda
Text: Okay. Then head on in. The boss is waiting inside.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I am glad you have arrived, Kiryu-san. Before you head for Sotenbori, I wanted to speak to you about the owner of the Empty Lot.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Right.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: The owner is presently in the care of… an organization allied to our cause.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: And what organization is that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Oda-san can give you the details regarding that at a later time. However, Osaka is the Omi Alliance’s backyard. It is impossible to hide anyone from them for long. The success of our plan lies in how quietly we are able to extract the Lot’s owner from the city, and how quickly.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Makes sense. So me and Oda will handle that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Yes. You two are the only ones I can entrust with this task. Earlier, you asked what meaning the Empty Lot held for me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, and you said it was a “trade secret.“

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Yes, however… I expect that I will be able to share it with you soon. Once you return safely from Sotenbori. Consider it one more reason to make it back to Kamurocho alive… Kiryu-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Deal. So… What did you want to tell me about the Empty Lot’s owner?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: She is a young woman. Though, I am told she is sight impaired. She is functionally blind.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: The owner of the Empty Lot… is a woman named Makoto Makimura.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: A woman finds herself in the crosshairs of several criminal organizations… Makoto Makimura. Searching for the reason she is targeted, Majima earns the trust of Lee, a Chinese acupuncturist who has looked after Makoto. Lee had once worked as a hitman for a mainland syndicate. Makoto’s two defenders are then faced with a new challenge
Text: The Omi’s Kijin Clan boss, Homare Nishitani. Kansai is the domain of the Omi Alliance, and Nishitani and Sagawa clash for control of Makoto. As the web around Makoto comes into focus, Majima’s clandestine efforts to shield her… are discovered by Sagawa. In the end, Makoto falls into the hands of a mysterious man who steps out from the black of night in a white suit…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Who… Who are you?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [A man in a white suit hits him with the handle of a pistol and Majima loses consciousness. Then he picks up Makoto. Sagawa watches everything that happens. It’s been a while… Sagawa beats up Majima in some basement.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Son of a…! Fucking hurts!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima’s already maimed.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Majima-chan, man. Didn’t I warn you? If you can get by without killing, do it. But you took the job, Majima-chan. I was all ready to call up brother Shimano and get you set up with the Tojo Clan again. But then you couldn’t kill Makoto Makimura. Look, fine, okay. Let’s be generous here and say I understand the sentiment. Back when I was a brat, I found a sparrow with a broken leg and took it home. Tried to nurse it behind my mom’s back. What’d I call it…? Mametaro, maybe? Never once had an interest in animals till then, but I fed the damn thing every day. Cute little shit, too. But I shouldn’t have lied to my parents. One day, I get home and they’re feeding it to the cat. I watched little Mametaro get eaten alive. I saw in a moment of clarity… That a kid can’t play his parents.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I bet you were a model son.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Model son? True, I was a sweet, obedient kid. In front of my parents.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Day after that… I killed their damn cat.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He plays with the bat he was given and strikes… but stops a millimeter in Majima’s face. He drops the bat.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: (to Majima’s ear) And sure as shit… I’ll kill you too. But before I do… We’re gonna snuff that tidy son of a whore who stole Makoto Makimura. Our pristine thief wasn’t a familiar face around these parts. He an old friend of yours, Majima-chan?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Never seen the guy.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Uh-huh…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Why’s everybody and their mother out for this girl anyway!? She ain’t running any prostitution ring or whatever you said. What value’s one lady got to these guys?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: You want to know? Well, I couldn’t tell you if I wanted to. I don’t got a damn clue myself.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: “Use Majima to kill a person named Makoto Makimura.” That’s all my bro ever gave me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: “Bro“? So the one who wants the girl dead is Shimano? These are Patriarch Shimano’s orders!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Yup. That’s the whole reason why this was going to be your big chance to get back into the Tojo Clan.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Why’s the boss want me killin’ anybody?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Beats me. Not my place to know, apparently… Back to the point here, you really have no clues on Mr. White Suit?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: None. Though there is one thing buggin’ me…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: He took her, but it didn’t look like he wanted her dead. Same as Nishitani.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Huh? Hold up. Nishitani, as in the Kijin Clan guy who made a scene over at the Grand?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: He was there to say I owed him Makoto since he went and made me a stand-in body. If he just wanted her dead, he wouldn’t go to all that trouble.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Nishitani got you a body double… Strange. That’s the first I’m hearing of it. But at least we know Nishitani and the white suited asshole are after the same thing. Decent odds they’re in it together.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Could be.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: So Nishitani picks up a random stray and makes him look like a new challenger… Feels like a Nishitani special. I’d love to go drop the hammer on Nishitani and get him to spill the girl’s location, but since he got picked up by the cops, he’s still cooling in the tank…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sure, but even if we can’t get at Nishitani, it sounded like his boys knew somethin’ too.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He remembers something a yakuza he bets up…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: You don’t know anythin’… Got no clue what she’s worth.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Hmmm… Then start with them. The Kijin Clan offices are on Sotenbori Street East, in a place called the Third Namiki Building. Third floor, if I remember.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Alright…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: And Majima-chan? There’s nothing you’re hiding from me past that bit about Nishitani… is there?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: …Nothin’.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Uh-huh. ‘Cause if there is…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You’ll kill me. That what you’re gettin’ at?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: You’re catching on, Majima-chan.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima is being released. He gets dressed and goes out on the streets.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (The Kijin Clan offices are in the Third Namiki Building on Sotenbori Street East. Time to go ask the boys there real nice where Makoto is.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (The Kijin Clan office is up on the third floor here… All good to go up and bust some heads? Alright, time to get acquainted!]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kijin Clan Thug
Text: Huh!? M-Majima!? The hell’re you doin’ here!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yo. Where’s Makoto Makimura at?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kijin Clan Thug
Text: What!? You got brain damage or somethin’?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: The guy who stole her from me… He’s a buddy of Nishitani’s, ain’t he? So where is she now!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kijin Clan Thug
Text: I got no clue what you’re on about. Even if I did, I wouldn’t tell yer sorry ass a goddamn thing! The hell do you think ya are, comin’ up here all casual like you’re askin’ directions? This is a yakuza office, genius. Show some respect.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: So what, you tellin’ me I should let my fists do the askin’? How many times you clowns already lost to me? I think we both know how this one ends. Now, do you know where the girl is, or don’t ya? Let’s have it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kijin Clan Thug
Text: Doesn’t matter if we do or if we don’t, you ain’t walkin’ out that door alive!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You guys gotta be masochists. Alright, then… I’ll make ya cough up everything you know!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He beats up all the thugs in the office. After that, he grabbed one of them by the collar.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kijin Clan Thug
Text: …Aghah!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’m askin’ with my fists now. Where is Makoto Makimura!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kijin Clan Thug
Text: I… I really… I dunno!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: That the truth?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kijin Clan Thug
Text: I really don’t know! We thought you still had her this whole time!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: If that’s the case, who’s the stick-up-the-ass that took her from me!? You tellin’ me he ain’t with Nishitani!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kijin Clan Thug
Text: E-Even if it was someone the boss knows, we haven’t heard! The boss never tells us anything! About the girl, or why he wants her! Honest… If you got questions, you gotta go ask the boss himself!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nishitani is rotting in a jail cell at the moment!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kijin Clan Thug
Text: So why don’t you get put in there with him?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You tryin’ to be funny!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kijin Clan Thug
Text: W-Wait! It ain’t a joke! You just gotta ask Billiken-san!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Billiken?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kijin Clan Thug
Text: Yeah. Detective called Billiken-san. He’s the boss’s liaison with the police. Ask him, and he might sneak you in to see the boss!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What, I give this guy a bribe?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kijin Clan Thug
Text: That’s his call, not mine. He won’t let just anybody through, but he’s your best chance. Go talk to him! He hangs out on Bishamon Bridge!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hmmm… Alright. I can buy that. You wanna know why Nishitani never clues you monkeys in on shit?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kijin Clan Thug
Text: …Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You run your mouths soon as somebody slaps ya around.  Can’t stand yakuza with loose lips.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Outside.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (This Billiken guy’s a detective who can get me into the can to see Nishitani. Hangs out on Bishamon Bridge, the guy said… It’s worth a look. ]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [On the bridge, he finds an old man smoking and looking at the water.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hey… any chance you’re Billiken-san?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Hmmm? Who’re you, slim?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Name’s Goro Majima. Word on the street is that if I ask nice, you’ll let me in to see Nishitani in the can.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Hmmmmm.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: There’s somethin’ I gotta get in there and ask him about, whatever it takes.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: And you’re Nishitani’s what, now? Buddy of his?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I ain’t his friend. Nishitani’s an enemy. And an asshole.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: And you think I’m bringin’ somebody who says they’re his enemy in to see him?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You prefer I say we’re best friends when you know I’m lyin . Nishitani’s a cautious guy. He wouldn’t pick a cop who can’t sniff out a lie to be his man. Figured bein’ honest about it saves us both the time.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Huh. Ain’t that considerate? Still ain’t gettin’ me to say, “Sure thing, right this way.“

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Didn’t think it would. What’s your price?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Have some class… Shit, these days everybody tries to handle everything with money.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Whaddya want, then?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Majima, you said? Come join me for a drink.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Timing’s perfect. See? Boat’s right there.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: A pleasure barge? We drinkin’ on some historical tour?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Just shut up and get on the damn boat. You want in to see Nishitani, right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [We switch to the boat designed in classic Japanese way. Billiken drinks come sake.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Majima, was it? You’re Nishitani’s what, now?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I told ya, we’re enemies. You drunk already?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: More than one kinda enemy, right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: How you figure?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Some enemies ya wanna put in the ground…  then there’s the kind ya mighta been friends with if things’d been different.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I only just met Nishitani. Hardly even know the guy. You known him for a long time?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Long enough. He was practically a baby when we met.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: So what kinda kid was he?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Never seen a baby so good at shopliftin’. By kindergarten, he was pickin’ pockets and swipin’ stray bags. Shakedowns in elementary school. Breakin’ into cars by middle school. He was that kinda kid.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Not so hard to imagine. Considering the pace he was keepin’, was it armed robbery by high school?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: He stabbed a guy to death. That was high school.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Guess he skipped a few grades. So what compels a detective to serve as point man for a guy like that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [he boat stops and start to… transform.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Wh-What…!? Hey! The hell’s goin’ on!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: What’s a drink without a show?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [The floor they sat on falls to the bottom of the river in a glass container.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Where… Where’s this thing goin’!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: The Bed of Styx.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Bed of… Styx?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Later on, they walk a long underground corridor.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What is this place?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Tunnels were dug back in the war, who knows why. I made a few changes.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You made this?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Technically conned some rich pricks into doin’ it for me. Place ain’t got an official name. The people who know about it took to callin’ it the Bed of Styx.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Picked a real cheery name.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Place like this got no business bein’ cheery. After all, this place is…  …where criminals become executioners.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Billiken leads Majima to a large hall where fights without rules takes place. A huge crowd roars with delight. Weary fighters beat each other up with the last of their strength.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: This world’s fulla criminals the law can’t touch. Killers without the evidence to nail ‘em. Terrorists walkin’ free ‘cause they’re friends with the right politician… We take guys like that from around the world, and we throw ‘em down here.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What’re they fightin’ for?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: They make it through a year of fights down here, we let ‘em go back topside. No rules at all. Cheat all you can, kill the other guy, anything goes. Nothin’ brings the animal out like a free-for-all for survival. But I don’t care how tough you are, fight every day for a year, you ain’t gonna last.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: So you’re just lettin’ convicts carry out each other’s death sentences. Real classy.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: All in the name of atonement and world peace, kid.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: And how does the audience factor into that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Heh heh… Not many places you can see guys fight for their lives. And whenever ya got somethin’ rare to offer, people are gonna pay cash. Lots of it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Atonement my ass. This is a racket.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Hey, don’t knock it. This is just an underpaid cop’s little thing on the side.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Alright, why’d ya bring me down here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Truth be told, the convict lineup here ain’t changed in a while. Matches are gettin’ stale. People’s wallets got a way of closin’ up when they get bored. Sooo, if you spiced up the ring a little, maybe it’d be the shot this place needs…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You tellin’ me to fight?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Nobody’s askin’ you to stay down here a year. Win against three or so guys and that’d be plenty. I’ll take ya to meet Nishitani after.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Cops as rotten as you are a rare breed, pal… But fine. I’ll go take my disgust out on the guy in the ring.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Hoped you’d say that.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Then you’re takin’ me to see Nishitani after the third guy, or you get to be number four.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Yeah, you got my word. Alright, I’ll have ‘em work you into the next match. You ready to fight?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah, I’m good. Just gotta put three guys down, right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Heh, I hope it goes as easy for ya as you make it sound… Well, good luck all the same.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima’s coming into the ring.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Ring Announcer
Text: Aaand now to unveil the next fight on today’s card! You all know our very own cannibal clown, the serial killer who ate all the evidence… Gingerrrrr Chapman! And in the challenger’s corner, a new fallen star freshly landed in the Bed of Styx, the one-eyed monster whose crimes are literally unspeakable… Goroooo Majimaaaaaa! No time limits, no rules!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima win the fight.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Ring Announcer
Text: WHAT AN UPSET! The one-eyed monster, Goro Majima, appears out of nowhere with a resounding win in his debut match! Expectations for round two are soaring! Let’s get right to it, folks. The next killer to take the ring is this man! The pleasure-killing practitioner who passed his patients’ deaths off as natural causes… Doctor Kirihitoooo! Can Goro Majima manage an encore victory!? No time limits, no rules!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima win the second fight.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Ring Announcer
Text: The magic is real, people! Goro Majima wins again! I don’t think anybody saw this coming, and the crowd is throbbing with excitement! …But I’m afraid our mysterious rookie rumbler’s streak may be at its end. That’s right, in his next fight, he’ll face the legend himself! He’s the world champion of “accidental” in-fight deaths, the reaper of the ring, immune from the law… Dead Puncher! Which of these warriors will be the one to sink into the Styx!? No time limits! No rules!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima win the last fight.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Ring Announcer
Text: ITS OVERRRRRRR! Ladies and gents, we just witnessed the birth of a new legend, and its name is Majima! GORO MAJIMA!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima lights a cigarette and goes to Billiken.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: You can fight. Been a while since we had matches that good. Whaddya say? Any interest in spicin’ the ring up here and there in the future? There’s money in it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Not sure you could afford me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Every time. It’s always about the money…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah, world’s a bitch. I won my three rounds. Time for you to come through on your side of the bargain.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Fair’s fair. Follow me…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They’re going back to the bridge.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Crazy. I never imagined somethin’ like that was hidin’ at the bottom of this filthy trough.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Dirty water serves a function when it hides things. Sometimes it’s best when ya can’t see the bottom…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: A little dirt can hide away the real ugly truths. The stuff nobody wants to see.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Years back, the body of a high school gal came floatin’ up to the surface. Poor thing’s face was beat unrecognizable. Body stabbed a few dozen times… Victim came from a single-parent home. A dad raisin’ his little princess as best he could… But our investigation went nowhere. Couldn’t pin down a perp.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Talk about a kick in the dick…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Took a year before we finally tracked the guy down, but… it only wound up bringin’ the girl’s dad lower.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What happened?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Perp was a street punk minor. No court, no hard time. He got outta juvie and was back on the streets like he never did a thing. You got any idea what that does to a guy? To a father?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Musta been unbearable… I’d want to kill that kid.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: You ain’t alone… Kid turned up dead with a couple dozen stab wounds

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What, so the girl’s old man…?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Nope. Guy who did it was a high school kid named Nishitani.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nishitani!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Nishitani had been in the care of the victim’s old man ever since he was just an ankle biter. Gotta figure Nishitani was able to sense it. How bad the old man was hurtin’. Some people’re born to be monsters. Some jobs, only a monster can do. Ain’t the sorta jobs that earn any proper thanks, but it makes those of us livin’ on the right side better off. After he realized why Nishitani did what he did, the old dad went and built the Bed of Styx. Now I hear he’s Nishitani’s liaison with the force…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What!? So the girl was your…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Let’s get goin’. Alright, I’m good to bring ya down to the clink. You all set?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Maijma
Text: Yeah, I’ve been ready. Let’s go pay Nishitani a visit already.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Right… Follow me, then.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They go into some building that says “蒼天堀警察署”/ Satenbori Police Station. Billiken is handcuffed Majima as a criminal and leads him to the cell.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Jailer
Text: Oh. Hard work as always, Billiken-san.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Biliken
Text: Yeah, nabbed a real beast for ya this time.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He gives him a few folded bills 10,000 yen each - about 100,000 yen.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Biliken
Text: Book him, huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Jailer
Text: Hm? Isn’t this more than usual?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Just take it. Your daughter’s startin’ college this year, right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Jailer
Text: Thanks, sir.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: In ya go. Have fun, now.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Appreciate it, old man.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: I’m sure you and Nishitani’ll get on great.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Jailer
Text: I’ll go make us some tea.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima walks into the cell and looks around. The inmates are sitting at the corners, immersed in routine. Nishitani sleeps on the floor. Majima comes and kicks him.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Jailer
Text: Hey, Nishitani. Hey!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [The other inmates obviously didn’t like this behavior. They’re surrounding Majima.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Huuuh?  It’s cool, it’s cool… Majima-kun, my boy! What happened? Get caught shopliftin?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I came to see you, Nishitani.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: You serious? I’m flattered, pal! I was just thinkin’ how much I wanted to see you again, too.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh? Whaddaya want with me?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Wasn’t our last little scrap a riot? Just thinkin’ about it’s got me leakin’! But the damn cops had to come spoil it before we got to the climax, huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You’re the genius who called ‘em.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: I played by your rules, Majima-kun… Couldn’t fight ya in the club otherwise! Anyway, it was great, but even the best fights don’t count if ya don’t get to finish! It’s kinda like baseball… A play that’ll go down in history don’t mean shit if the game’s called for rain, y’know?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Game still counts if it’s past the bottom of the fifth.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: What’re ya talkin’ about? That fight was still the top of the first! I wanna pick it back up where we left off, ‘cause it’d be too fun not to!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You’re a weird guy, man. But that ain’t what I came here for.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Makoto’s been taken. Was it your man who took her?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: What, this is a business call?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He waves and one of the prisoners runs up to him offering him a cigarette. He also offers Majima a cigarette. He reluctantly takes it.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Makoto’s captor wore a white suit. Never seen the guy in play before. Is he a buddy of yours or not?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: I don’t got any friends like that.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: But I’ve got a pretty good hunch. A third party, neither your side or mine.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: A third party? So who the hell is he?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Like I say, I got a few guesses.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You know or not!? Who!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [A jailer approaches the cell and offers Nishitani an ashtray.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Jailer
Text: Hey, Nishitani-san. Here.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [One of the prisoners takes it away.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Oh, hey. Think you could buy us some drinks? Make it somethin’ nice. We got company,

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Jailer
Text: Understood, sir. Gimme just a moment.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: The hell is goin’ on in here?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: In our line of work, safe hideaways are in short supply. You got the same problems, don’t ya?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Well, you’re lookin’ at the safest safehouse in Japan. Best security the taxpayers can buy.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You think you’re safe with these guys around?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Ain’t nobody dumb enough to come at me with just their fists. It’s always knives, guns, some other bullshit. Can’t get behind bars with those toys though. I sleep like a baby in here. Home, sweet home.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nishitani… Who’s this third party that swiped Makoto?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Ahh, right. I’m sure you’re curious, Majima-kun, and they ain’t the sorta guys yer pal Sagawa could pin down in a million years. I should be a pal and tell ya, but maybe I won’t. What to do…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You best clue me in, or I’ll make sure the next beat down ain’t half as fun for ya as the last one.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Keep sweet-talkin’ me like that and you’re gonna get my hopes up, Majima-kun! You’re tellin’ me I’m about to get even more from you than I got the last time!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sure you want it? Be a shame to break half yer bones in the comfort of your second home here.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: I can’t wait! Just lookin’ at somebody strong gets my juices flowin’. I’m rock hard, buddy 01’ pal. Can’t hold this back!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You just get weirder and weirder… Guess you’re in luck. I’ll smack you down till you stay there!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima beats Nishitani’s ass.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Huff… Ha… This fuckin’ guy… You’re makin’ me fall in love all over again here, Majima-kun!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You’re… pretty entertainin’ yourself… Yer pal Billiken was right. If we’d met better, we mighta been good friends.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: We met with a reason to beat on each other. How you gonna go and improve on that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Shit, now you’re startin’ to sound reasonable… So, let’s hear it. Who’s this third party?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Hey, Majima-kun? Screw that raisin-dick Sagawa and come work with me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They talk business for some time and then…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Makoto-chan’s third group of hunters is a pack of wolves who call themselves the Nikkyo Consortium.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nikkyo Consortium?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: They report to the Tojo Clan, directly.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Tojo Clan? You’re crazy. I ain’t even heard of a group called the Nikkyo Consortium there.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: ‘Course ya haven’t. They ain’t the sort of operation that’s flashin’ the Tojo crest. Whole thing’s underground. Makoto-chan’s man is probably the Nikkyo group’s president himself, Masaru Sera.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Masaru… Sera?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Few days back, I got word that Sera had his pack in the neighborhood. I figured it probably had somethin’ to do with our girl, Makoto-chan.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Why’re two groups from the Tojo Clan after the same girl?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Two?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: My kill order came down from my old boss, Patriarch Shimano.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Shimano, like the Tojo’s Shimano Family?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah. Sera and Shimano are both Tojo…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Long as we’re talkin’ Tojo, I got another tidbit for ya.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Guy who hired me’s a Dojima lieutenant. Name’s Shibusawa.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Dojima Family!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Yeah, another direct Tojo Clan family. So we got Sera’s Nikkyo Consortium, the Shimano Family givin’ you orders, and the Dojima Family… All three of ‘em Tojo Clan.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Shit… The hell’s goin’ on here!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Pretty real, huh? I mean, not like Tojo Clan infightin’s anything I give two shits about, but hey.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You know where this Nikkyo bunch is hidin’?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: I do my homework.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Where is it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Whaddya plannin’ to do when you hear?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Go get Makoto back, obviously.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Nope.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Majima-kun, you’ve shown me how strong ya are, but… those Nikkyo fucks aren’t the kinda guys ya take on alone.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: And why’s that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: They do the kinda work even the Tojo don’t want their names on. Black ops shit. They’re like the CIA in America or the Soviet KGB. That said… You and me team up, and things start to get more stimulatin’. Besides, that ain’t the only perk of signin’ on with me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Go on.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Sagawa’s orders are to kill Makoto-chan, right? Long as you’re workin’ for him, your fairy tale ends with a bullet in the girl. But nobody’s askin’ me to kill her. All my guy wants is for me to bundle her up and ship her over. You ditch Sagawa and come with me, you never have to worry about havin’ to hurt Makoto-chan.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sorry, but I’ll pass.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Why, though?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: That Nikkyo guy, Sera, didn’t look like he was gonna kill Makoto, either. If all I wanted was to keep her alive, I’d just sit tight and let the Nikkyo bunch hold on to her. But the underworld’s already fed off that girl more than enough. Took her goddamn sight away… I couldn’t kill Makoto… That means I got a responsibility for her bein’ alive. That don’t end just ‘cause I know she’s still drawin’ breath. I’m responsible for lettin’ her live a real life. As a person, not as scraps for the beasts.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Goddammit.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: I’m pissed I’m only just meetin’ a guy like you now. It’s a goddamn shame.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Where’s this comin’ from?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Heh, seriously… The hell’s a guy like me doin’ getting all sentimental? The Nikkyo Consortium’s camped at the Camellia Grove.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Camellia Grove?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Wait, you been down here how long and never been there?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Me and Sotenbori got a complicated relationship… So? The hell is the Camellia Grove?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Nickname for an old dining and lodging district. Real traditional and historic. The Consortium’s set up in the Benten Inn. Makoto-chan’s gotta be in there.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Some inn?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: The Grove ain’t the sorta place that turns up in guidebooks. …You’ll get it when you see the place. I’ll take ya. Throw down on some Nikkyo guys with ya too, while I’m at it.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You sure? I ain’t lettin’ you have Makoto, even if it kills me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Ah, we can work all that out after gettin’ Makoto-chan back from the Nikkyo. Shit, I get to beat some ass with Majima-kun! How fuckin’ exciting is that! Alright! Time for us to get this party started! Paging Mr. Cop! All done here! Check out time! Majima-kun wants out too! What, nobody home? Suit yourselves…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [The cell appears to be not locked…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: We’re lettin’ ourselves out!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [A muffled gunshot is heard. Wounded Billiken coming out of the corner.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: U-Uncle B?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Billiken
Text: Run. Nishitani…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He fall on the floor.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: The hell’s all this? Uncle B!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [A jailer’s coming out of the corner. He holding a gun.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Y-You…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Jailer
Text: Billiken-san always took good care of me… But my daughter wants to go to college. I gotta take what I can get…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: The hell’re you on about?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Jailer
Text: He said if I… If I killed you guys, he’d pay me a hundred times what Billiken slips me. These Tokyo types all got deep pockets, y’know?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: You goddamn… Who bought you!? Tell me!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He shoots Nishitani.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: That… can’t be good.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nishitani!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Just like the old man always said… Make mischief long enough, and it’ll bite ya in the ass. Right… Uncle B? Majima-kun… I got a bone to pick with this fuck….

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nishitani, you’re…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Bust as many skulls as you can… And ya best have a blast doin’ it! Yakuza dyin’ early is all part of the deal. So fuck the consequences… And blaze your path… on your own terms. Right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Jailer
Text: What are you talkin’ about? Why aren’t, you dead yet!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He shoots Nishitani several more times. Ammo in his six-charged revolver is running out.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishitani
Text: Hurry it up, Majima! Makoto’s life is your responsibility… So make fuckin’ good on it! GO! Majimaaa!!!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima leaves. Nishitani is like a zombie walking slowly to the jailer.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Jailer
Text: Forgive me… P-Please, no!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [The door behind Majima closes and we hear the jailer’s desperate cry.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima runs as fast as she can through the streets of Sotenbori, knocking down passers-by. Suddenly, he runs into… Sagawa.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Welcome back, Majima-chan.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sagawa… han?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: A little bird tells me you strolled out of Sotenbori for a hot second today? Had me worried, tiger. Got me thinking somebody popped you and I’d find you bobbing in the river, y’know?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I hit the jail to meet up with Nishitani.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: You went all the way down to the slammer? That’s real dedication, kiddo!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He grabs Majima by the neck and drags it to a deserted, dirty public toilet.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Sotenbori’s not your backyard, asshole. It’s your cage! Your CAGE! When you step out at a goddamn hotel you let the front desk know! So who the fuck are you leaving your cage without a word? Huh? HUH!? So where are you off to now all in a rush?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Naturally… to come report in to you…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: That so? Oh good. ‘Cause killing you in a place like this… would break my heart. Think of the poor cleaning lady. I assume if you met with Nishitani, you got it out of him. Makoto Makimura’s location?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: …Kinda, but I also learned the guy in the white suit’s got nothin’ to do with Nishitani. Makoto’s new guy is from the Nikkyo Consortium. Sera.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Nikkyo Consortium?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: They don’t fly clan colors, but they’re on team Tojo.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Tojo Clan? Same as Shimano, then?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nishitani was on Tojo Clan payroll, too. Somebody from the Dojima Family.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: So what, there are three different factions within the Tojo Clan all gunning for Makoto Makimura? And you got all of this out of Nishitani in the can?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Damn, and Nishitani’s not an easy nut to crack. You must’ve really put it to him with some sick torture shit, yeah? What’d you do?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: This and that…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Uh huh… So, we know Makoto-chan’s popular with all the Tojo boys. Where is she now?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Some old place in the Camellia Grove. “Benten Inn.” That’s where the Nikkyo Consortium’s holed up, anyway.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: The Camellia Grove, huh? Savvy pick. Gotta hand it to these Nikkyo gents, they’ve got good taste.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Meanin’ what, exactly?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: A girl like Makoto Makimura shuffling around wailing and sobbing’s not gonna get a second look in the Grove.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: You’ll see when we get there. Let’s get moving.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh? What, you’re comin’ too?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: You see a lot of people send their dog out to walk itself? Fuck no, right? If you leave Sotenbori, it’s with me holding the leash. Understand?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hmph.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Aren’t you ready yet, Majima-chan? As we speak, those Nikkyo gents are probably doing unspeakable shit to that girl of yours. Doesn’t that make you sad? All right, we’re heading to the Grove. They’ll be expecting company--go into this half-assed and you’re gonna end up more than half dead. You ready?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’m set. Lead the way already.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Heh, somebody’s eager. Try not to disappoint me this time, yeah, Majima-chan?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Okay, let’s roll out.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They’re going over the bridge to another part of town. Majima doesn’t really seem to have ever been here. They walk into a street with a sign 園椿 / Camellia Grove above it.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Brothel Mama
Text: Whaddya say, handsome? Time for a little fun? I’ll give ya a special rate!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Sorry, granny. We’re here for one gal in particular.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Brothel Mama
Text: What a tease. Where ya goin’?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He points to a huge luxury hotel with a sign at the entrance 屋夫弁.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Right there.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: The Benten Inn… Makoto’s in there?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: If what Nishitani said was true, anyway.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’m comin’, Makoto.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They enter the building.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Which way first?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Let’s get this over quick. We split up and find the girl. I’ll take left, you take right, Majima-chan.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sure you’ll be all right on your own, Sagawa-han?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Don’t you worry about me. I’ll kill on sight, plain and simple. Whether it’s a Nikkyo goon, Sera himself, or Makoto Makimura hardly matters.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: …Try not to run outta bullets.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They run in different directions. Already at the corner, Majima is met by three strangely dressed men…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nikkyo Consortium Thug
Text: Goro Majima-san, I presume?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: And what if I am?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nikkyo Consortium Thug
Text: President Sera has no desire to claim your life. Please see yourself out and drop this matter while you’re still in the Tojo Clan’s good graces.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: How good can those graces be, comin’ from a troop of weasels that won’t even raise the clan flag?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nikkyo Consortium Thug
Text: Please be rational. If you insist on pressing further, I’m afraid we can’t allow you to live.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh. Sounds to me like you got somethin’ real tasty you’re hidin’, huh? Now ya got me real damn curious.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nikkyo Consortium Thug
Text: Are we to understand that you refuse to back down?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Goddamn right, I refuse! Now quit flappin’ your lips and decide if ya wanna fork over Makoto or get yer asses beat!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nikkyo Consortium Thug
Text: I decline both your generous offers. Don’t bother going easy on him. He needs to learn that the Nikkyo aren’t to be crossed!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima runs through the hotel corridors fighting the Nikkyo Consortium Thugs. In one of the rooms, he sees several geisha leaning in front of him.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What the--!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [The geisha get up, and we see that they’re just disguised men.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Geisha Man
Text: Nowhere to run now!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What a pain in the ass.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He kicks their asses and continues his victorious march through the floors of the hotel. On the top floor…]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sera!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [It turns out to be the same man in white suit who shot Sagawa and took Makoto.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
