Text: Impressive work, getting this far against Consortium men. I can see why you were one of Shimano’s favorites.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Makoto… Where’s Makoto Makimura!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: I’ve placed her in the care of a colleague. She just departed.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You what!? Who’s this colleague!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: No need to get riled up. I have every intention of telling you.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Trust me. I am not your enemy.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sickin’ your clowns on me is a funny way of showin’ it!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: I apologize for being so rough, but I needed to know the extent of your resolve.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: “Resolve”?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: You are aware that the Nikkyo Consortium is not the only group interested in Makoto Makimura? Most are operating just as I’d expect them to, save one surprising exception. That would be you, Majima. Three years ago, a Shimano Family man vanished without a trace. And now he turns up in Sotenbori? Furthermore, why are you involved with Makoto Makimura? The Omi Alliance’s Sagawa extorting you into making a move on her is easy enough to piece together, but after that, it gets a lot murkier… Why then betray Sagawa and help the girl? Knowing what she’s worth, are you attempting to cash in on it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Screw Makoto’s worth! I don’t--

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Exactly. You don’t know her worth. So, why risk your life getting here? Did you fall in love with her? Surely not.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: The hell do you think you know about me!? Do I need some special reason to help someone out!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: No need to get defensive. Whatever the reason, your desire to keep her safe is clear, and I have no intention of denigrating that desire. But we stand now at a crossroads for the future of the Tojo Clan. Too much blood has already been spilled. If you plan to charge into this predicament guns blazing, out of some half-baked notion to be her hero, I can’t stand idly by and watch. Hence the need to test your resolve.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah, real civilized way of doin’ it… So? How’d I score on your sweet little test?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: I’ve always been the cautious type, you see. Never could trust a result until I’d verified it with my own two hands. Majima, if you are willing to protect Makoto Makimura with your life, prove it by defeating me.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: And then you’ll tell me where you put her?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: I will. You have my word.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Pisses me off that I gotta play by your rules, but I talk faster with my fists than my mouth anyway. Fine then… You got it!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He has a fight with Nikkyo Consortium President, MASARU SERA and win.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: …Well? Satisfied?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Very… Your determination to keep Makoto Makimura safe… is painfully clear.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Then start talkin’. Who’d you pass Makoto off to?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: He’s a real estate agent.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Real estate? Why the hell’s a real estate guy got her!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Unbeknownst to her, Makoto Makimura had been willed the deed to a piece of land. Three square meters worth a billion yen--the Empty Lot.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: A billion for three square meters!? On what fuckin’ planet!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: It’s in a city you know well.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: …Kamurocho? They took Makoto to Kamurocho!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Yes. And right now, the future of the Tojo Clan hangs on who acquires that land. The billion to buy it is pocket change by comparison. That plot is the key to the Kamurocho Revitalization Project. The money and power at stake are immeasurable.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: So it takes an army of yakuza to pry the deed outta the hands of a blind girl by force? The Tojo Clan has really gone to shit since I’ve been gone…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Please believe me. I have absolutely no intention of allowing the girl to come to harm.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hey, good for you. While you’re playin’ nice, the other guys are all comin’ in hot. Already came a ball’s hair away from gettin’ lit up in a damn car bomb! And now you’re tellin’ me some house-peddler’s got her? Why not send out a formal invite sayin’ “come and get her”!?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: This particular firm is… unorthodox. As long as Makoto is in their custody, she will be safe.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: In what world are some pencil-pushers gonna be able to keep her safe!? Now gimme that name and an address!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: What do you intend to do with it?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Haul ass up to Kamurocho, obviously!

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Even if doing so only places her in greater danger?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: How do ya figure that?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: You think the company you keep will let you head out to Kamurocho alone?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sagawa…

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: He will attempt to kill Makoto Makimura by any means. If you go to Kamurocho, death will be following at your heels. If you’re truly acting out of concern for her, isn’t staying in Sotenbori to serve in Sagawa’s shackles your priority?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You got any guarantees these real estate nerds can actually keep Makoto safe?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Sera takes out a gun and throws it to Majima.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What gives?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: If you can’t trust me… Aim the gun and kill me. The real estate agent’s business card is in my breast pocket. You can take it off my corpse. I told you what I have because I trust you. Now I need to know if it’s mutual.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima’s aiming, but not shooting. He throws the gun away.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: In Kamurocho… If Makoto gets so much as scratched, I’m draggin’ you to hell.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: I’ll protect her with my life. You stay in Sotenbori and keep Sagawa--

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He doesn’t have time to end his sentence. Sagawa is killing him.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Chatty for a thief… Nice combo play there, Majima-chan. You got his gun so I could swoop in for the kill, right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He kicks the corpse over with his leg and takes a business card out of his pocket.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Here he is. Makoto Makimura’s new real estate agent. Turn that frown upside down. You wanted to know, right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He throws the business card on the floor. Majima picks it up.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Tachibana Real Estate… Kazuma Kiryu.

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Guess it’s time to let ya outta the cage, eh Majima-chan?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: I’m saying Sotenbori can’t hold you back from roaming free anymore. You’re in, right? Kamurocho?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You lettin’ me?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Come on now. What choice do we got here but head up to Kamurocho and hunt Makoto down?

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Joking or not, he’s pointing a gun at Majima.]

Time/Location: Previously, in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: We’ve come this far. We’ll chase that bitch to the gates of hell to finish this. You and me, tiger.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Woman’s Voice
Text: As the snare laid by Dojima Family Lieutenant Hiroki Awano tightens, Kiryu finds himself trapped within Kamurocho. But Tachibana snatches him from their clutches in a last-ditch gambit. Stakes in the brutal race for the Empty Lot reach new heights as even Tojo Clan Headquarters, lords of the Japanese underworld, become involved. Battle lines are redrawn with dizzying frequency, and the war surges into its next bloody phase. Kiryu is given the name of the person at the center of it all: the owner of the Empty Lot. A young woman… Makoto Makimura. Extracting her safely from Sotenbori to Kamurocho becomes his top priority. For she is the only hope Kiryu and Tachibana have of forcing back the Dojima Family.

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: So this is our guy. The real estate agent who’s with Makoto Makimura now. How ‘bout a smile, tiger? You wanted to know, right?

Time/Location: Previously, in the story of Kazuma Kiryu…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Tachibana Real Estate… Kazuma Kiryu.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu and Oda are slowly walking down a crowded street.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Whole place feels weird…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Something’s different about the city since back when I lived here. Similar, but off. You know the feeling?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You lived in Sotenbori before?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Me and Tachibana were both down here before moving up to Kamurocho. That was maybe a year and a half ago. We called ourselves a mafia outfit, but it was small-time. Four, five guys tops. Even so, all the Omi yakuza knew who the boss was. I was just riding on the big man’s coattails.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Was that around when he lost his arm?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: More or less. One of the guys in the group back then runs a shady-ass video shop in Shofukucho West now. Place called CAL Videos. Think you could get there ahead of me? I already called and explained the story to him. I’ve gotta make one stop first.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: A stop where?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: I just want to get a feel for the city now. I’ll drop in on the old crew and trade some info. Might give us a clue about what Shibusawa’s boys or the Omi have been up to.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Sounds good.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: You head to the video store and wait for a call from a guy named Sera. He’s the one looking after our Makoto Makimura right now. We’ll work out the handoff details over the phone.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Is this Sera another Tachibana Real Estate guy?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: No, he’s Tojo Clan. A group called the Nikkyo Consortium.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nikkyo Consortium? Never heard of them.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: I don’t know much, either, but apparently this Sera guy’s in deep with your man, Kazama. He was tracking down Makimura here in Sotenbori based on intel our boss handed him.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I see how it is. In other words, you’re going to hang around town while I sit and wait by the phone.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Heh, gotta love seniority. Well, see you in a few.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He leaves.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Sera’s supposed to call us at CAL Videos in Shofukucho West. I should go check it out.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (CAL Videos in Shofukucho West… This is the place. Time to head inside.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: Welcome. Hm? First time comin’ in? Top quality stuff, every one. Whatever yer flavor, we got somethin’ to get you there. Just be careful whether you’re grabbin’ VHS or Beta, yeah?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m with Tachibana Real Estate. Oda said he talked to you?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: Oh, right. You Kiryu-san, then?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: Gimme just a sec. I got a room in the back.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He pulls the movie rack to the side.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: For the extra-special customers. Got a phone in there, too. The call from that there Sera guy’ll patch into the back.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Inside is a well-furnished room with a movie theater.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So is this your own private little fun room?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: Tachibana-san was a big fan, too. He’s the one who laid out the money to build it. Make yourself cozy. So, Tachibana-san doin’ alright?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, more or less.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: The dialysis’s gotta be hard.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: Didn’t need it, when he was still livin’ here in Sotenbori.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Do you and Tachibana go back far?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: I’ve known Oda-san longer, actually. Me, him, and a couple other guys used to run a two-bit gang. Then maybe two years ago, this lone wolf Tachibana turns up. Got into a fight straight outta the gate over some stupid shit. Bumped shoulders or something. Four of us versus just one, and Tachibana-san totally mopped the floor with us. Oda-san’d never lost a fight before, but Tachibana-san schooled him like a kid.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hard to picture that, the way Tachibana is now.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: This was before he lost an arm. But even more mindbogglin’ was Oda-san’s reaction to gettin’ his ass whooped.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: Fell in love with the guy’s badassery on the spot, and wound up beggin’ him to be our new leader. The difference in caliber was apparent to anybody. Ain’t no wonder, considerin’ the kinda upbringing he got.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What do you mean?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: You ain’t heard? Tachibana-san’s the kid of a Japanese war orphan left stranded in China.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: A war orphan?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: Yeah, Tachibana-san’s ma was Japanese. Just after she was born there in China, the war took a turn for the crazy, and she got separated from her parents. They booked it outta there, but she got left behind in Manchuria. Some Chinese farmers took her in, and when she came of age, they married her off to their son. That’s Tachibana-san’s parents. Half-Japanese kids like Tachibana-san weren’t real popular, as you’d imagine. He had it damn rough, growin’ up. Chinese all hated his Japanese guts on account of the war. Said he coulda been killed for bein’ a half-blood any day, and nobody woulda batted an eye. Minus one exception. Apparently the local mafia were the only ones that never treated him rough for it. Guess they were all outcast types. Nobody had any money, and most of ‘em came from bad families, y’know? So Tachibana-san just naturally went down that road, too, from a real early age. He’d been walkin’ the walk for a hell of a lot longer’n any of us. Hell, Oda-san’s the older one, but he started callin’ Tachibana-san his big bro.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Oda enters the room.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Yo, your shop gonna tend itself? You got a confused customer waiting out there.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: Crap, really? Sorry, gotta go. Make yerselves at home.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [The owner leaves.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: He talk your ear off?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. He was telling me some of your crew’s backstory.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: The one about how I jizzed my pants over the boss? Take it with a grain of salt.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Heh. How about you? I figured you’d take longer to get here.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Me, too. Heard an interesting tidbit, though. Apparently Makoto Makimura’s corpse turned up floating in the river a few days back.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: The real one’s alive, so it’s gotta be somebody else. Heard about a few other incidents, too. A body count like this means the Omi, Shibusawa’s boys, or both are on the move, and you can bet thefre still out for Makimura.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: But I guess bitching about it won’t help much… I’ll take over phone duty. Why don’t you go grab a bite or something?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Doesn’t take two grown-ass men to wait for a phone call.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You have a point there.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Outside.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Never would’ve thought he’d offer to wait by the phone. Not that I’m complaining about a little free time. May as well enjoy a taste of Osaka until the call comes in.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He kills time walking around town.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Hm? My pager’s beeping. Oda wants me. Guess that means he got his call from that Sera guy? Anyway, I should get back to that video shop.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu walks back to the shop.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: If you’re lookin’ for Oda-san, he’s in the back room. Guess he got his call from that Sera guy.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: All right, got it.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: Ah, hold up! This is a big deal you guys are takin’ on, right? You sure you’re all ready for it?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Ready for what?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: Anythin’. I don’t know none of the details, but I imagine it’s got somethin’ to do with the string of yakuza incidents happenin’ around town lately, right?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I… can’t really say anything.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: Don’t have to. Tachibana-san’s involved. That pretty much guarantees it ain’t gonna be pretty. Anythin’ could go down around that guy and it wouldn’t surprise me.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (True, I can’t think of a single job I’ve gotten from Tachibana I’d call “pretty.” I should probably assume that trend will continue. Plus we’ll head straight back to Tokyo once the dears done. I should do everything I want to in Osaka first.) Fair enough. You’re probably right.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: Right? So don’t lemme rush ya. You take all the time you need to get good and ready.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Thanks, but I’m ready.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Video Shop Owner
Text: Yeah? Okay, head on back.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Good, you’re here, Kiryu.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. You got the call from Sera?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: I did. He’ll hand off Makimura at a place called Benten Inn, in the Camellia Grove.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Camellia Grove, Benten Inn…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Right. We’ll head there now and meet with Sera. If the coast is clear, we’ll take custody of the girl.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: We’re leaving right now? Seems kinda rushed, doesn’t it?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: The town’s crawling with guys out to get her. We don’t have the time to be proper about this. Apparently Makimura didn’t know she’d inherited the Empty Lot until Sera told her. The previous owner was her grandfather. Died about two years ago, now, but by that point she’d already run away.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: She ran away from home?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Yup. Hence the reason nobody had a clue where the hell she was all this time. And while we’re talking mysteries, she’s also gone blind for some reason. She goes from one tragedy to the next, then suddenly inherits land worth a billion yen… Guess God figured she deserved a break.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, one that comes with getting hunted down by the yakuza. Ask her how much she’s thanking God right now.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Don’t really need to ask, do we? From what I hear, they’ve had her running scared for days now, and the bodies are piling up around her. In any case, she says she’s got no attachment to the land. She wants to get rid of it, quick style.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I see.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Okay, ready to do this? Here’s the plan to get her out… First, you head into the Benten Inn and collect the girl. I’ll wait outside and keep an eye on who comes and goes. Soon as we leave the inn, we make a beeline for Kyoto. We’ll take the bullet train from there.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Too dangerous to get on at Shin-Osaka, you think?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Just being cautious. It’s possible Shibusawa and the Omi have eyes on the local stations.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Right.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Hey, Kiryu-kun… This mission’s basically the whole reason you were let into Tachibana Real Estate. I expect you to deliver. Whatever happens, you keep Makimura alive. If we can get the Empty Lot, you’ll have the leverage to see about keeping your man Kazama safe.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [They approach the inn…]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So this is Camellia Grove…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Quit staring like a damn tourist. You ready? I’ll be here watching for anybody suspicious coming in.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I know. See you in a few.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He enters Sera’s office.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nikkyo Consortium Aide
Text: This is Kiryu-san, of Tachibana Real Estate.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Sera
Text: Sera, Nikkyo Consortium. Have a seat.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu pulls his business card out of his pocket.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Kiryu, Tachibana Real Estate.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He respectfully bows and stretches out to give Sera his card, but the head of the Nikkyo Consortium is reluctant to take it away.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Sera
Text: Kazama-san has told me all about you. I’m aware of your present circumstances as well. But now’s not the time for etiquette or chitchat.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [One of the consortium soldiers comes in, leading Makoto by the hand.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Sera
Text: This is Makimura-san.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m Kiryu, from Tachibana Real Estate.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Makimura… Nice to meet you.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’ll be seeing you to Kamurocho, together with a colleague named Oda.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: You’re my bodyguards, then?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yes.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I didn’t even realize my grandfather had passed away until just now. Getting dragged into this insanity because of some piece of land my grandfather owned that I’ve never even heard of…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: It must have been hard.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: A man who’d been protecting me was killed…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [She remembers the van explosion in which Lee died.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I couldn’t care less about the money. Just let me be done with this land already… Please.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I understand.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Sera
Text: Give Tachibana-san my regards, Kiryu.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I will.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He comes up to Makoto and helps her get up.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: If I may.  Excuse us.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu takes Makoto to the street where Oda is waiting for him. He already called a taxi.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: C’mon, hurry! Get in!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: That voice…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Is something wrong?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: What are you doing!? Get in the car!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kityu
Text: Let’s go, Makimura-san.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: R-Right…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [They get in the car and leave.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Something up?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No. …I don’t know.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Sorry for the late introduction. I’m Kiryu’s co-worker, the name’s Oda.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Makoto continues to sit quietly.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Huh? Whoops… I do something to offend you, miss?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [They’re going till late tonight.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Kiryu… Behind us, car in the right lane.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: It’s been following at that distance for a while. It’s speeding up!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Shibusawa!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: What!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Damn, they found us! Floor it!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: What’s going on!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Shibusawa’s car drives up to the taxi, the rear door window goes down and Shibusawa takes out the gun, aiming at the driver. He shoots him in the head. Makoto screams and Oda grabs the wheel. Shibusawa’s yakuza are starting to fire at the taxi.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Are you fucking serious!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Oda gives Kiryu a gun.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Kiryu! Use this.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What the hell do you have this for?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: You should be thanking me! Now shut up and shoot!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu shoots at approaching Yakuza cars and motorcycles.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: What’s that sound?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [There’s a helicopter flying over them.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Are they fucking insane!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Seriously…?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He shoots Yakuzas in the helicopter.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Shit, incoming!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [They’re being shot with RPG-7. Kiryu is aiming and firing exactly at the missile, destroying it.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Gotcha.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Hang on!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [The shootout continues. Kiryu destroys the helicopter.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I think that’s the last of them.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: So… ware, we safe now?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. For the moment, anyway.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Who knows when more might turn up!? I’m taking us off the freeway!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [They come to a port. Oda hides the driver’s body in the trunk.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Dammit… We’ll lay low here for now. Goddammit… When did Shibusawa pick p our trail?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Calm down, Oda. You’ll scare her.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Oh, shut up. Who gives a shit!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I’m all right.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Yeah, well I’m sure a hell not!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He raises his hand to hit Makoto, but Kiryu stops him.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What the hell are you doing?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: …I’m gonna go have a look downstairs.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He’s going upstairs.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Sorry about that. You okay from the car ride? Anything hurt?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: It’s Kiryu-san… right?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: There’s something I need to tell you. About Oda-san.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I’m pretty sure I… I know him.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: I figured… Cat’s out of the bag, eh?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He’s got a gun in his hands.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Don’t move, Kiryu. I said don’t fucking move!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Oda is taking Makoto hostage.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What do you think you’re doing?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Sorry… But I can’t let this girl meet with Tachibana.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: So I’m afraid. The two of you are gonna have to die here.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Inside Makoto’s white stick is a dagger. Apparently she’s now the Blind Ichi or something. She’s stabbing Oda in the leg.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu quickly takes his gun and hits him in the stomach. Oda falls. Kiryu is pointing the gun at Oda.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You all right, Makimura-san?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Yes…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That cane…?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Sera-san gave it to me. Just in case, he said. I didn’t expect to use it on someone from Tachibana Real Estate.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: How about an explanation, Oda? Why turn on us? Aren’t you supposed to be Tachibana’s sworn brother!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Kiryu-san… On his left arm, does he have a tattoo? …Of a bat.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He rolls up his sleeve and shows a bat tattoo on his arm.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: It’s there. He’s got a bat tattoo.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I knew it… As soon as I heard his voice, I was almost certain.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What’s this all about?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Two years ago, that man abducted me, kept me prisoner… Sold me like cattle.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What? Have you got anything to say about this?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: …You heard the woman. To her, I’m the scum of the earth. Killing me’d probably be letting me off easy…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So you figured you’d shoot the two of us instead? What did you mean, you can’t let her see Tachibana? This doesn’t make any sense, Oda. What the hell is going on here!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Explain. From the beginning.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: ODA!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: …Fine. I’ll talk. The tattoo… It was our mark. All the guys in the gang I headed up got one.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: I borrowed money from the mafia back on the mainland and stowed away on a ship to Japan five years ago… Ever since, I took any work that’d pay in Sotenbori. Burglary, armed robbery, you name it. Conned girls and sold ‘em off more than a few times. She just happened to be one of them.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What’s that got to do with Tachibana?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: …It was pretty soon after I sold her that I first met him.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He’s immersed in his memories.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: He was different… First who ever beat me by pure force. It was so one-sided I didn’t even feel bad. He was more than strong… I’d always wallowed at the bottom… But he gave me hope. I begged him to be our boss. Got him to get the same ink as us… Pride, ego… Screw all that. I knew my place in life was under him, carrying him straight to the top. But instead… I wound up costing him an arm. He lost it protecting me. A rival gang took us by surprise. I swore that day… Whatever happened, Tachibana-san was the one person I’d never betray. Life is ironic… Soon as I promise myself that, I was with Tachibana-san… when he saw that damn show. It was some news piece on war orphans in China. One of the spots was some old footage from a few years back. Some orphans who discovered relatives in Japan, so they came over… Soon as I saw the girl, I remembered. She was the one I had just sold to a crew of Korean mafia types. Age checked out, too… I would’ve laughed it off as a coincidence. Except…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Mother… Xiao Qiao?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: I couldn’t believe it. There’s the girl I’d just sent to hell for a stack of yen… and the bro I dedicated my life to serve… says she’s his fucking little sister.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He’s coming back the present.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Makoto Makimura… is Tachibana’s sister?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Is… Is that story really true?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: I think we’re… past the point of lying here. It was too late to do anything. It was a long time ago, but I knew that wouldn’t make a damn bit of difference to Tachibana-san. I had one of two choices. Let you meet him, knowing it would be the end of me… or double down. Erase you from the equation permanently, like none of it ever happened.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So… that’s the real reason you tagged along to Osaka?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Yeah… Nobody but me had any clue I had reason to kill her. If I said it was Shibusawa’s people or the Omi that got her, nobody’d question it. But now… Now that’s all over.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Shibusawa Family Thug
Text: Hey, over here! There’s a way upstairs!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: That’s Shibusawa’s crew.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Damn…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Oda-san, can you stand!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: We have to get out of here!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You’re…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: …You still want me coming with you? Heh. Seriously, how naive can a person be? Kiryu. Can I have my gun? I’ll slow ‘em down as best I can.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Look at my leg. If I’m gonna die here, I want… I want to go out being useful to Tachibana-san.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: I know it’s ridiculously selfish, but… will you tell him I said that? Tell Tachibana-san I really… honestly loved him…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I will. But don’t be a hero. Go easy and at least they shouldn’t kill you.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu gives him the gun and goes to Makoto.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Kiryu-san, what about Oda-san!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Please. No more words right now.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Thanks, Kiryu.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu and Makoto are leaving. On the way, they hear a voice.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Shibusawa Family Thug
Text: Over there! I see ‘em!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Four Yakuza runs up.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’ll keep you safe. No matter what.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: O-Okay…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Shibusawa Family Thug
Text: Give us the girl, Kiryu! This is the last stop for you, anyway!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu is attacked by many Yakuzas, even a smart guy with a chainsaw. Kiryu’s almost completely exhausted, but he wins.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: This way.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Meanwhile, Oda dies on the floor. He’s breathing hard, his lung’s been shot through a few times. Shibusawa comes up to him.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: Sh-Shibusawa… san.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: Where is she?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: I don’t know anymore.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: I thought you ditched Tachibana and signed on with me. Why didn’t you hand her over right away?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Oda
Text: It’s not obvious? You guys let Sera… get the drop on you. And after I… told you she was in Sotenbori. Served her up on a plate. If you’d just grabbed her sooner… I wouldn’t have had to come to Osaka at all.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: That’s on Nishitani of the Kijin Clan. Paid him a fortune and he still screwed up. Well, he’s not the only one. You earned this.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He shoots at Oda. Meanwhile, Kiryu is checking into a couple’s room with Makoto.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Don’t worry, this isn’t me making a pass at you. I just needed a discreet place to spend the night.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I know. What sort of person is my brother now?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Well, most of the time he’s extremely calm. Smart. Keeps his emotions in check pretty much all the time.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I see. That’s quite a change from the brother I knew.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: How long since you saw him last?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Ten years. I was ten… He was still just 15. But he left our mother and me and came to Japan. He said he was headed to Osaka. That’s all I heard.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: That so? That’s why you were in Sotenbori? Looking for Tachibana?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Mm-hm. Two years ago, I ran away from home in Tokyo… When I got to Sotenbori, I started asking every Chinese person I found if they’d seen him. The man with the bat tattoo was one of them.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: He said he thought he knew the man I was looking for. So I went along with him. But if what he said is true, he still hadn’t met my brother. It was just a lie. I’m such an idiot. Honestly…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Even so… This time you’re going to see your brother. In Kamurocho.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I’m almost scared to see how he’s changed. The brother I knew wasn’t a strong person. Back in China, he and I were always bullied for being children of a Japanese woman. At the movies, as soon as the lights went down, the people in the seats around us would start spitting on us. Through the whole film… My brother and I were too scared to move. I think joining the mafia really was the only way he had to defend himself. And then he was gone. For me, it wasn’t till years later, when we learned my grandfather was here in Japan. My mother was ecstatic to finally have a way out of China. So was I. He welcomed us into his home, but… the warmth didn’t last.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: How could it? We were family, but we couldn’t understand a word each other said. So I studied Japanese so hard I practically forgot Chinese. Tried to adapt to Japan, to my grandfather But mother… She didn’t have time to learn the language before she… She killed herself.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [She drop her stick and start crying.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: And since then, too, the people who’ve helped me… One died. One, I don’t even know if he’s alive or dead. My life’s just a train wreck. It’s just…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, that’s terrible. You walk alone in the dark long enough, it starts to feel like the light’ll never come. You stop wanting to even take the next step.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: What?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: But there’s not a person in this world who knows what’s waiting down the road. All we can do is choose. Stand still and cry… or make the choice to take the next step. You pick whichever one feels right to you. I can get you as far as the starting line.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Okay. I’ll… go to Kamurocho. I want to see my brother. I’m sure of that. So please… Take me there, Kiryu-san.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Sure.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu approaches the shack of the homeless man we already know.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hey. Anybody home?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Hm…? Oh! If it ain’t Kiryu-san. Didn’t know you were still kicking, man.  Er…? Look, she’s a real beauty, but… You seriously bringing a girl to a place like this?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Sorry, but we don’t have anywhere else to go. I was hoping you’d let us hide here just for a little while.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Y-Yeah, sure thing…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [They enter the shack.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Bearded Homeless
Text: Er… Sorry the place ain’t anything fit to show a lady. Especially the, uh, smell.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I don’t mind. Sorry to intrude.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Aw, it’s nothing to apologize for, miss. Just, Kiryu-san. this really is no place to leave a young gal like this…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I know.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Please, sir, just until my brother comes to get us.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Your brother?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah… Except he’s not picking up when I call him, so now I need to go see him in person. Can you stay with her until I’m back?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Got any idea where this brother of hers is?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: He should be in Little Asia.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: What the? Oh, so he’s in Kamurocho. You had me thinking I’d be keeping her here for days. If it’s just to Little Asia, why not take her with you?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: The Dojima Family’s why. This time ifr her thefre after, not me. I can’t take her anywhere till I’m sure it’s safe. Not even Little Asia.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: Dojima’s men are after her? This girl? What for?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You’re better off not knowing.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Bearded Homeless Man
Text: That’s the truth… Well, I still owe you for saving us from those homeless hunter punks. Leave her to me. I’m on it.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Outside.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (How come Tachibana’s not responding? Guess heading to Little Asia’s the quickest way to find out.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Little Asia Resident
Text: You Kiryu-san?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m just here to see Tachibana. I can’t get him by phone. …Please let me through.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Little Asia Resident
Text: I know. I’m not here to stop you. Chen-san asked me to wait here for you.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Chen-san… The local elder, right?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Little Asia Resident
Text: Yeah. Follow me.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Is Tachibana all right?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Little Asia Resident
Text: Come see yourself.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu enters the room of the local homemade clinic, where they recently left Tachibana.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Little Asia Resident
Text: He’s weaker than before. His condition got pretty bad for a couple of days… He just woke up a while ago, now that he’s finally stabilized.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Apologies for being out of touch, Kiryu-san. I’m… I’m fine now.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Little Asia Resident
Text: Take all the time you need. (leaves]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana, Makoto Makimura is here in Kamurocho. I left her with one of the homeless guys camped out in West Park… She’s waiting for her big brother to come get her.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Oda-san told you, then? That she is my sister.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Then I owe you a second apology. I was planning to tell you everything once this was settled. I thought I’d made that clear to Oda-san as well…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Yes?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oda… He tried to kill Makoto.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I am… afraid I don’t understand.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Some time passes. Tachibana dresses up and Kiryu tells him what’s happened lately.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: …That’s the last I heard from Oda. Haven’t been able to reach him since we left Osaka.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I expect Oda-san is no longer alive…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Maybe not.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: This… All of this is my fault.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Ten years ago, I chose to flee instead of properly grappling with my own fate. That choice threw both my mother’s and sister’s lives into chaos… Now it has claimed Oda-san’s life as well.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: My blood made me a pariah in China. They called me a “Japanese devil.” Behind that term was a war’s worth of venom against Japan. I grew up fearing everyone around me, until the day I fled the country… leaving my mother and sister to fend for themselves in China, alone. After growing up hated for being a Japanese boy in China, now the Japanese called me Chinese. Those early days in Sotenbori were spent just desperately trying to stay alive. To defend myself. Once a person sets foot in the underworld, the only way to survive is to devour those around you. To climb a ladder fashioned from their bones. Show a moment’s weakness, and they’ll devour you instead. Just after I had finally grown numb to it, lost all sense of good or evil, or any interest in the difference… I learned my mother and sister had come to Japan. To Kamurocho. I left Sotenbori to find them, and used whatever power and influence I’d won to set down roots in Kamurocho. To form a network of knowledge. What I would do once I found them, I had no idea. I only knew I could not live not knowing what misery I had caused them by abandoning them in China. In the end, all I learned was that my sister had vanished from Kamurocho just before I could find her, and that my mother and grandfather had already died. That, and one other thing… That the tiny plot of land my sister now held the rights to had the potential to become a fatal obstacle to the Kamurocho Revitalization Project.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You mean, the Empty Lot…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Correct. The Dojima Family began funneling tremendous sums of money into real estate acquisitions for the project. If their plans bore fruit, Dojima stood to gain that money back tenfold. But if their plans met with an obstacle due to the existence of the Empty Lot… My sister would become a target for the yakuza.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Right. Which is exactly what we’re seeing now.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: That is why as soon as I realized the possibility, I approached Kazama-san, captain of the Dojima Family, in an effort to negotiate my sister’s safety.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So you struck a deal with Kazama-san, but why?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Because Kazama-san feared the consequences of Sohei Dojima gaining any more power than he already possesses.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Dojima’s influence already far exceeds the bounds of both his intelligence and judgment. Kazama-san feared the sort of rampage unique to small men drunk on disproportionately large power. If Sohei Dojima acquired the Empty Lot, it would likely buy him the seat of captain at Tojo Clan Headquarters. In time, he would become the Tojo Clan’s Third Chairman. Even Kazama-san would be unable to stop him. Kazama-san advised me to build a real estate firm around the intelligence network my search had created. So that I could secure the Empty Lot before the Dojima Family and protect my sister. And so that the firm would hold as much power as possible in the process.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So Tachibana Real Estate… That was Kazama’s idea?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: The birth of Tachibana Real Estate, as well as these events revolving around the Empty Lot, have played out according to Kazama, Shintaro… the perfect play, penned by a genius. The reason you and I are standing here together now is that he and I joined hands. Me to find my sister, and Kazama-san to control the Tojo Clan from behind the scenes. Still, my sister… After I walked out on my family, she has every right to hate me. A few days ago, Sera-san informed me that she’d lost sight in both eyes. I thought it would be best if I kept the fact that I was her brother silent.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Meaning you feel different now?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Indeed. The woman you described to me, this Makoto Makimura… It’s her. She is every bit the sister I remember. The whole reason she was in Sotenbori? It was to look for me… For a man like me. And still she kept looking!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Kiryu-san, I… I want to see my sister. I need to see Xiao Qiao. That’s the only reason I’ve hung on to life for this long! I won’t run again… Not ever again!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: The long wait’s over. And I can tell you, she doesn’t hate you. Although… She does still need your help.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Right!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Little Asia Resident
Text: The Dojima Family’s here! They’re telling us to hand over Tachibana-san! They know you’re in here!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What the hell?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Why did it have to be now?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Can you stand, Tachibana?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Yes.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Dojima Thug
Text: Here he is! It’s Tachibana!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You came for Tachibana?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Dojima Thug
Text: Heh, you’re here too, Kiryu? You shoulda died ages ago!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu and Tachibana are kicking their asses.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: It would appear they were the only ones, for now.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: But they know you’ve been hiding here. More will be coming.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Indeed. We should leave through the back. It is this way. I cannot stay in Little Asia any longer. Kiryu-san, let us hurry to West Park.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: To where Makoto is?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: So long as Dojima is after the Empty Lot… Nowhere is safe for her. The only way is to hurry and process the paperwork for her to release ownership.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What is it?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: We’re being watched.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Dojima’s hired gun on the balcony fires two bullets from a silencer pistol at Kiryu, in the chest and leg. Tachibana helps him get up.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Kiryu-san!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [The killer spectacularly jumps off the balcony. Tachibana tries to take Kiryu away.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: There is no worse adversary,

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You know him?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: I saw him once, in the mainland mafia. He is the most effective hitman I am aware of. His name is… Lao Gui.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Lao Gui?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: The murder in the Empty Lot appeared amateur… to such a perfect extent the police focused, entirely on you. That takes a professional. For Lao Gui, it would be simple.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What’s that mean?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: If an assassin of his caliber is working for the Dojima Family… it’s almost certain he’s the one behind the killing you were framed for.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Lao Gui
Text: [in Chinese] (Come out, Tachibana. I was ordered to take you, not kill you.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What’s he saying?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: His aim is to capture me alive. Kiryu-san. In our current condition, we cannot hope to run from Lao Gui, let alone fight. However… You should be able to escape alone.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He picks up a piece of glass.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Please, take care of my sister.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana, don’t!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Tachibana goes out to the killer. He puts a piece of glass to his neck.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: [in Chinese] (Behave yourself and I will stay alive for you.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Lao Gui
Text: [in Chinese] (The other man is not in my contract. He is nothing to me.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [They leave.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Damn…!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu is trying to get up, but he’s too weak from losing blood. He loses consciousness and comes to himself in a homemade clinic.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Y-You… Chen-san?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: Tachibana-san was taken by the Dojima Family about three hours ago. I have men from Little Asia looking for where he was taken. A Dojima officer called Shibusawa knew that Tachibana-san was receiving dialysis here. It seems that Oda was leaking information to him.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So Shibusawa was just letting him run free until now?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: Oda was Shibusawa’s lapdog. I assume his plan was to let Tachibana-san do the work of finding Makoto Makimura, then swoop in and take her. That is what I would do, were I him.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Damn. But you really think you can find where they took him?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: I can’t promise anything, but we’re doing all we can. I’d even considered naming the boy my successor. I do want to help him. Truly.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: …Perhaps you were already aware.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: The Empty Lot was just one piece of the land owned by Tachibana-san and Makoto Makimura’s grandfather, a man by the name of Genzo Makimura.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: After the war, hard times forced him to sell off most of his property. But records show that he negotiated with four different buyers to deliberately sell the land off in small parcels. Most likely, in order to retain the rights to one small sliver of it.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Why would he do that?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: At the time, Genzo Makimura had a daughter living in China, though they were separated. That was Tachibana-san’s mother. Perhaps he hoped that one sliver of land would serve as a beacon to help her find him, should she ever come to Japan in search of her father. Mind you, that’s simply what I might do in his place.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: Ironic, isn’t it? That a father’s love for his daughter should condemn her children to be placed at the center of a yakuza power struggle. But that isn’t Makimura’s fault, nor was he wrong to will his grandchild the land. It is you yakuza who are to blame. Is that not so?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
