Text: By now, the Dojima Family will be subjecting Tachibana-san to extreme torture, in order to capture Makoto Makimura. Yet if we were to take direct action against Dojima, the Tojo Clan would doubtless no longer suffer Little Asia to exist.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’ll go as soon as you tell me where. I’ll get Tachibana out, whatever it takes!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: That is why we tended to your injuries. However badly they may still hurt, you must assist us in this task.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You couldn’t stop me.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: Very good. We will contact you once we learn Tachibana-san’s location. Go and watch over his sister until then.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Outside.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (I should check on Makoto… Not like I can do much till they find Tachibana, anyway.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: Kiryu!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: The Dojima Family…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: You had us looking for you. The men upstairs decided they’re tired of dealing with your crap. Kill on sight, they said.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [But Kiryu’s arm is still hurt.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hngh… Damn.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: Seriously, how long do you plan on taking to die already?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: Tell me, how’s it feel, eh? You let Tachibana talk you into picking a fight with Dojima, then got the rug pulled out from under you. Heh, though he’s probably six feet under by this point, too. Ain’t that right? Nishikiyama.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Nishikiyama suddenly enters.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: You’ve got no friends left. Let’s just put an end to it, eh, Kiryu?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Kiryu… Kuze’s torturing Tachibana right now. It’s only a matter of time till he gives them the Empty Lot. Do you still think there’s any hope?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Where’s Tachibana now?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: They’re not telling us rank-and-file guys. Even if I did know, I couldn’t tell you…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: Heh heh, this is where things really get fun. Fantastic! We’ll be the witnesses. How ‘bout you two slug it out till one of you drops dead?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What the hell?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: We’ll even let you take the credit, Nishikiyama. You can climb to the top over your brother’s dead body!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: I tell you… Yakuza are some of the dumbest sons of bitches I’ve ever seen.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: Huh? You talking about me, smartass? How ‘bout you explain what the fuck you mean by that!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: The Empty Lot’s going to be Dojima’s soon enough. Once it is, that’s the end for Kazama-san. And you think I’m going to sit back and watch that happen? …No matter who’s ass I’ve gotta kick to stop it.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: Eh?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Am I right, Kiryu?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Fool… You realize what you’re doing? I told you before. If you side with me, you’ll--

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Shut up! As for me… I’m not interested in climbing the ranks of a Tojo Clan without you in it! So say whatever the hell you want. You and I are still oath brothers!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You best be ready. I’m sticking with you till death do us part.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: If you’re all in, I guess I’ve got nothing left to say.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Nishikiyama pulls off an expensive suit with one move. Kiryu do the same.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: C-Cocky little…!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Let’s rock and roll, bro.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah… Come on!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Together they’re destroing the Dodjima gang.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki, I need to head to the homeless area in West Park.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Makoto Makimura’s hiding there. Until we can get Tachibana back, you and I need to keep her safe.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Yeah? Cool, you got it.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [They walk to the park.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Hey, Kiryu. How are you still alive at this point? It’s kind of amazing.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Got lucky I guess. And I had a lot of help.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: I’m damn glad you made it, bro.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: We’re not out of the fire yet… Right now it’s Tachibana we need to be worried about.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Yeah, I know.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [They enter the shack.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Kiryu-san? Oh, there’s someone with you? Is that… my brother!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Brother?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Right. I should catch the both of you up. Get comfortable, it’s a little complicated.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [After a while.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: No… The Dojima Family’s got my brother!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Brother? Wait, Tachibana!? She’s the Empty Lot owner, right? How are the two of them siblings? This is crazy.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: One question at a time. Actually, forget them all. Right now we need to get Tachibana back.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Why’s this happening? I finally caught up to him…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Dojima’s men grabbed Tachibana on Shibusawa’s orders.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Shibusawa?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: He’s the guy who attacked us in Osaka. One of the Dojima Family lieutenants. Apparently he’s the one calling the shots in the family right now.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: But it’s not my brother they’re really after. The Dojima Family wants me, right?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m sorry. I failed to keep him safe, but I swear I’ll bring him back to you… even if it kills me.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu’s pager beeps.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: It’s from the elder of Little Asia. I’ll go call him back.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: I’ll go with you.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Kiryu-san. Please help my brother. Please… I can’t lose him now!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m on it. You’ll see him real soon… I promise.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Outside the shack.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Let’s hurry, Kiryu. If Little Asia’s got info on where Tachibana’s being held, then make the call.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Right.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: So can we trust this Little Asia kingpin?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. The guy who took Tachibana left me passed out bleeding in a Little Asia alley. (The guys in Little Asia should have tracked down Tachibana by now. Gotta hurry, or he’ll be killed!]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He walks into a phone booth.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: Kiryu-san?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Chen-san, have you found Tachibana?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: In an abandoned building next to the Empty Lot. The Crescendo Building, on Shichifuku Street. They are holding him in the basement.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Crescendo Building. Got it.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: There are only about seven of them, but Kuze is there. You know him, right?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: It seems Kuze is acting on Shibusawa’s orders. It looks like he has started following Shibusawa rather than Awano. He is running out of options. That makes him dangerous.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I know.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: Tachibana-san’s life is in your hands, Kiryu-san.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [The phone call ends.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki, Tachibana’s in the Crescendo Building on Shichifuku Street. Kuze’s there, too.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Got it. We better move quick!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: All right. Let’s do this, Kiryu! So Makoto was searching for Tachibana this whole time?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. Apparently that’s what she was doing in Sotenbori.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Ahh, okay. And does Tachibana know that?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, he knows.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Here’s the Crescendo Building… Tachibana’s in here?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, somewhere underground.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Kiryu, once we head in there’s no turning back. You ready for this?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. Let’s go!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [They enter the building. Inside, it looks shabby and deserted. Several Yakuza led by Kuze.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: So, what’s next? Sixth little piggy?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He shattered Tachibana’s toe with a sledgehammer. A huge puddle of blood is spilling on the floor.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Awww… Seventh little piggy went with him!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Fingers and toes… are densely packed with nerves… making them an excellent way… to inflict extreme pain.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: No shit.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Counting fingers and toes… You only have eight left. Do you think they will be enough… to get me to speak?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Arrogant prick! Just spit it out already!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He punches Tachiban in the face.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Where the fuck is Makoto Makimura!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: You’ll have to do your job properly… instead of just barking at me… or Shibusawa-san will be cross with you. You don’t have… many chances left, do you? …Kuze-san.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Mouthy bitch!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He raises his hand to punch Tachibana again, but Kuze stops him.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kuze
Text: We’ll get nothing out of him if he’s dead. Or is smacking guys around all you’re good for? Hm?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: He’s just about to talk!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kuze
Text: You still don’t get it? He’s not the type you break with torture. Figure out something else already.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: You really think I got another answer?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Yakuza abruptly breaks out of Kuza’s hands.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Look here, sir. I joined up with the yakuza ‘cause I like hitting people. Ain’t that your reason, too? Telling a yakuza to use his head… Shit, when did you become such a pussy!? That’s how come you keep fucking up!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Watch your goddamn tone with me, boy. Looking at you just reminded me… why I joined. To beat on guys who’re stronger than me. That’s why I’ve busted my ass in the game. Don’t go confusing me… For punk trash like you.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He’s untie Tachibana.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Hey, what do you think you’re doing!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kuze
Text: If some fucking numbnut offs him before I can get the info out of him… I’ll be worse off than I am already.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Tachibana smiles at Yakuza.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Sonuvabitch… You laughing? Eh? The FUCK you lookin’ at!?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He hits him in the head with a sledgehammer.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Stupid piece of shit!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kuze presses the Yakuza against the floor. At that moment, Kiryu bursts into the room.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Kiryu? How’d you find this place?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu sees the beaten Tachibana and rage embraces him.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Oh well. Guess these things have a way of working out.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: KUZE!!!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He’s hitting Kuze hard in the face, smashing his glasses. An epic battle is about to begin. Kiryu and Nishikiyama against Kuze and his Yakuzas.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Kiryu!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana, I’m sorry. I took too long.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: You have nothing… to apologize for… Kiryu-san.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hey, Tachibana! Don’t do this, your sister’s right there! You’ve been waiting so long. She’ll be right here! Nishiki, please. Get Makoto here!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: On my way!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: No time… It’s too late.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Tachibana!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Kiryu-san. Lao Gui… The one controlling him is… Dojima… Sohei.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Tachibana
Text: Kuze… said… Dojima is the one… pulling all the strings. He hopes to… drive out Kazama-san. That’s why he… He framed you for…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hey… Tachibana!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [But… he’s dying.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No. This isn’t happening. This isn’t… Tachibana. I’ll keep your sister safe. I promise you. I keep her safe, no matter what.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Tachibana takes his last breath.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Dammit… Damn it… Goddammit…! GOD DAMN IT!!!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kuze
Text: I just… I only did what I had to do. The Empty Lot… It’s not just a Dojima Family problem anymore. Somebody’s trying to sell it… to the Omi Alliance. Someone inside the Tojo Clan. A traitor. We still don’t know who, but… It’s a fact that they’re trying. If the Empty Lot falls into Omi hands… They’ll take over the revitalization project. They’ll march on Tokyo. Declare all-out war on the Tojo Clan…

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I don’t give a damn.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Kiryu. Give us the girl. You planning to make an enemy of the entire Tojo Clan?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You lay one goddamn finger on Makoto Makimura… And I’ll bury the Tojo Clan.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He lifts Tachibana’s body in his arms.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’ll crush it down to the last man. That I swear to you.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [He leaves.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Kuze
Text: I’ll be damned… The punk kid’s finally turned. Turned into a real yakuza.

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [Kiryu leaves the building with Tachibana’s body.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Kiryu!

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Brother? Where’s my brother? Brother, where are you? Huh?

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Text: [She touches her brother’s body in Kiryu’s arms and start crying.]

Time/Location: Eight hours before Majima reached the Camellia Grove
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I see… You’re tired. It’s been hard, I know. My big brother… I’m home. …Brother.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Woman’s Voice
Text: Makoto Makimura is missing… having vanished just as her only ally, Lee, was murdered. Majima resigned himself to working alongside both Sagawa and Nishitani to find her--Her trail leading to the man in the white suit that took her. The events that transpire aim the light… on the shadow of Majima’s former home in the criminal underworld, the Tojo Clan. They had already used a Kamurocho real estate agent… to secret Makoto out of Osaka toward Tokyo. To find her, Majima is set free from his Sotenbori cage… and now makes for the city he once prowled as yakuza, Kamurocho. But the task that awaits him there remains… the murder of young Makoto Makimura.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima walks down the street and sees some yakuzas mocking a young man.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Man
Text: I’m sorry! Please just let me go!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Where’s all that piss and vinegar now? Eh? Get the fuck up. I said get on your feet!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [A young man grasping at Majima’s pants.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Man
Text: P-Please, help! They’ll kill me!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: What are you looking at?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nothin’. I ain’t seen shit.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Man
Text: H-Hey, wait!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Yakuza
Text: Dumbass… Try some cute shit like that again and you’ll be fuckin’ sorry!!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima leaves. He enters a building there he meet Sagawa.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: You got any news for me, Majima-chan?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Whaddaya expect me to find, just strollin’ around? I ain’t heard so much as the “T” in Tachibana.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: ‘Course you haven’t. How could you when you’re not actually trying to find shit?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: The only way you live to see another day is if you find and put a bullet in that girl. I thought we were clear on that. A full day’s passed since Makoto Makimura left Sotenbori. If we don’t get her back from Tachibana Real Estate soon, we lose her for good. If her trail goes cold, so does your body. You understand that?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Then it seems to me you might want to start putting a little more effort into this, eh tiger? I’m putting up with the sardine treatment here in this tiny room. An Omi man goes strutting around Kamurocho and it’s suddenly a thing. You’re my only ears and eye out there.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Fine, but why not call Shimano in on this, then? Own up to the fact you let the girl give you the slip.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Can’t. Shimano doesn’t hear about this. This girl is our problem to solve.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Heh, don’t get me wrong here. I’m not afraid of Shimano. It’s just politics, is all. As an Omi guy, I can’t show Shimano any weakness on this one.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Why’s that?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: This business with Makoto Makimura’s a joint operation between the Omi Alliance brass and Shimano. The Omi’s got a deal to buy the Empty Lot from Shimano for ten billion.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What the hell?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: The Omi’s got their eyes on the prize. Kamurocho. That lot’s the cornerstone of the whole Kamurocho Revitalization Project. If the Omi gets their hands on it, they can snatch that whole fat slice of Tojo turf right out from under ‘em. Then it’s just a matter of the Omi Alliance flooding into Kamurocho with ground troops before the Tojo even knows what hit ‘em. They make the ten billion back in no time.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: So what, Shimano’s selling the Tojo Clan out? He’s selling the Empty Lot knowin’ that’s their plan!?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Yup. Shimano’s end-game is to use those Omi troops as muscle to take over the Tojo Clan for himself. He gives the Omi a slice of Tokyo in exchange for getting to sit on the Tojo Clan throne. When the time comes, Shimano and the Omi will have to work out how they split Kamurocho. If I show weakness now, I’m giving Shimano leverage down the line. ‘Course, it was Shimano who picked you to play hitman. I’d say he’s at least as guilty as I am in losing her.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hold on a sec. If he’s after the land, why’s he need the girl dead? Killin’ Makoto don’t get him the deed to that lot.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Shimano’s keeping that card up his sleeve. I asked him to show me the trick, but all he said was that seeing would be believing. And for whatever reason, the Omi higher-ups are lined up for the show. He’s one impressive son of a bitch, Shimano.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: So what are you gettin’ outta all this, then? Gotta be some prize in it for you, right?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Mm… Heh. Kamurocho is my prize. Or the Omi half of it, anyway.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Before, you said Shimano didn’t tell you a thing about all this. That don’t exactly square with what you’re sayin’ now.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: That info was on a need-to-know basis. Situation’s getting kinda fluid, huh? I think you’ve been on break long enough, Majima-chan. End of the day, we’re still boned if you don’t find Tachibana Real Estate and the girl. If you’ve got no other leads to go on, try the Champion District.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What am I gonna find there?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: I hear Tachibana’s people were in and out of there up till recently. Not the freshest tip, but it’s something.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Outside.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (So Tachibana’s boys been seen in the Champion District? …Good a place to go as any. Let’s have a look.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Well, here I am in the Champion District. Any of Tachibana’s guys still kickin’ around here?]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Champion District Resident
Text: …What do you want?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I heard tell Tachibana Real Estate’s been up in this part of town lately. Mind if I pick your brain a sec?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Champion District Resident
Text: You another, uh… family man?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nah, I’m no yakuza.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Champion District Resident
Text: Uh-huh. Well, whatever. Haven’t seen any of Tachibana-san’s people around here the last few days. Just more yakuza land sharks. We want to know where they’re at as much as you do. But it seems like shit’s really gotten bad this time, though.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: How bad we talkin’?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Champion District Resident
Text: I hear the Dojima Family’s chasing ‘em. Don’t know the details, though.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Got it… Thanks, pal. (Another swing and a miss… Where the hell is she?]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano Family Thug
Text: It really is you… Majima-san.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You guys must be… Shimano Family?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano Family Thug
Text: Word from our guys on the street was that you were back in town. Figured you’d be rotting in a Sotenbori ditch by now.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano Family Thug
Text: What’s somebody the family erased doing back in Kamurocho? I’m real curious to hear. Let’s take a walk to the office.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sorry, but I’m in a hurry. I’ll be sure to make a house call next time I’m in the neighborhood.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano Family Thug
Text: That’s not what we want to hear, man. Besides, these streets are off limits to you. I don’t recall hearing the boss give you permission to walk free.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano Family Thug
Text: What, the silent treatment now!?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Just kinda surprised the family boot lickers are givin’ me lip. How d’ya figure you outrank me?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano Family Thug
Text: You gotta ask? That’d be the day you straight up defied the family, asshole!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima beats this guys up.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Tch, there’s more of ya?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano Family Veteran
Text: You haven’t changed, Majima-san.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano Family Veteran
Text: I hope you’ll cut the young blood some slack. rd like to make up for their rudeness by escorting you somewhere.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Like I just got through tellin’ these guys, I’m kinda busy at the moment.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano Family Veteran
Text: Patriarch Shimano wants to see you.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: …What?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano Family Veteran
Text: If your current business is more important than that, we’ll leave you to it… but I think we both know the answer to that, don’t we?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [In the next scene, Majima is already sitting at the table next to Shimano. The boss eats sashimi and drinks sake.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: You ain’t touched a drop, Majima. You stop drinkin’ since I seen ya last?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [FUTOSHI SHIMANO. Patriarch of the Shimano Family, a Tojo Clan subsidiary.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: No, sir…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Nothin’ to be scared of now!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima remembers the torture.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: I just wanna talk a little business.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Sagawa enters.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: This invite was awful sudden, bro.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sagawa?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Don’t be such a stranger. If you’re gonna be in town, ya oughta drop me a line! Now that we’re all settled… it’ll be the first time I enjoy a drink in a fuckin’ while.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: So? What’s this sit-down about, bro?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Don’t you got the answer to that one? Bro, maybe ya wanna tell me what brings ya out to Kamurocho?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Fine, you win. You gonna make me say it? You already know, or you wouldn’t have bothered with the fancy dinner.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Heh heh heh.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Makoto Makimura fled Sotenbori. Right now, guys from some “Tachibana Real Estate” group have got her up here in Kamurocho.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Hmmmm. Well ain’t that a helluva plot twist? But hey, relax. Everything’s goin’ according to plan.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Say what?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What do you mean by that?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: I’m bout to blow your mind, Majima. Whole reason I sent ya to kill Makoto Makimura… was ‘cause I knew ya couldn’t do it.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Wha--

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Hey, what the fuck?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Haven’t ya figured it out, Majima? I know ya better than ya know your damn self. I can just picture it. You get orders to whack the girl, but ya go hide her away someplace safe instead, right? Exactly what I wanted ya to do.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You serious right now?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: You maybe wanna explain this to me, bro?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Before I do that… You guys been to see the Empty Lot?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: The Empty Lot’s a shit stripe of land sandwiched ‘tween Shichifuku Street and Taihei Boulevard. And right now it’s got the whole fuckin’ Tojo Clan by the balls. Dojima’s been pourin’ fucktons of money into this Kamurocho Revitalization Project. And that Empty Lot’s got the power to shit the bed on the whole deal. Guess what happens if Sohei Dojima scores that land? Tojo Clan profits go through the fuckin’ roof, and they make him next chairman, guaranteed. With a shit-fer-brains fuckwad like him runnin’ the show, the Tojo Clan’s fuckin’ done. Even now, his own captain, Kazama’s been tryin’ to put a hard stop on that.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Kazama? Shintaro Kazama?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Yeah. Ain’t a bigger pain in the ass on this green earth. He’s the main obstacle standin’ between me and control of the Tojo Clan. Anyway, this Kazuma Kiryu prick from Tachibana Real Estate who’s got the girl now--he’s one of Kazama’s boys.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Kazuma Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He look at the business card from Sera.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Not even Kazama can openly dick with Dojima, though. Thats why he’s usin’ his pawns over at Tachibana’s to fight by proxy.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Heh, not like you can cast stones, bro. The Shimano Family may be Tojo Clan direct now, but you used to be a Dojima branch yourself. C an’t just turn your guns on ol’ Sohei. So you’ve been using Majima-chan here, whose name’s been conveniently wiped from the family roster, no?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Heh, guilty.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: So? What’s your game with all this? Why send Majima-chan off to kill-but-not-actually-kill Makimura?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: To earn her trust. Real trust, not some back door deal cut over a dirty chat.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Ha, I’m seeing it now… Love.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Exactly. From that girl’s view, there ain’t a man alive she’s gonna trust more’n a man sent to kill her but saved her instead. Keep buildin’ on that, and eventually she’ll do anythin’ he tells her to. Including selling me that chunk of land.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: A woman in love’ll do anything for her man, huh? I guess love is as blind as her.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: And that ain’t quite all. I had another reason I needed Makoto Makimura to lay low a while.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: And what’s that?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: To flush out all of Kazama’s little shits in the Tojo Clan. Need to know who to toss overboard before I take the helm. Heh, and no sooner than the girl goes missin’, one Tojo rat crawls outta his hole. That shiny Nikkyo Consortium asshole… Sera. You get the credit for ferreting Sera out, Majima. I had no clue Sera was connected to Kazama till ya did.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Hmph. I made sure that guy won’t be a problem.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Nah, he’s still kickin’. Tagged him up here in Kamurocho, just earlier.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: What? You sure about that?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: It’s better this way. It ain’t time to kill him just yet. Now that I know he’s got Kazama backin’ him, I can use the Nikkyo to prod at Kazama.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Majima. You don’t gotta kill Makoto Makimura anymore.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What!?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Yer new orders’re to get her back from Tachibana Real Estate and bring her to me. As an honored guest, mind. I’ll buy her land off her for the full billion. You manage that, and you’re back in the Tojo Clan. Hell, I’ll throw in the girl as a bonus.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Hey, you ain’t sprung on her, are ya? That little minx.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Yeah, well, sorry for the reality check, but we have no idea where she is. If this is all playing out to your script, how about a little help, bro?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: The guy draggin’ her around is Tachibana’s grunt, Kiryu. You find his oath brother, Nishikiyama, and hell lead ya straight to Kiryu. Nishikiyama’s another one of Kazama’s charity cases. Drops by the Kazama Family office a lot.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Tch, some fucking day… But hey, lucky you, Majima-chan. You don’t have to kill the girl. You’ll get back in the Tojo Clan, too. Just as long as you don’t screw this up. I’d say you’re makin’ out like a bandit in all this, huh? It’s happily-ever-after for everyone involved.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Ya see, didn’t I tell ya I had good news? Eh, Majima?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [But Majima continues to sit quietly. In the next scene, he goes outside to get some fresh air and think.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Just a goddamn clown this whole time…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Three people are coming out of the slot machine joint.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Man 1
Text: Aw, lighten up!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Man 2
Text: If you’re gonna get pissed every time you lose, stop playing pachinko.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Man 1
Text: Hey, shut up!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Immersed in his cheerless thoughts, Majima accidentally pushes Man 1.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Man 1
Text: HEY! Yo asshole, I said wait up!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima turns around.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Man 3
Text: Man, this guy’s bad news…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [But Man 1 does not listen and runs to Majima.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Man 2
Text: Dumbass, that’s a yakuza!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Unexpectedly for all, Male 1 pushes Majima on the sidewalk and starts beating him. Majima hasn’t even moved.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Man 1
Text: You plow into me and can’t even apologize!?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I don’t really care.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Man 3
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Do what you want…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Seriously?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Man 1
Text: All right, maybe I will!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Man 2
Text: Ooh, let me get one in!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He kicks Majima on the head and Majima loses consciousness. He regains consciousness after a while. The scumbags are long gone.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: …I’ll be your damn clown. Bring it on. (…Mopin’ about it won’t get me anywhere. I gotta find her. I’ll start with this Nishikiyama at the Kazama Family office. Make him tell me where Kiryu is.]

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (The Kazama Family office… This Nishikiyama guy’s s’posed to be a regular here. I’m sure I’ll have to throw down whether he’s there or not… Am I ready? Let’s do this shit!]

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kazama Family Rookie
Text: …Whoa, hold up. Who the hell are you?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Name’s Majima. Nishkiyama of the Dojima Family-- He around?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kazama Family Rookie
Text: Huh? Are you… a friend of Nishikiyama-san’s?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nah. We’re about to get acquainted.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kazama Family Rookie
Text: Huh!? Is this some kinda joke? What the hell’s your deal?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I take it that’s a no on Nishikiyama?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kazama Family Rookie
Text: Shut your damn mouth. And get the hell outta here already! Where the fuck do you think this is!?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kazama Family Rookie
Text: I said, get lost, asshole!

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kashiwagi
Text: Enough. That’s Majima. He’s well out of your league.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kazama Family Rookie
Text: Majima… Wait, like, GORO Majima!?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kashiwagi
Text: Three years ago, the Shimano Family wiped him off the map. But here he is.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: And who’re you?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kashiwagi
Text: I’m the Kazama Family Captain, Kashiwagi. What’s your business with Nishikiyama?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: None of yours. Just gimme Nishikiyama already.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kashiwagi
Text: And is there some reason I should listen to you?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: ‘Scuse me?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kashiwagi
Text: You’ve been erased from the Tojo Clan. You are not welcome here.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Enough talk. All I’m askin’ here’s for you to cough up Nishikiyama. Now if you got that through yer damn head, where IS he!?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kashiwagi
Text: Nishikiyama, Kiryu… I’m not giving them to you.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: We’ll see about that.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kashiwagi
Text: You all stay here. This is mine. Majima, follow me. We’ll do this outside. This office is sacred ground. I won’t have it stained with your blood.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah, hate to get blood on all the dusty office supplies. …Fine, whatever.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They walked to the roof.]

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Where are we?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kashiwagi
Text: It’s a building I look after. In return, I’m free to use it as I like. Excellent janitorial staff. A dead body would get tidied up in no time at all.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Heh, you sure you want to do this solo? Not too late to back out now. Or do ya wanna call in the cavalry?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kashiwagi
Text: What fun would that be? I always wanted the chance to try you one-on-one. To be honest, the prospect’s had my heart racing since you walked in… Call it a yakuza’s nature. Let’s see where this goes… Come at me, Majima!!

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima takes the challenge and wins.]

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Who knew the Kazama Family was breedin’ monsters like this…

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kazama Family Rookie
Text: Ka-Kashiwagi-san!?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hey, yer timing’s perfect. Where’s this Nishikiyama guy at?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kazama Family Rookie
Text: Uh…

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Stay tongue tied, and I’ll dig out your buddy’s left eye. He can join the club. Don’t make me do this shit.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Kazama Family Rookie
Text: ……Se-Serena! Try there! There’s a bar called Serena on Tenkaichi Street. Nishikiyama-san is a regular there.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Alright then. …If he ain’t there, I’ll be back.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Outside.]

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Nishikiyama’s s’posed to be at this ‘Serena’ on Tenkaichi Street.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Serena… This is the place. Nishikiyama’s favorite drinkin’ spot. If he ain’t in here, it’s back to square one. Either way, I gotta get a lead on this Kiryu guy. Alright, here goes!]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He enters the building. Nishikiyama drinking at the counter and Raina severing him drinks.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Welcome.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Nice place ya got.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Thank you very much.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: …See ya later.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Say, mama… I heard a guy named Nishikiyama comes around here to get his drink on. Would ya say he comes often?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Nishikiyama stops.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Er, yes…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Who are you?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Name’s Majima. And you?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: What if I said I was the guy you were looking for?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’d say you ain’t the one I’m really lookin’ for. I need to find a girl named Makoto Makimura. She’s with a guy from Tachibana Real Estate. Kiryu. All I want is somebody to lead me to him.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Majima, you said? Right?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Before I got my stripes, I remember hearin’ about a guy named Majima in the Shimano Family. I hear he screwed up so royally, they carved out an eye and erased him. Does this mean you’re back in the Tojo Clan, Majima-san?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Not yet.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Then why are you after Makoto Makimura?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: If I said it was to protect her… would ya believe me?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Where’s yer brother at? Where’s he got Makoto Makimura hidden?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Nishikiyama pulls out a gun buy Majima slaps it away.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Raina
Text: Nishikiyama-kun!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You can’t beat me, kid.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Don’t make me laugh. What could you even begin to know about me?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: If what I just did told ya nothin’… Then that’s why you don’t got a chance.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You’re about to learn something else about me. I don’t know what you see me as… But I’d die before I sold out my sworn brother.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I see. That how this goes down then?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: The stories say you’re pretty tough. All the same… I’m not backing down on this one!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Nishikiyama fights fair and square, but Majima is stronger.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Grh… Shit…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Hey, that’s enough!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: If you’re done swingin’, then start talkin’, Nishikiyama. Where’s Kiryu?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Wait. You’re searching for Makoto Makimura, aren’t you?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Stop, Reina!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Reina
Text: She’s… She’s gone. Disappeared. Kiryu-san doesn’t know where she is either.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Wait, what? The hell happened?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Reina
Text: Nishikiyama-kun is looking for her now, too. He came here to see if I’d heard anything.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: That the truth?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: It happened maybe three hours ago. Right after her brother was killed, she--

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hold up. What’s this about Makoto’s brother?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You didn’t know? Tetsu Tachibana… The president of Tachibana Real Estate was Makoto’s older brother.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You serious?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: They were the kids of a Japanese war orphan in China. Hadn’t seen each other since they got split up ten years back. Tachibana came over to Japan solo as a stowaway. Once he heard she’d come here too, he started looking for her. Makoto was searching for him the whole time, too. The whole reason she was in Sotenbori was because she might find him there. But her brother was killed… Butchered. She just kind of shut down. Kiryu and I didn’t know what to do. What do you say in a situation like that? We turned around for one second, and she was gone. She’s freaking blind… Where would she go?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Where’d you see her last?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: West Park. The homeless village. We brought her back there, then she disappeared.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: So what, she’s just out walkin’ the streets right now? You understand this girl’s got about a million yakuza on her ass, right!?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You said… When you said you were looking for her to protect her, was that true?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Then you’ve gotta help us find her. If anything happens to her, Tachibana will beat the shit outta me and Kiryu from the afterlife!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Shit…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He leaves the bar.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (She’s somewhere here in town… If I don’t find her soon, she’ll get snatched again!]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [In search of Makoto Majima wanders the streets helping random passers-by.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Wait, am I where I think I am?]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He remembers Shimano’s words…]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: The Empty Lot’s a shit stripe of land sandwiched ‘tween Shichifuku Street and Taihei Boulevard.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (It should be just up here…) This is the Empty Lot?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He notices Makoto standing on the roof nearby. He darts off and run to her.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You’re… Makoto, right? What’re ya doin’ up here? Makoto?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [She turns around.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I thought we might meet again.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Wait… Can you see?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You… Can you see?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Just well enough to walk around town. I can tell you’re standing there.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: How’s this happenin’?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Today… Down in that Empty Lot, I saw my brother for the first time in ten years. ‘Except that I was still blind, and he… He’d already been murdered. When I touched his cold body… Something changed in my eyes… There was light coming into them.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Is that even… possible? No matter how close I got to his face, I couldn’t see it clearly… All I knew… was that he’d been brutally tortured. The Dojima Family yakuza murdered my brother. For a barren patch of dirt!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: No way… Don’t you go down the road to revenge. Don’t get desperate! The situation’s changed. My boss ain’t tryin’ to kill you anymore. He doesn’t want to hurt you at all. All he wants is to buy that land off ya. If you just offload it on him, nobody will have a reason to bother ya anymore. Don’t worry, I’ll be there beside you! Whatever happens, I’ll keep you safe.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: My safety is pointless! There’s something I need to do, whether I live or die. If you really want to help me… Then help me. My brother was killed by yakuza who were after the Empty Lot. The Dojima Family’s three lieutenants. And Sohei Dojima.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: And… You’re askin’ me to kill ‘em?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I can pay you. Is one billion enough? You agreed to kill me once, didn’t you? Then please… Kill them. I know in my heart that that’s why my brother brought the two of us together. Now that he’s gone… Doesn’t that mean he wants me to avenge him?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: That ain’t who you are. Can’t imagine it’s who your brother was.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [She lowers her head and goes to the exit from the roof.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Wait.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Let me go. I’m fine on my own now.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [She trips and falls.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Makoto!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Leave me alone!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hey… Wanna grab some takoyaki?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Takoyaki. If you still want me gone after that… I’ll take a hike.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: You think I’m just getting emotional because I’m hungry again?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: That a no?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Didn’t say that. But… after we eat… Let me worry about myself.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Let’s just talk. Over some grub, huh?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They’re going down the street.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Are we really grabbing food? Takoyaki?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Damn straight we are. Let’s roll. (She claims she’s fine on her own, but her eyes are tellin’ a different story. Better take it slow for her.) Watch your step. Eyes still ain’t seein’ too well, right?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Surprised you made it around the city like that. You fall and ‘scrape yerself up?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I’m fine.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Cold night, ain’t it?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Think it’ll snow?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: …Fifty percent, they said.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: The chance of snow. I heard the forecast.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh… No wonder it feels cold, then. Hm, guess we better, keep movin’.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Sure…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They come up to a street takoyaki seller. There’s a huge line to him.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: The hell is all this?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Is something wrong?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Like a million people decided it was takoyaki night…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Oh… Ah, actually… Earlier I think I passed a food cart.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What, a takoyaki one?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I think so? It smelled that way, at least.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Where was it?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Um, some kind of plaza area, I think. Lots of big buildings all around it.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hmm, around here, that’d probably be Theater Square ? Alright, it’s worth takin’ a look.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They’re going to the square.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: …Thanks.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: For walking slow.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Oh. Yeah, no problem. A guy gets tired of runnin’ everywhere. Still, make sure ya stay close.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Okay. That food cart must be close. It was right around here… I think, anyway.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah? Let’s have a look, then.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: You really don’t have to get me any takoyaki. Really, I’ll be fine on my own.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sorry it’s takin’ awhile. All I’m sayin’ is, let’s talk after a nice, bot snack. That was the right?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They come up to the takoyaki seller’s cart.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Curb, watch your step.  One each, please.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Granny
Text: Coming right up.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Quick, yeah?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Granny
Text: Okay, okay.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima removes a fallen leaf from Makoto’s head.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Granny
Text: Such a gentleman.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah right.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Granny
Text: He’s a keeper, huh?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Less talk, more cookin’, lady!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: He is a keeper. He’s been through terrible things for my sake, yet he’s still trying to help me. If not for him, I’d never have made it this far… I’ll bet they’re delicious! They smell amazing.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Granny
Text: Don’t they? I tell you what, sweetheart, I’ll throw in an extra one free.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Really? Are you sure!?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They sit on a bench by the house and eat.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: …Thanks for that. Osaka may have met its match against Kamurocho’s takoyaki.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yeah. Just goes to show ya how much of the world you still gotta figure out for yourself.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: You’re right.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Just how’re you plannin’ to get revenge on the Dojima Family, hm?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: …I can’t tell you that.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Don’t be stupid. ‘Sides, even if I helped you do it, soon as you make a move on them, the family wouldn’t relent till they made hell look downright cozy. And, they’d get ya eventually. At that point, I couldn’t even begin to tell ya what they’d do.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I told you to let me worry about myself.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I just want ya to think it through a bit. Doin’ this all hasty like is gonna be real trouble.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I would tell you to do the same. Think on whether you want to help me or not. Who says I’ll be the one to change her mind here? …That takoyaki was good.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Want another one? I’ll go buy this round.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You stay here. Eyes still ain’t workin’ too good, right? I can go grab it.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Sorry.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’ll be right back. Hang tight just a sec.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Food Cart Lady
Text: Hello there! …Hm? You’re the gentleman from before.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: That was some damn fine takoyaki. I’ll take one more.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Food Cart Lady
Text: Is that so? Aren’t you the sweetest? You take just as many as you’d like, honey. On the house!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: For real? All the same, just one right now, and you bet I’ll be back to buy more another day. Thanks, lady.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Food Cart Lady
Text: Any time, dear!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He’s got Piping Hot Takoyaki.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Alright, got some hot takoyaki. Now to get it back to the Children’s Park before it gets cold.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He comes back in the bench, but Makoto has disappeared somewhere.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Homeless Man
Text: Hey, buddy.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Homeless Man
Text: Gimme that takoyaki.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: …The hell you on about?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Homeless Man
Text: This girl who just left said to give you a message.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Homeless Man
Text: She said she didn’t know your name, so I should just give it to the guy with the takoyaki. Said her name’s Makoto. That ring any bells? You’re the guy, right?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: That damn idiot…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Homeless Man
Text: Tomorrow at five, come to the roof above the Empty Lot. …She said that’d be enough for you to understand?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Tomorrow, five, on the roof…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Homeless Man
Text: She said if I gave you the message I could have the takoyaki.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Tch… Take it already.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Homeless Man
Text: Heh, thanks, buddy.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Majima is resting in a hotel room.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (…It’s about time to go meet Makoto. Who knows why she gave me the slip last night, but she wouldn’t do this without some sorta plan… I ain’t about to leave her by herself, regardless. She wants me there, I’ll be there.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He goes back to the Empty Lot…]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Makoto should be waitin’ up there… Whatever comes next is a problem I gotta solve when I get to it. No time to stand here thinkin’!]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He’s standing on the roof, smoking and waiting for her.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Where the hell’d you go wanderin’ off to, Makoto?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Couple of yakuzas enter the roof.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: …The hell is this? And whose team are you guys on?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shibusawa Family Thug
Text: We’re Shibusawa Family.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Shibusawa’s?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shibusawa Family Thug
Text: We paid good money hiring the Kijin Clan. Thanks to you, that got us fuck-all. Then we had the added hassle of having to put them in the ground.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Huh?
