Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You guys did Nishitani?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shibusawa Family Thug
Text: You’ve been a pain in our asses for way too long. We’re done with you.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What’d you do with Makoto?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shibusawa Family Thug
Text: She reached out to our boss saying she wanted him to take that land off her hands. We gave her a warm welcome.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What? She got in contact with Shibusawa herself?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shibusawa Family Thug
Text: Bitter that you got dumped? Heh, the boss is probably serving her up to Patriarch Dojima on a platter right now. I tell you, women are scary things. She even went out of her way to let us know you’d be here. Said she was tired of you followin’ her around like a lost puppy.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Where’s she meeting Dojima?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shibusawa Family Thug
Text: Don’t see why you’d care. The only place you’re going is off this roof and into a little box.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: She wants me there. Sendin’ you clowns here’s as good as a formal invitation.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shibusawa Family Thug
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Now… Where’s the girl!?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He beats them with his bat.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shibusawa Family Thug
Text: Nh… nhaagh…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Where is she!?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shibusawa Family Thug
Text: I… I can’t…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Talk quick… or I’ll move on to one of your buddies. You’ll be too dead to watch what I do to him. I said TALK!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shibusawa Family Thug
Text: R-Roppongi… The Sebastian Building… rooftop terrace.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [On the street.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: (Gotta get to the Sebastian Building, now. No tellin’ what she’s plannin’ to pull.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He catches a taxi.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Taxi Driver
Text: The taxi fare starts at ¥470. Where would you like to go?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Taxi Driver
Text: Very well, sir.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Meanwhile, Makoto meets Shibusawa on the roof of the building. Everything is decorated like a real ceremony. There are many people present. Sohei Dodjima himself is sitting at the table.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: Boss. Makoto Makimura… Here she is.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Dojima
Text: Good work, Shibusawa. Let’s hear it for our new captain.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: My brothers were instrumental in this. Surely we have their support… in the Dojima Family for years to come.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Dojima
Text: So tell me, Makimura-san. I understand you have an’ffer for me concerning the Empty Lot?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: You can have the land. A dead patch of concrete is useless to me.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Dojima
Text: Your grandfather left you that land. You shouldn’t speak of it like that.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I have a condition.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Dojima
Text: The billion not enough?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: No of money interests me. However. Your three lieutenants who scrambled to get you that Empty Lot… Those men are responsible for murdering my brother. The president of Tachibana Real Estate. He was my brother.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Dojima
Text: And so?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: The heads of your three men… I want you to line them up before me, Patriarch Dojima. That my price for the Empty Lot.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Meanwhile on the lower floor…]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Slim Dojima Family Thug
Text: Hey. We got somebody coming up.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Portly Dojima Family Thug
Text: Huh? …Just one guy? Who the hell is it?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Slim Dojima Family Thug
Text: M-Majima!?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Portly Dojima Family Thug
Text: Didn’t Shibusawa’s guys take him out already!?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Slim Dojima Family Thug
Text: Majima! Not another step closer!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’m done talkin’, dumbass.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Slim Dojima Family Thug
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Don’t got the time to waste on trash. Clear a path or bleed. Your call. I said step aside, assholes!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He kicks their asses and runs to the roof.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: MAKOTO!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He’s running to her. Lao Gui shoots. He’ll miss a few hard seconds. Makoto falls to the floor.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What the hell…?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Dojima and his lieutenants along with Lao Gui are leaving.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What the fuck have you done!?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He runs at them, but his path is blocked by many Yakuza. They surround him.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Makoto…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Dojima and the others fly away in a helicopter. Majima tears off her jacket, showing her demon face tattoo.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’m takin’ every last one of you…. straight to the pits of hell.  Nobody leaves alive!!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [He defeats a whole crowd of Yakuza and approaches Makoto’s body. He falls to her knees in front of her. Makoto flinches a little.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You’re alive! Makoto! Can ya hear me? Hang in there!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Some people enter the building.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Неу… Don’t you recognize me!? Say something! Makoto!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I’m… sorry.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Makoto!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I couldn’t do… anything on my own. I just… caused you… more trouble.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: No, that’s enough!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Please. L-Listen…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [She’s retelling a conversation with Dojima.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: The heads of your three men. Line them up before me. …Patriarch Dojima. That is my price for the Empty Lot.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Dojima
Text: You want me to buy your land with the heads of my poor boys? You really think I’d take that bite? …Miss?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: If you choose not to accept my terms, that’s perfectly fine. It simply means I’ll be selling my land to someone else.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Dojima
Text: Heh, is that so? The way I see it, though… That Empty Lot of yours… is a bit overpriced. You may not be aware of this… but that patch was only discovered by chance after all the land around it… had already been bought. Nobody had a damn clue a little scrap of land was sitting in the middle of town. Not even the bureaucrats.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: …And?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Dojima
Text: And if it’d stayed that way… the revitalization project could move ahead.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: What…?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Dojima
Text: So, the only problem is if the project moves forward… and THEN the title-holder makes a claim on the land. It goes to court, and we’re all screwed. Situation like that could sink the whole project. But, from another angle… As long as the owner never causes a scene… Then it’s smooth sailing for the bureaucrats AND the yakuza. At this point, the only person with any claim to that land… is you. Who’s still drawin’ breath, anyway. My people have been digging on that to make sure, and it’s true.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Lao Gui points his gun at Makoto.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Dojima
Text: Women and children oughta know… Yakuza are not to be fucked with.

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [Lao Gui shoots.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I’m.. so stupid… and naive. If I had the Empty Lot… I thought I could do it… That’s… all I have…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I know. It’s all right!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I had to…

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [She dies.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Dammit, please! Somebody help her!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [The people who enter the building go out on the roof.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Majima!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sera?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: What happened? She’s been shot. Get her downstairs! We can’t let her die!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Where’re you takin’ her!?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Relax. You’re coming too. If you want to help the girl… Trust me. That is… Unless you think you can save her alone?

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They bring Makoto to the hospital and put her on a gurney. She’s taking her to surgery right away.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Makoto! Can you hear me!? Don’t die Please don’t die!

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Text: [They’re bringing her to the O.R. Majima stays outside.]

Time/Location: Previously in the tale of Goro Majima…
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’ll do anythin’. Revenge, you name it. Whatever you want. So please… PLEASE!

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Woman’s Voice
Text: The Tojo’s Clan strongest group, the Dojima Family, has fixed its gaze upon the prize: The Kamurocho Revitalization Project. At the crux of that project stands the owner of the Empty Lot, Makoto Makimura, estranged sister to Tachibana. The yakuza are merciless, and despite years of childhood abuse at their hands, the siblings face a cruel fate. After her brother’s murder, Makoto swears revenge, only for a Dojima bullet to find her, as she too is swallowed by the dark violence of the underworld. Yet, even with Kamurocho now all but fully crushed under Dojima’s fist, the yakuza chain to be broken by two men. They must act upon their ideals, and ascend to the halls of legend…

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Majima’s been waiting the operation to end for hours.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: How long’s it gonna take?

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Red sign 手術中 – surgery in progress - goes out. A woman surgeon comes out of the operating room.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Is she outta surgery? How is she!?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Surgeon
Text: I’m sorry, sir, but who are you?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: The guy who brought her in.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Surgeon
Text: Well, good news. The surgery was a success. However… She has yet to regain consciousness. She may wake in an hour, or a week, or never.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: What…?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Surgeon
Text: That’s the latest status, Sera-san.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sera…

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Majima. Makoto Makimura needs to be moved. It’s not safe here. If the Dojima Family learns she’s alive, it’s a given they’ll come try to finish the job. Too risky here.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: So where you takin’ her?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Somewhere with more defense than this. The doctor’s coming too. Will you be joining us?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sit around and wait for her to wake up? I can’t help her here. Sera, Makoto’s yours.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Me… I’ve got somethin’ I gotta do in her place.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Hm?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: She’s in too deep as it is… And I ain’t about to let the darkness take her. Long as the Dojima Family’s around, she’ll be a target, even if she does wake up. Screw that… I’m gonna put an end to it all.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: You can’t be serious… You’d die just to take a run at Dojima’s life?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: You look after her too, doc. Whatever it takes, you get her back awake.

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [He leaves.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Majima…

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Dojima
Text: The Kamurocho Revitalization Project… The Empty Lot stalled it for a long-ass time, but the bureaucrats are finally moving forward. Shibusawa, that’s all you.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Guess we better get used to callin’ Shibusawa “captain” around here, eh?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: There are still other matters to attend to.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kuze
Text: What do you mean?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: The Kazama Family’s mess. Tachibana Real Estate, the Nikkyo Consortium… All of them were mere puppets of Captain Kazama. The Dojima Family must answer treason with a reprisal. We have to maintain order.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Awano
Text: What then, Kazama turns up dead in the clink?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: Taking half-measures like that… That’s not how one gets to the top. Outside of extortion, you’re an amateur.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Awano
Text: Eh? You wanna watch your goddamn mouth!?

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Shibusawa gets up and Awano stops talking.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: Anyone with Kazama Family ties has to go. Until the Tojo Clan can be cleansed of them, upstarts like Kiryu will keep sprouting. To me… A job like this requires my thorough hand. Boss?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Dojima
Text: Looks like our new captain… has a taste for blood.

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [In the next scene, we find Kiryu on the Empty Lot…]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: So this is where you got off to, Kiryu.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Still no word on Makoto Makimura. The guys in Little Asia are helping us look, but nobody’s got any leads yet.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I see.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Hey, Kiryu? You know a guy named Goro Majima?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’ve heard the name, but never met him. Why, what about him?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: He’s looking for her, too. He stormed the Kazama Family office and beat the crap out of Kashiwagi-san, one-on-one.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Kashiwagi-san lost?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Guess who Majima came to see next.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: …You lose, too?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Honest truth is I didn’t stand a chance.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: A guy like that, and he’s looking for Makoto…

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: But, it didn’t sound like Majima was on Dojima’s payroll. He said he was trying to protect her. Maybe he’s not our enemy here.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Doesn’t mean he’s on our side, either. We won’t know anything until we find Makoto and regroup. I can’t let her die, for Tachibana’s sake. We have to protect her at all costs.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Yeah…

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Kiryu’s pager beeps.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [X70-2940. That’s not a number I know. Guess I’ll have to call back and see who it is.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I don’t recognize the number… Who’s it from? (Who’d be calling me now? …It could be a trap, but I can’t afford to sit here watching the clock tick. If it’s got anything to do with where Makoto is, I’ll take the chance. First, I need to find out who it’s from. Time to find a pay phone.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Somebody rang my pager. Not sure who it’s from, but I should call them back.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [He walks into the booth and calls the number.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: …Kiryu?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. Who’s this?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Sera, from the Nikkyo Consortium.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You called me, Sera-san?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: I heard what happened to President Tachibana… That the Dojima Family killed him.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: I’m at Chen-san’s restaurant in Little Asia. I’d like to speak with you one-on-one. Can you come here?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What’s this about?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: I’ll tell you when you get here. …And be careful. Dojima’s men are still hunting you.

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Kiryu hangs up.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (I guess Sera’s in Kamurocho, too. I need to meet him in Little Asia.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [He walks into Elder Chen’s favorite diner.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Elder Chen
Text: Kiryu-san. Your guest is over there. I was sorry to hear about Tachibana-san. To suffer so, then not even get the chance to see his sister… But I know you did your utmost to help him. I speak for all Little Asia’s residents when I say thank you.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Please, don’t… I couldn’t do anything. I haven’t earned anyone’s thanks.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Elder Chen

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: There’s no time to talk here. What do you have?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: You can take it easy. That’s what I wanted to tell you.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Makoto Makimura… was shot by Dojima’s men.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Wha--!?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: She’s past the worst of it, post-surgery, but her condition’s still unstable. She hasn’t regained consciousness.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What… happened?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [He tells him everything he knew.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: …So she’s not blind anymore?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Her eyes can detect light and shadow, not much more. Better news is though, the Dojima Family thinks she’s dead. They’re back to work on the Kamurocho Revitalization Project in earnest now. She should be safe for the time being.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: But, that Majima guy knows she’s alive, right? Can he be trusted?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: I believe so. He was originally acting on orders from Shimano to kill her, but now… I believe he sincerely wants to keep her safe. All the same, I can’t predict what his next move is. Let’s focus on the Dojima Family. Lieutenant Shibusawa’s almost officially promoted to captain now. He’ll be the one calling the shots there from here on out. He’s never been the type to work out in the open. He’s kept quiet and built up his forces, patient and thorough.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Still, the Shibusawa Family is a young organization. If they’re going to stand atop Kuze’s Kenno Clan and Awano’s Taihei Association, they need a show of strength. I can guarantee, the first thing on his list’s a thorough purge of Kazama’s old guard. You’re his poster boy. Plus, you still haven’t been cleared for the Empty Lot killing, so the police will be after you, too. You should get out of Kamurocho and lie low for a while. If you can buy some time, there’s hope yet.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hope?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: If Makoto Makimura wakes up, the Nikkyo Consortium will take the Empty Lot.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: This whole time, that’s been Kazama-san’s true aim.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What do you mean?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: He wants to prevent the Dojima Family from growing any more powerful, and he chose me and the Nikkyo Consortium as the counterbalance. Tachibana had intended to turn the Empty Lot over to the Consortium as well. The ultimate goal was to thwart Sohei Dojima by establishing me as the Tojo Clan’s successor instead of him.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: So, Kazama-san plans to put you at the head of the Tojo Clan?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: It seems that way.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I had no idea. I didn’t know you and Kazama-san had that deep of a connection.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Maybe not quite as deep as yours, but he’s been a huge part of how I came this far. He was the one who first showed me the ropes as a yakuza. I’ll never forget the debt I owe that man.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Kiryu, Kazama-san has also asked me to do all that I’m able to for you, too. I promise you, I’ll find a way to take care of that false murder charge. But for now, I’m afraid all either of us can do is pray that Makoto Makimura wakes up.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Then… there’s really nothing I can be doing?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: You’ve done plenty. If not for you, there’s no way Makoto would have made it to Kamurocho alive. She’s clinging to life now in part thanks to you.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: The girl… Where is she now?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: I had her moved from the hospital. I have a ship docked in Tokyo Bay, at Shibaura. She’s there. Can’t afford to risk Dojima finding out she’s still alive.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Shibaura…

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: I told you that out of respect for the part you’ve played in this. You worry about getting out of town and staying safe, and leave the rest to us. All right?

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Outside.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (I guess there’s really nothing more I can do… I should meet up with Nishiki for now. If I head to West Park, I’ll run into him eventually.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [He meets Nishikiyama near West Park.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Kiryu!

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki. What, is something wrong?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: The Dojima Family’s headed for the Kazama Family office! They looked ready to start some serious shit!

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What!?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: It’s Shibusawa… He’s been named the next captain. He’s putting every last Kazama loyalist to the sword. You and me both are basically walking targets.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: The order’s coming from Shibusawa, right?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Look, the city’s gonna be flooded with Dojima muscle real soon. We’ve gotta get out of here.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: Hey, there they are! It’s Kiryu and Nishikiyama!

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki. Makoto is with Sera from the Nikkyo Consortium.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: The Dojima Family thinks they killed her and took care of their Empty Lot problem. But she’s alive, and as long as she stays that way, that lot is Sera and Kazama’s ace in the hole. They should be able to beat Dojima back with it. If we can just get through this and buy some time, hopefully things will change.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Meaning? What the hell do we do, exactly?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You go to the Kazama Family office. Tell Kashiwagi-san he needs to lay low, too. I’ll hold these guys back.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Kiryu…

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Hurry up and go, Nishiki!

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: …I’m gone!

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [He runs away.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You all get to deal with me.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Dojima Family Thug
Text: Heh, big talk from Kazama’s little errand boy. Every last one of you is getting buried. You wanna blame anyone, you can tell Kazama in hell!

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Kiryu beat their asses with a newspaper stand.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: (Wonder how the Kazama Family guys are holding up… I hope they all make it out okay.]

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Kiryu is moving quickly and confidently towards his goal. Ordinary citizens scatter in different directions. The street is empty. On Kiryu’s way, Kuze stands up.]

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Kuze… You alone?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Yeah. I asked the family to clear out. No jackasses standin’ in the way now of you and me doing this for real. We haven’t made a move on the Kazama office yet. Nishikiyama’s up there now.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: What’s the Dojima Family plan to do with the Kazama Family? Rather… Whats their plan for Kazama-san?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kuze
Text: They’re all gonna die dumbass. Both the Kazama Family and you. Heh, it’s Shibusawa calling the shots now, but whoever’s in charge has a simple enough job. The way the Dojima Family’s going now, the entire Tojo Clan’s gonna be under us soon enough. That means we’ve got all the ground troops we could want to force you rats outta your holes.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Maybe so… But I’d rather fight a hundred Tojo punks than go one-on-one with you right now.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Oh?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: You’re here for one reason… to break me. There’s no worse fight than going up against somebody who’ll risk his neck without a thought to what he stands to gain or lose.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kuze
Text: So you understand that, huh? The only thing driving me at this point… is a man’s pride. As long as a man’s got pride, he can die with a smile on his face. Be fun to see whose pride dies harder here… Yours or mine.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: …Let’s settle this for good, sir.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Hah, cheeky bastard… I’m ready anytime. You better hit like you’re tryin’ to kill me!!

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [He fights like a beast, but Kiryu wins anyway.]

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Huff… hah… You’re a damn monster, kid… You just… keep getting together.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Lieutenant… Kuze…

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kuze
Text: I can tell, you know? Captain Kazama… He knew this’d happen. Held it back. Tried to keep you from turning into a real yakuza. And we went and broke the seal. The Dojima Family did this. But… you’re not the only one. There’s another guy… fighting to become a real yakuza right now. Go to the Nikkyo Consortium, Kiryu. He’s there… Shibusawa’s there.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Shibusawa… at the Consortium?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kuze
Text: …Makoto Makimura’s alive, ain’t she?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nh!?

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kuze
Text: Shibusawa had the hitman shoot her, but he didn’t want him aiming to kill. Hasn’t told that to Patriarch Dojima, though. He let the Consortium take her… watched how they moved. They led him right to their base.

Chapter: Go to The Kazama Family Office
Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Kiryu

Speaker: Shibusawa

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: For such a “trivial” thing… Some men would give their lives for it. My father was an aide to a politician in the House of Representatives. Everyone around him expected him to rise up the ranks as a politician, too. But credit for all his accomplishments went to his boss. Worse, he was later made to take the fall for his boss’s corruption. It drove him to suicide. That’s the limit of a man trying to make it on talent alone. That’s the way of the world. Anyone who takes the high road in a world that answers diligence with indifference is a fool. So I found a new world. One where power is everything. A place I could author my own fate. I spent my life earning money. Whatever the boss wanted, I got it for him. But… The yakuza turned out to be just like politics. In the end, one thing brings yakuza to heel. A title that commands a yakuza’s respect.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Shibusawa
Text: This is Captain Kazama we’re talking about. You think he didn’t know the girl and Tachibana would be in grave danger? Whose blood tipped the brush for his script? He used Tachibana and Makimura as sacrificial pawns. We write in other people’s blood. That’s the yakuza’s way. And I aim to pen my title in yours.

Do you intend to saddle her with a debt she can never repay?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Makoto’s awake?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Dojima
Text: Wh-What the hell are you talking about? The girl… She’s alive? Impossible! Then, the Empty Lot… What happens to the land!?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Dojima-san… She is no longer the owner of the Empty Lot. The paperwork is filed in my name. My asking price is one hundred billion. I would happily discuss those terms.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Dojima
Text: What the…!

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: The age of the Dojima Family has ended.

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Dojima sits in his chair in powerless anger.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: The Kamurocho Revitalization Project’s vast profits belong to the holder of the Empty Lot. The Dojima Family has enjoyed unrivaled power within the Tojo Clan, but that changes now.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Why should I care!? You’re really tellin’ me not to kill these two?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: We need the assassin. He’s killed multiple people on Dojima’s orders. His testimony could end Dojima overnight. I’ve already informed the police of that.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: So, what? You gonna just hand him over to the cops and call it a day?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: I’m not that benevolent. The Nikkyo Consortium will take custody of him. The Tojo Clan’s Dojima Family, it’s largest force… is bridled now by this insurance policy. Besides, which seems more fitting? Giving that man a quick death now, or letting him live out his days in the hole you left? I admire your restraint, Majima. Makoto Makimura will never be threatened by the Dojima Family again. You’ve saved her.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Spare me the pretty speech. You just used me to do yer dirty work. Same as Patriarch Shimano did.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: You just happened to have already crushed the Dojima Family by the time I arrived here. I could hardly have predicted that.

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Majima hums and goes to the exit.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sera
Text: Majima… There is one matter still to resolve. Your boss, Shimano. Will you bring him a message from me? You tell him… Take responsibility for betraying the Tojo Clan.

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Sera gives him a gun.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: The hell?

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [He goes to Shimano Family Office. Sagawa meets him on the way to the main office. He stands carelessly smoking a cigarette.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sagawa…

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Here to see Brother Shimano?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: He’s in there, right? I gotta talk to him.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: My bro’s talking to the head of Omi Alliance headquarters.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: The head of Omi HQ’s here?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: They’re hammering out the details of the Omi’s big Tokyo debut.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Well, I got bad news. The Empty Lot’s the Nikkyo Consortium’s now. No room left in Kamurocho for you guys to weasel in.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Oh. Well then… After you cap Shimano, I guess everything ends up nice and tidy, huh?

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [He nods to a gun in Majima’s hand.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Hey… We had some fun, right? All things considered? Put through hell by a little blind girl, and this’s where it wound us up, but still. Life’s a crazy ride like that, huh?

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Majima enters the main office.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Majima?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Boss. Sera from the Nikkyo. …He asked me to give ya a message.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Yeah?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Somewhere in the Tojo Clan… there’s a traitor working with Kansai. He wants the guy trying to sell the Empty Lot to the Omi Alliance found… and he wants the Shimano Family to do it.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: You gonna walk in here and talk like that to me, Majima?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Sera… He wants to believe you’re innocent. But he’s gonna need proof.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Ain’t that some shit?

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Majima points a gun at his boss… and then he puts it on the table.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: As for me… Whatever happens, I’m still a family man.

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Shimano takes the gun.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: That bein’ the case… You’d be willin’ to die for me, right?

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yes. But, I have one request. Tell my bro, Saejima… Please tell him I said I was sorry.

Time/Location: Previously…
Text: [Shimano giggles, points the gun at his companion and shoots.]

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: He’s got my answer. Pass it on to Sera. The Empty Lot and the head of Omi HQ ain’t got a damn thing to do with me.

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Majima
Text: B-Boss..

Time/Location: Previously…
Speaker: Shimano
Text: Lemme drop some wisdom. If all ya care about’s climbin’ the ranks, ya gotta be thinkin’ one step ahead. But if ya wanna look down from the top… it’s the endgame that matters. Rulin’ the world don’t mean shit if you lose it the next day. Kazama and the Nikkyo’s time won’t last long. Ten years from now, it’s gonna be the Shimano Family callin’ the shots. After all, I got a weapon like Goro Majima on my side. They say if ya really love yer kid, send him out to see the world. Wouldn’t ya say, Majima?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [It is a big meeting of all the heads of families in the Tojo clan. The chairman is Takashi Nihara.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nihara
Text: You’ve had a rough go of it, Dojima. Awano’s dead. Kuze and Shibusawa got pinched by the cops. Even after Kazama gets out of prison… you’ll have too much on your plate to worry about the Kamurocho Revitalization Project.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Dojima
Text: Acting Chairman… I’m sorry for any distress.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nihara
Text: Oh, don’t worry about me. More importantly, live called all of you here today to make an announcement. As you know, since the Chairman passed… I have filled his seat as Acting Second Chairman. As such, the position of Clan Captain has long remained unfilled. At the repeated requests of Dojima here, I’ve decided to rectify that.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [Dojima is tearing apart from anger and despair.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nihara
Text: I hereby appoint the Nikkyo Consortium’s President Sera… to the role of Tojo Clan Captain. Dojima will serve as his guardian. Sera holds strong approval among the patriarchs of the direct families.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [Sera politely bows.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nihara
Text: And so I am entrusting him, as our captain, to oversee the Kamurocho Revitalization Project Dojima has been forced to step back from.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [The old man gets up from his chair.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nihara
Text: I believe… My work in the clan is nearly at an end.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [He walks through two rows of sitting heads of the families. Next we have a long awaited scene. After solving his problems, Kiryu gets the opportunity to visit Kazama in prison.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kazama
Text: It’s good to see you. I’m sorry. I put you through a lot.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m here today… Sir… to report something. I’m pretty sure you don’t want to hear it… But I have to.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kazama
Text: I see.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Sir, I’m sure that… You already know it… You know, don’t you?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kazama
Text: I do. But, can you do it? Kazuma?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m prepared. Whatever it takes.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [In the next scene, Kiryu drinks whiskey at Bar Serena. He’s wearing a new red shirt. Nishikiyama comes in.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Hey, Kiryu! You wanna explain this!?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Reina
Text: Come now, Nishikiyama-kun, no need for theatrics…

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: For real… You’re going back to the Dojima Family? Seriously!?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Reina
Text: What?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You went and saw Kazama today, right? Did you tell him about this?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah, I told Kazama-san a little while ago. He said I should stay a civilian. He doesn’t think I’m cut out for the yakuza. He said part of why he sent me to Tachibana… was to get me out of the yakuza and into a real job.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: And despite that, you’re going back anyway? I mean, fine, but at least join up with the Kazama Family, man. You go back to the Dojima Family after screwing them that hard… they’re gonna tear you to shreds, man. I’m serious, think this thing through.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: No… I feel like this is the first thing I need to do to square things up right.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Huh?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Through this whole ordeal, I saw a lot of people try to set things right. It blew me away, man. Not just yakuza. Civilians, too. It really drove home just how green I still am.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Yeah? Makes me wonder, though… Just what is it you and I still don’t have?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Dunno. I don’t know, but… All it means is I can’t run away. If I can do this without running away, then whatever path is left… That’s the one I’m meant to walk. I figure, maybe that’s how it was for all of them.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: So your way of finding the right path… is going back to the Dojima Family?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Yeah. In terms of setting things straight, that’s the best I’ve got right now. But, I want to stick it out. Find my own way as a yakuza. Different from Kazama-san’s. Make my own style of yakuza.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Huh? Hey, where’s the usual suit?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Oh, right. I got this the other day. It spoke to me.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Aw, c’mon, the stark white was way cooler. That suit was crisp. Not to mention, that suit’s cut is already on the way out. Besides, it’s just not you, you know?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Not me, huh? Maybe, but from now on, I’ll decide what “me” is.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Look, I’ll grant you that joining up with whatever family is your call. Whatever. But when it comes to picking a suit, you oughta take your damn friend’s advice.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nah, I like this one.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You’re killing me here. How about black? Can’t go wrong with a sharp, black suit…

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I’m not feeling black or white these days. This is where I’m at right now. I chose it myself. I’m making it a fresh start.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Fine, fine. See if I care! Wear it the rest of your life!

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Thanks, man.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: I see how it is. Goin’ all cool guy on me.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Nishiki. I’ve really racked up the debts I owe you.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: Wha-- What is this crap?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: If it takes me the rest of my life, I’ll pay you back.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: What are you babbling about… But sure. How ‘bout we grab a bite, then? Your treat, huh?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: S-Sure…

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: At Kamurocho’s finest steak house.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: Y-Yeah, but…

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: What?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Kiryu
Text: I, uh… don’t have much cash on me.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Nishikiyama
Text: You ass! Start walking. C’mon.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [Meanwhile Sagawa talks to someone on the street.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Really!? That’s the tackiest jacket I’ve ever seen.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [That “somebody” turns out to be Majima. He bought himself a new jacket, too. Only without a shirt. He also got a haircut to look more like himself in his youth.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: What happened to the classy guy who used to run the Grand?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Get off me. My mind’s made up. Right, wrong… Nobody’s got a clue what the difference is in this town. So I’m gonna have more fun… and live crazier than any of ‘em.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Ha! And I had you pegged for the straight and narrow type. Hey, I’m all for it.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [He hands him his pack. Majima is hesitatingly taking a cigarette. Sagawa lights a cigarette for him and himself.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: You and I went on one hell of a ride. But now we’re colleagues, and I’ve got your back. You ever want to hit up Kansai, just drop me a line.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: I’ll have to pass. If I never see your ugly mug for the rest of my life, I’m good.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: No doubt. Well, we’ve both got plenty of enemies. Let’s see just how much life we’ve got left.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Guy like you is damn near immortal.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Maybe so.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Well, see ya.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [He walks away but stops.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Much obliged, Sagawa-han.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Huh? Did I hear that right?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: You never gave up when shit hit the fan. You’re tenacity incarnate, man. Watchin’ you, I figured out how important hangin’ on really is. So I’ll be tenacious too. Goro Majima is gonna live his own way.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Go nuts, tiger.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [Majima leaves.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Catch ya on the flip side, Majima-chan.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [Some yakuza touches his shoulder.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Huh. You work fast.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [They all have 近江 pin. It’s Omi Alliance.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Sagawa
Text: Well, time to go. Isn’t it.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [The scene changes to the sound of a gunshot.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Girl 1
Text: Leave us alone!

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Man 1
Text: No harm in hearing us out, right babe?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Man 2
Text: Say, you girls like money, don’t ya? I know a ton of easy jobs where cuties like you could make some real cash.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: We said NO. Now stop harassing us.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Man 1
Text: Aw, pussycat has her claws out.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Man 2
Text: Come on, let’s just chat over some tea. This way.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Girl 1
Text: Hey! Let go!

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [Makoto slaps his mug.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Man 1
Text: Oh really… Ain’t that goin’ a little too far?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Man 2
Text: That’s called assault, lady. You’re gonna have to make amends.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I’ll hear you out. Alone. She goes free.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Man 1
Text: Interesting! Fine. Run along, girly.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Girl 1
Text: Hang on. I’ll run and get help.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Man 1
Text: You’ve got guts, kitten. I like a bold lady. How about we head to a hotel and let our fingers do the talking?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [She slaps his mug too.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Man 1
Text: Little bitch! I pay you a compliment and that’s how you answer!?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [Majima approaches.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Man 1
Text: Oh, sir…

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [Majima stares at Makoto for five minutes.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Wh-What is it!?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Man 2
Text: How’d we do? She’s fine, isn’t she? If we shoot some video of her after we get a turn, it’ll be good money. In fact, you’re welcome to join in, sir! Sorry girly, no more fun and games. You got any idea who this is? Eh? The legendary Maji--

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [Majima hits him in the face.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Man 1
Text: Huh!?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [He’s got the same bonus for hard working. Majima stares at Makoto for another five minutes. While they staring at each other Makoto’s friend brought help…]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Don Quixote
Text: You stay here.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Girl 1
Text: But, sensei…

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Ah, sensei!

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Don Quixote
Text: Y-You! What have you done to Makoto-san!?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: No, not him!

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Don Quixote
Text: Get away from her, this instant!

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: You’ve got it wrong, this guy saved me!

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [Majima grabs him and takes him aside.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: That your girl?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Don Quixote
Text: No, she’s… She’s my patient.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Oh, a doctor “sensei” huh? You love her?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Don Quixote
Text: Wh-What!?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yes or no?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Don Quixote
Text: It’s none of your--

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yer fists say that’s a yes. But once a man’s got his fists up, he’s gotta follow through. What’ll it be, sensei?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Don Quixote
Text: If you lay even a finger on her…!

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: You really wanna fight me, doc? Doctors can’t be punchin’ dudes. And a fight ain’t the only way to see this through. Man up. Do the right thing. For my sake, too.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Don Quixote
Text: For you?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Gimme a goddamn answer already!

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Don Quixote
Text: She… was blind until recently. You’d never know it to look at her now. She still needs time to adjust to her surroundings.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: And? Which is it? You fall for her or not?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Don Quixote
Text: I love her. Not as a doctor to a patient… As a man to a woman.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Ya wouldn’t lie to me, would ya?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Don Quixote
Text: I wouldn’t. I haven’t told her yet, but… Then, hurry that shit up. And… you better keep her safe. Get it together.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [Majima leaves. Don Quixote runs up to Makoto.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: Was everything all right? Did he try anything?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Don Quixote
Text: Not at all. He didn’t do anything.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: I see… That’s good… His… His eye was so sad. But sensei… What did you two talk about?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Don Quixote
Text: Er, well… Actually… are you free? Do you have time to talk? Or no?

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: What? Sure.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [She’s watching the outgoing Majima. He’s holding back, so he won’t get closet to her.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Under the aegis of Sera and the Tojo Clan, the area around the Empty Lot underwent a dramatic revitalization. Today, a new emblem of Kamurocho stands proudly atop that storied lot
Text: the Millennium Tower.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [SCENE AFTER THE CREDITS]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [Makoto carries a huge bouquet of beautiful orange flowers to the Empty Lot.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: It’s all over. Finally, huh. So now you can rest easy. Brother. Thinking back, so many people helped me. Lee-san, Kiryu-san, Sera-san… Really, so many. But there’s one… Just one who I never got to thank properly. We went through so much together, but I don’t even know his name. And the one look I got at his face was so blurry. I’m terrible, aren’t I? Though I guess I shouldn’t complain about it to you. Sorry.

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [She folds her hands in prayer and… she hears music. It comes from under the ground. She’s digging up a paper-wrapped watch.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Makoto
Text: It’s my…  Thank you. Thank you!

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [In the next scene, Majima walks around town. He’s meeting somebody… their eyes intersect in a silent fight.]

Time/Location: One Month Later
Speaker: Majima
Text: Yo.  Kiryu-chan!

Time/Location: One Month Later
Text: [In return, Kiryu smiles. I guess so at least.]
